TASK.JP1: クドが練習に加わった！
同時にクドがバトルランキングに参戦した！
TASK.EN1: At the same time she joined the battle ranking system!
TASK.Translation1: At the same time she joined the battle ranking system!

TASK.JP1: 理樹は『おっぱい魔人』の称号を得た!!

MESSAGE.JP: 夜が明けた。
MESSAGE.EN: It was dawn.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was dawn.

MESSAGE.JP: なんて勉強熱心なんだ、僕は…。
MESSAGE.EN: I had been in a real study frenzy...
MESSAGE.Translation: I had been in a real study frenzy...

MESSAGE.JP: 夜通し延々と予習復習をしてるから、テストではものすごくいい点が取れそうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I had been preparing and reviewing endlessly through the night, so I felt like I could get an incredibly good score on the test.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had been preparing and reviewing endlessly through the night, so I felt like I could get an incredibly good score on the test.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おはよう、諸君」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Good morning, gentlemen.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Good morning, gentlemen.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朝までの戦いでみんな寝不足で疲れた顔をしているにも関わらず、恭介だけはいつも通りの調子だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone was dead tired from lack of sleep as a result of yesterday's battle that'd gone on until the crack of dawn. However, Kyousuke was his usual self.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone was dead tired from lack of sleep as a result of yesterday's battle that'd gone on until the crack of dawn. However, Kyousuke was his usual self.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕らが座るのを待って、恭介が話を始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: He waited until we sat down and began to speak.
MESSAGE.Translation: He waited until we sat down and began to speak.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「次の土曜には、試合が待っている」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝The match will be held next Saturday.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝The match will be held next Saturday.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「練習は実戦を想定して激しさを増すが、くれぐれも怪我のないよう、みんな頑張ってくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We should start practicing as though it's the actual battle, and give it our best, but make sure you don't hurt yourselves.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We should start practicing as though it's the actual battle, and give it our best, but make sure you don't hurt yourselves.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「いいか、恭介」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Listen up, Kyousuke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Listen up, Kyousuke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人が口を開く。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato said.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato said.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「…試合をするには足りないものがある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...There's something we still lack for the match.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...There's something we still lack for the match.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「なんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そうか…わからないのか…なら教えてやろう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I see... You don't get it? ...Very well, I'll tell you then...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I see... You don't get it? ...Very well, I'll tell you then...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そりゃあ、残りのメンバーだよ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That is, the remaining members!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That is, the remaining members!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「謙吾を抜いて、おまえに理樹にオレに鈴、それに女連中が、小毬に来ヶ谷に三枝に鈴、これで８人だっ！　もうひとりはどこにいる!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Kengo excluded; you, Riki, me and Rin, and all the girls on the team: Komari, Kurugaya, Saigusa and Rin, that's eight people! Where's the last one!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Kengo excluded; you, Riki, me and Rin, and all the girls on the team: Komari, Kurugaya, Saigusa and Rin, that's eight people! Where's the last one!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんだ？　二回数えられたぞ？　もうひとりのあたしがどっかにいるのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What's that? You included me twice? Is there some other me somewhere?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What's that? You included me twice? Is there some other me somewhere?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴が左右をきょろきょろと振り返る。
MESSAGE.EN: She frantically looked around.
MESSAGE.Translation: She frantically looked around.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「きっと心理学的なとらえ方なんだよ、現実で探さないであげなよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm sure it's a psychological thing, you shouldn't actually search for one...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm sure it's a psychological thing, you shouldn't actually search for one...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「単なる数え間違いだよっ、ごめんなさいでしたあぁぁぁーーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I simply made a mistake while counting, I'm so damn sorry!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I simply made a mistake while counting, I'm so damn sorry!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「というわけで、７人だっ！　もうふたりはどこにいる!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝So, that means we have seven players! Where are the last two!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝So, that means we have seven players! Where are the last two!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「無論、なんとかするさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Of course, someone's going to take care of them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Of course, someone's going to take care of them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「誰が」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Who is?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Who is?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぴと、と膝に温かい何かが当たる。
MESSAGE.EN: Something hit me lightly on the knee.
MESSAGE.Translation: Something hit me lightly on the knee.

MESSAGE.JP: …恭介の足だ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Kyousuke's leg.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Kyousuke's leg.

MESSAGE.JP: それがぽんぽん、と膝頭を叩いた。
MESSAGE.EN: He continued kicking my kneecap.
MESSAGE.Translation: He continued kicking my kneecap.

MESSAGE.JP: これ、いじめじゃないかなあ…。
MESSAGE.EN: So, he wasn't just picking on me...
MESSAGE.Translation: So, he wasn't just picking on me...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃ、僕が…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then, I'll...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then, I'll...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「さすがだ、理樹。おまえはやるときはやる男だ。みんなも見習えよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝As expected of Riki. He's a man who does what needs to be done. Everyone follow his example.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝As expected of Riki. He's a man who does what needs to be done. Everyone follow his example.❞

MESSAGE.JP: うわぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Whoa...
MESSAGE.Translation: Whoa...

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「理樹は使えない奴ばかり連れてくるからなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Riki always brings along useless people...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Riki always brings along useless people...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「じゃあ、おまえも探せ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You find someone then!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You find someone then!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「いや、あれすげぇ体力使うんだ…さすがのオレも続けては無理だ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝No, looking for them requires too much strength... Even I can't keep it up anymore...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝No, looking for them requires too much strength... Even I can't keep it up anymore...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「どーせ、あほな探し方してるんだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I bet you're just doing it in some stupid way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I bet you're just doing it in some stupid way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 確かに、あれは疲れそうだなあ…。
MESSAGE.EN: That had certainly looked pretty tiresome, yesterday...
MESSAGE.Translation: That had certainly looked pretty tiresome, yesterday...

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「理樹、次こそは使える奴を頼むぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Riki, I'm counting on you this time to find someone useful.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Riki, I'm counting on you this time to find someone useful.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まぁ…努力はするけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well... I'll do what I can...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well... I'll do what I can...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朝のＨＲが終わると、早速一時間目の現国の準備をする。
MESSAGE.EN: As morning homeroom was over, I immediately started preparing for first period - modern Japanese.
MESSAGE.Translation: As morning homeroom was over, I immediately started preparing for first period - modern Japanese.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…あれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Huh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Huh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 教科書が机に入ってない。
MESSAGE.EN: The textbook wasn't in my desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: The textbook wasn't in my desk.

MESSAGE.JP: 鞄の中を漁ってみるがそっちにもない。
MESSAGE.EN: I rummaged around in my bag too, no luck.
MESSAGE.Translation: I rummaged around in my bag too, no luck.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、そういえば」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, come to think of it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, come to think of it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 昨日英語の課題やるときに一緒に全部出したんだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I'd taken them all out yesterday when I was doing my English homework.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd taken them all out yesterday when I was doing my English homework.

MESSAGE.JP: そのまま入れなおすのを忘れたみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I must've forgotten to put them back afterward.
MESSAGE.Translation: I must've forgotten to put them back afterward.

MESSAGE.JP: …借りに行こうか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I'd better borrow one from somebody.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I'd better borrow one from somebody.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（誰に…？）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(But who...?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(But who...?)

MESSAGE.JP: …他のクラスにそんな親しい友人はいなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I wasn't really close with anyone from the other classes.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I wasn't really close with anyone from the other classes.

MESSAGE.JP: ふう、と息を吐く。
MESSAGE.EN: I let out a sigh.
MESSAGE.Translation: I let out a sigh.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（指されないことを祈ろう…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Let's pray I won't get called on in class...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Let's pray I won't get called on in class...)

MESSAGE.JP: などと考えていると。
MESSAGE.EN: Just as I was thinking that.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just as I was thinking that.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あれ、理樹君どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Huh, Riki-kun, is something wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Huh, Riki-kun, is something wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　別に何もないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? No, nothing in particular.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? No, nothing in particular.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ちょっぴり困ったさんオーラが出てますよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝You've been emitting a troubled aura.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝You've been emitting a troubled aura.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、そんなの出してないけどさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I really don't think I was.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I really don't think I was.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…教科書忘れただけだよ、寮に」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I just forgot my textbooks back at the dorm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I just forgot my textbooks back at the dorm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ええっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Eeh!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Eeh!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: いや、そんなに驚かれても。
MESSAGE.EN: Hey, no need to act quite that surprised.
MESSAGE.Translation: Hey, no need to act quite that surprised.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「じゃあ、私の教科書貸してあげる～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Then, I'll lend you mine～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Then, I'll lend you mine～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ちょっと待っててね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Wait just a sec.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Wait just a sec.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、小毬さんも次使うっていうか同じクラスだし…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, we're in the same class, you'll need it yourself...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, we're in the same class, you'll need it yourself...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …僕の言葉も聞かずに自分の席に向かい、教科書を持ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Without paying any heed to my words she walked over to her seat, and finally returned with a textbook in her hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Without paying any heed to my words she walked over to her seat, and finally returned with a textbook in her hands.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「はい、どーぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Here, have this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Here, have this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、だからさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, listen to me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, listen to me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あ、先生きたっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Uwa, the teacher's here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Uwa, the teacher's here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そのまま教科書とノートを机に置き、席に戻ってしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: She put the textbook and notes on my desk and returned to her own.
MESSAGE.Translation: She put the textbook and notes on my desk and returned to her own.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（いや、どうすんのさこれ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(So, what should I do with this...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(So, what should I do with this...)

MESSAGE.JP: なぜかご丁寧にノートまでついている。
MESSAGE.EN: She even brought me her notes.
MESSAGE.Translation: She even brought me her notes.

MESSAGE.JP: まあ、音読でも指されなきゃだいじょうぶなんだろうけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, as long as she isn't called on to read something in class, she should be okay...
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, as long as she isn't called on to read something in class, she should be okay...

MESSAGE.JP: `先生@「よし、じゃあここ…神北、読んでみろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Teacher@❝Okay, start reading from there... Kamikita.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Teacher@❝Okay, start reading from there... Kamikita.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ええっ、あ、あう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Eeh, ah, auu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Eeh, ah, auu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …見事に自爆していた！
MESSAGE.EN: ...She self-destructed magnificently!
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She self-destructed magnificently!

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あ、あの…教科書忘れました～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝U, um... I forgot my textbook～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝U, um... I forgot my textbook～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `先生@「何？　しょうがないな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Teacher@❝What? Okay then...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Teacher@❝What? Okay then...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんが一瞬こちらを見る。
MESSAGE.EN: She looked at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She looked at me.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は教科書を掲げ、それを指差し、返すよ、と口を動かして見せた。
MESSAGE.EN: I raised the textbook and pointed to it, implying that I wanted to return it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I raised the textbook and pointed to it, implying that I wanted to return it.

MESSAGE.JP: にっこりと笑って、再び前を向く。
MESSAGE.EN: She smiled and faced forward again.
MESSAGE.Translation: She smiled and faced forward again.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「こまりちゃん…これ、つかえ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Komari-chan... use this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Komari-chan... use this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 近所の席の鈴が$K98手裏剣$K0のようにしゅぱっと教科書を投げる。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin, whose seat was next to hers, hurled a textbook to her as if throwing a $K98shuriken$K0.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin, whose seat was next to hers, hurled a textbook to her as if throwing a $K98shuriken$K0.

MESSAGE.JP: 一度小毬さんのお尻に当たり、ちょうど椅子の上に落ちる。
MESSAGE.EN: It hit Komari-san on the butt, and landed perfectly on the chair.
MESSAGE.Translation: It hit Komari-san on the butt, and landed perfectly on the chair.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あ…りんちゃんありがと～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ah... Rin-chan, thanks～!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ah... Rin-chan, thanks～!❞

MESSAGE.JP: それを拾い上げて礼を言う。
MESSAGE.EN: She thanked her and picked it up.
MESSAGE.Translation: She thanked her and picked it up.

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず、それでこの場は収まったみたいだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Seems like everything's settled now.
MESSAGE.Translation: Seems like everything's settled now.

MESSAGE.JP: `先生@「じゃあ次、直枝」
MESSAGE.EN: `Teacher@❝Then, Naoe, you're next.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Teacher@❝Then, Naoe, you're next.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、はい…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, yes...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, yes...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …いや、助かったけど。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Well, at least it did help me.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Well, at least it did help me.

MESSAGE.JP: ノートに筆を走らせながら、小毬さんのほうを見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I glanced over at Komari-san, whose pen was racing across her notebook.
MESSAGE.Translation: I glanced over at Komari-san, whose pen was racing across her notebook.

MESSAGE.JP: ノートは普通に取ってるみたいだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Looks like she's making notes as usual.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looks like she's making notes as usual.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（あれ、じゃあなんだこれ？）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Huh, what's this then?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Huh, what's this then?)

MESSAGE.JP: さっき一緒に渡されたノートを見る。
MESSAGE.EN: She had handed me a notebook together with the text book earlier.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had handed me a notebook together with the text book earlier.

MESSAGE.JP: 表紙は何も書かれていないが、割と長く使っているもののようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: There wasn't anything written on the cover, but, as far I could tell, it seemed like it had seen quite a bit of use.
MESSAGE.Translation: There wasn't anything written on the cover, but, as far I could tell, it seemed like it had seen quite a bit of use.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（…うーん、何のノートだろう）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Hm... What notes could these be...?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Hm... What notes could these be...?)

MESSAGE.JP: まあ、見ちゃまずそうだったら、すぐ読むの止めればいいかな…。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, if it turns out to be something I shouldn't be looking at, I'll stop right away...
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, if it turns out to be something I shouldn't be looking at, I'll stop right away...

MESSAGE.JP: 中を開く。
MESSAGE.EN: I opened it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I opened it.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（これ…絵本？）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(It's... a picture book?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(It's... a picture book?)

MESSAGE.JP: ノートの中には色鉛筆で彩色された動物のイラストや、いくつかの手書きの文章が描かれていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Inside were illustrations of various animals, drawn in color pencil, with hand-written text.
MESSAGE.Translation: Inside were illustrations of various animals, drawn in color pencil, with hand-written text.

MESSAGE.JP: なんだか子供受けしそうな可愛い絵だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed to be intended for kids, what with all the cute pictures.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed to be intended for kids, what with all the cute pictures.

MESSAGE.JP: …小毬さんの自作なんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Is this something Komari-san made?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Is this something Komari-san made?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（へえ、結構上手いな）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Hee, she's good.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Hee, she's good.)

MESSAGE.JP: ぺらぺらとめくりながらそんなことを思う。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought to myself while turning the pages.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought to myself while turning the pages.

MESSAGE.JP: がんばるぺんぎんさん
MESSAGE.EN: A penguin that tried his hardest.
MESSAGE.Translation: A penguin that tried his hardest.

MESSAGE.JP: あるところに、ぺんぎんさんが　いました。
MESSAGE.EN: Once upon a time, there was a penguin.
MESSAGE.Translation: Once upon a time, there was a penguin.

MESSAGE.JP: ぺんぎんさんは、どうぶつたちの　くらすまちに　すんでいました。
MESSAGE.EN: He lived in the animal city.
MESSAGE.Translation: He lived in the animal city.

MESSAGE.JP: まえにすんでいたところは、ぺんぎんさんの　なかまが　いっぱいいました。
MESSAGE.EN: He had lots of friends in the place where he used to live before.
MESSAGE.Translation: He had lots of friends in the place where he used to live before.

MESSAGE.JP: けれど、ぺんぎんさんは　もっといろんなどうぶつさんたちと　いっしょにいたかったのです。
MESSAGE.EN: But the penguin wanted to live together with many other animals.
MESSAGE.Translation: But the penguin wanted to live together with many other animals.

MESSAGE.JP: どうぶつさんたちの　すんでいるまちに　なつがきました。
MESSAGE.EN: Summer came to the animal city.
MESSAGE.Translation: Summer came to the animal city.

MESSAGE.JP: ぺんぎんさんは　とてもあつがりで、かわで　みずあびばかり　していました。
MESSAGE.EN: Penguin was very sensitive to heat, so he was always swimming in the river.
MESSAGE.Translation: Penguin was very sensitive to heat, so he was always swimming in the river.

MESSAGE.JP: そこにこいぬさんが　とおりかかります。
MESSAGE.EN: So it was when a puppy passed by there.
MESSAGE.Translation: So it was when a puppy passed by there.

MESSAGE.JP: 「やあ、ぺんぎんさん。いっしょに　おさんぽしないかい。」
MESSAGE.EN: ❝Hello, Penguin. Would you like to take a walk with me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝Hello, Penguin. Would you like to take a walk with me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: そとをあるく　こいぬさんは　とてもたのしそうです。
MESSAGE.EN: The puppy was taking a walk outside and was really enjoying it.
MESSAGE.Translation: The puppy was taking a walk outside and was really enjoying it.

MESSAGE.JP: 「ようし、ぼくも　そとを　おさんぽするぞ。」
MESSAGE.EN: ❝All right, I'll take a walk outside too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝All right, I'll take a walk outside too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぺんぎんさんは　みずあびをやめて、こいぬさんと　おさんぽすることにしました。
MESSAGE.EN: Penguin stopped swimming and went on a walk with Puppy.
MESSAGE.Translation: Penguin stopped swimming and went on a walk with Puppy.

MESSAGE.JP: 「うーん。」
MESSAGE.EN: ❝Mm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝Mm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぱったり。
MESSAGE.EN: He stopped.
MESSAGE.Translation: He stopped.

MESSAGE.JP: ぺんぎんさんは、あついのがにがてなので、とちゅうで　たおれてしまいました。
MESSAGE.EN: Penguin didn't like hot places, so he suddenly collapsed along the way.
MESSAGE.Translation: Penguin didn't like hot places, so he suddenly collapsed along the way.

MESSAGE.JP: 「だいじょうぶかい、ぺんぎんさん。」
MESSAGE.EN: ❝Are you okay, Penguin?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝Are you okay, Penguin?❞

MESSAGE.JP: こいぬさんは　ぺんぎんさんをたすけて、かわまで　はこんであげました。
MESSAGE.EN: Puppy saved Penguin by taking him to the river.
MESSAGE.Translation: Puppy saved Penguin by taking him to the river.

MESSAGE.JP: ぺんぎんさんは、また、かわでみずあびを　していました。
MESSAGE.EN: Penguin started swimming in the river again.
MESSAGE.Translation: Penguin started swimming in the river again.

MESSAGE.JP: ぐう。
MESSAGE.EN: Guu.
MESSAGE.Translation: Guu.

MESSAGE.JP: ながいこと　みずあびをしていたので、おなかが　すいてしまいました。
MESSAGE.EN: He kept on swimming for so long that his tummy started to rumble.
MESSAGE.Translation: He kept on swimming for so long that his tummy started to rumble.

MESSAGE.JP: そこにあらいぐまさんが　とおりかかります。
MESSAGE.EN: It was then that Raccoon passed by there.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was then that Raccoon passed by there.

MESSAGE.JP: 「やあ、ぺんぎんさん。いっしょに　くだものを　たべないかい。」
MESSAGE.EN: ❝Hello, Penguin. Would you like to eat fruits with me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝Hello, Penguin. Would you like to eat fruits with me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: あらいぐまさんは　じょうずに　てをつかって、くだものを　たべています。
MESSAGE.EN: Raccoon was skillfully using his paws to eat the fruit.
MESSAGE.Translation: Raccoon was skillfully using his paws to eat the fruit.

MESSAGE.JP: 「おいしそうだな。ようし、ぼくもたべよう。」
MESSAGE.EN: ❝It looks yummy. All right, I'll eat together with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝It looks yummy. All right, I'll eat together with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぺんぎんさんは　みずあびをやめて、あらいぐまさんと　くだものを　たべることにしました。
MESSAGE.EN: Penguin stopped swimming and started eating fruits together with Raccoon.
MESSAGE.Translation: Penguin stopped swimming and started eating fruits together with Raccoon.

MESSAGE.JP: 「あれれ。」
MESSAGE.EN: ❝Oh dear.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝Oh dear.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぺんぎんさんの　てでは　うまくものを　つかむことができません。
MESSAGE.EN: Penguin couldn't hold things well in his hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: Penguin couldn't hold things well in his hands.

MESSAGE.JP: つるり、と　てからすべって、くだものを　おとしてしまいました。
MESSAGE.EN: The fruit he tried holding in his hands slipped and fell on the ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: The fruit he tried holding in his hands slipped and fell on the ground.

MESSAGE.JP: 「ぺんぎんさんは、くだものを　たべられないんだね。」
MESSAGE.EN: ❝Penguin, you don't need to eat fruits, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝Penguin, you don't need to eat fruits, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: あらいぐまさんは　ぺんぎんさんを　なぐさめてあげました。
MESSAGE.EN: Raccoon comforted Penguin.
MESSAGE.Translation: Raccoon comforted Penguin.

MESSAGE.JP: ぺんぎんさんは　おさかなを　つかまえることにしました。
MESSAGE.EN: Penguin caught some fish for himself.
MESSAGE.Translation: Penguin caught some fish for himself.

MESSAGE.JP: おさかなを　つかまえるのは、とくいだったのです。いっぱい　つかまえました。
MESSAGE.EN: He was good at catching fish. He caught a whole lot of them.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was good at catching fish. He caught a whole lot of them.

MESSAGE.JP: けれど、つかまえすぎて、おうちに　もってかえることが　できません。
MESSAGE.EN: But, he caught too many and couldn't bring them home.
MESSAGE.Translation: But, he caught too many and couldn't bring them home.

MESSAGE.JP: そこにぺりかんさんが　とおりかかります。
MESSAGE.EN: It was then that Pelican passed by there.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was then that Pelican passed by there.

MESSAGE.JP: 「やあ、ぺんぎんさん。ぼくみたいに、くちのなかに、おさかなを　いれるといいよ。」
MESSAGE.EN: ❝Hello, Penguin. You should store fish in your mouth just like I do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝Hello, Penguin. You should store fish in your mouth just like I do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぺりかんさんの　くちのなかは、おさかなで　いっぱいです。
MESSAGE.EN: Pelican had a lot of fish inside his mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: Pelican had a lot of fish inside his mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: 「ようし、ぼくも　くちのなかに　いれよう。」
MESSAGE.EN: ❝All right, I'll put them in my mouth too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝All right, I'll put them in my mouth too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぺんぎんさんは　くちのなかに　おさかなを　いれることにしました。
MESSAGE.EN: Penguin tried putting the fishes inside his mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: Penguin tried putting the fishes inside his mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: 「むぎゅう。」
MESSAGE.EN: ❝Mugyu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝Mugyu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: けれど、ぺんぎんさんの　くちばしは、ぺりかんさんより　とてもちいさいです。
MESSAGE.EN: But, Penguin's beak was tiny compared to Pelican's.
MESSAGE.Translation: But, Penguin's beak was tiny compared to Pelican's.

MESSAGE.JP: ぺんぎんさんは、おさかなを、のどに　つまらせてしまいました。
MESSAGE.EN: His throat ended up packed with fish.
MESSAGE.Translation: His throat ended up packed with fish.

MESSAGE.JP: 「ごめんね、ぺんぎんさん。ぺんぎんさんには、おおきいくちが　ないんだね。」
MESSAGE.EN: ❝I'm sorry, Penguin. You don't have a big mouth, do you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝I'm sorry, Penguin. You don't have a big mouth, do you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぺりかんさんは、ぺんぎんさんに　あやまりました。
MESSAGE.EN: Pelican apologized to Penguin.
MESSAGE.Translation: Pelican apologized to Penguin.

MESSAGE.JP: ぺんぎんさんは、おうちに　かえることにしました。
MESSAGE.EN: Pelican took Penguin home.
MESSAGE.Translation: Pelican took Penguin home.

MESSAGE.JP: ぺたん、ぺたん。ぺんぎんさんは、あるくのも　たいへんそうです。
MESSAGE.EN: *Flap*, *flap*. It was hard for Penguin to walk.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Flap*, *flap*. It was hard for Penguin to walk.

MESSAGE.JP: そこに、こねこさんが　とおりかかりました。
MESSAGE.EN: That is when Kitten passed by there.
MESSAGE.Translation: That is when Kitten passed by there.

MESSAGE.JP: 「やあ、ぺんぎんさん。いっしょに　たんけんしないかい。」
MESSAGE.EN: ❝Hello, Penguin. Would you like to go on an expedition with me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝Hello, Penguin. Would you like to go on an expedition with me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: こねこさんは、いろんなところを、あるきまわっているみたいです。
MESSAGE.EN: Kitten seemed to be walking around and visiting many places.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kitten seemed to be walking around and visiting many places.

MESSAGE.JP: 「ぼくも、たんけんしたいな。ようし、いっしょにいこう。」
MESSAGE.EN: ❝I want to go on an expedition too. All right, let's go together.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝I want to go on an expedition too. All right, let's go together.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぺんぎんさんは、こねこさんに　ついていきます。
MESSAGE.EN: Penguin followed Kitten.
MESSAGE.Translation: Penguin followed Kitten.

MESSAGE.JP: 「うわあ。」
MESSAGE.EN: ❝Whoa.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝Whoa.❞

MESSAGE.JP: どしん。ぺんぎんさんは、ころんでしまいました。
MESSAGE.EN: *Thu-dump*. Penguin trips over.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Thu-dump*. Penguin trips over.

MESSAGE.JP: ぺんぎんさんは、こねこさんほど、はやくあるけません。いしにつまずいて　しまったのです。
MESSAGE.EN: Penguin couldn't walk as fast as Kitten. He tripped on a stone.
MESSAGE.Translation: Penguin couldn't walk as fast as Kitten. He tripped on a stone.

MESSAGE.JP: 「だいじょうぶかい、ぺんぎんさん。ぺんぎんさんは、だめな　ぺんぎんさんだなあ」
MESSAGE.EN: ❝Are you okay, Penguin? It doesn't seem you can do it well, Penguin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝Are you okay, Penguin? It doesn't seem you can do it well, Penguin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぺんぎんさんは、こねこさんに　わらわれてしまいました。
MESSAGE.EN: Penguin was mocked by Kitten.
MESSAGE.Translation: Penguin was mocked by Kitten.

MESSAGE.JP: 「ぼくは、だめなぺんぎんなんだ。」
MESSAGE.EN: ❝I'm a good-for-nothing penguin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝I'm a good-for-nothing penguin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぺんぎんさんは、しょんぼりしてしまいました。
MESSAGE.EN: Penguin was heartbroken.
MESSAGE.Translation: Penguin was heartbroken.

MESSAGE.JP: みんなほど　すごいことが、ぺんぎんさんにはできません。
MESSAGE.EN: Penguin couldn't do anything great like the others.
MESSAGE.Translation: Penguin couldn't do anything great like the others.

MESSAGE.JP: ぺんぎんさんは、およぐのが　とくいでしたが、どうぶつのまちには、ひろいうみもありません。
MESSAGE.EN: Penguin was good at swimming, but there wasn't a big sea in the animal city.
MESSAGE.Translation: Penguin was good at swimming, but there wasn't a big sea in the animal city.

MESSAGE.JP: 「どうしたんだい、ぺんぎんさん。」
MESSAGE.EN: ❝What's wrong, Penguin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝What's wrong, Penguin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぺんぎんさんに、おほしさまが　はなしかけました。
MESSAGE.EN: Star talked to Penguin.
MESSAGE.Translation: Star talked to Penguin.

MESSAGE.JP: 「ぼくには、すごいことなんて　なにもないんだ。」
MESSAGE.EN: ❝There isn't anything great that I can do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝There isn't anything great that I can do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 「ふうん、じゃあ、ぼくがすごいことを　させてあげるよ。」
MESSAGE.EN: ❝Mm, then, I'll let you do a great thing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝Mm, then, I'll let you do a great thing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぺんぎんさんは、おどろいてしまいました。
MESSAGE.EN: Penguin was surprised.
MESSAGE.Translation: Penguin was surprised.

MESSAGE.JP: 「ぼくのせなかにのって、おほしさまの　なかまにあいに　いかないかい。そんなことを　したぺんぎんさんは、ほかにいないよ。」
MESSAGE.EN: ❝I will let you ride on my back and take you to see my friends. There won't be anyone else who did such a thing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝I will let you ride on my back and take you to see my friends. There won't be anyone else who did such a thing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぺんぎんさんは、もっとおどろいてしまいました。
MESSAGE.EN: At this, Penguin became even more surprised.
MESSAGE.Translation: At this, Penguin became even more surprised.

MESSAGE.JP: 「それは、すごいや。でも、ちょっとこわいな。ようし」
MESSAGE.EN: ❝This is great. But, I'm a little scared. All right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝This is great. But, I'm a little scared. All right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぺんぎんさんは、がんばって　おほしさまのせなかに　のることにしました。
MESSAGE.EN: Penguin tried his hardest and climbed onto Star's back.
MESSAGE.Translation: Penguin tried his hardest and climbed onto Star's back.

MESSAGE.JP: おほしさまは、おそらへ、とびあがりました。
MESSAGE.EN: Star flew up in the sky.
MESSAGE.Translation: Star flew up in the sky.

MESSAGE.JP: 「ひゃあ」
MESSAGE.EN: ❝Hyaa.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝Hyaa.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぺんぎんさんは　びっくりしましたが、すごいことのために　がんばります。
MESSAGE.EN: Penguin was startled, but in order to do something great he tried his hardest.
MESSAGE.Translation: Penguin was startled, but in order to do something great he tried his hardest.

MESSAGE.JP: とちゅうで、こいぬさんにあいました。ぺんぎんさんは　てをふります。
MESSAGE.EN: Along the way, he flew past Puppy and waved his hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: Along the way, he flew past Puppy and waved his hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 「すごいやぺんぎんさん。ぼくは　そんなたかいところ、こわくていけないよ。」
MESSAGE.EN: ❝You're amazing, Penguin. I'd be afraid of such height and would never go up so high.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝You're amazing, Penguin. I'd be afraid of such height and would never go up so high.❞

MESSAGE.JP: あらいぐまさんにも　あいました。
MESSAGE.EN: He met Raccoon as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: He met Raccoon as well.

MESSAGE.JP: 「すごいやぺんぎんさん。ぼくはそんなはやいの、こわくておちちゃうよ。」
MESSAGE.EN: ❝You're amazing, Penguin. I'd be afraid of such speed and would fall down.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝You're amazing, Penguin. I'd be afraid of such speed and would fall down.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぺりかんさんにも　あいました。
MESSAGE.EN: He met Pelican as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: He met Pelican as well.

MESSAGE.JP: 「すごいやぺんぎんさん。ぼくには　そんなとおいところなんて　いけないよ。」
MESSAGE.EN: ❝You're amazing, Penguin. I can't go to such faraway places.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝You're amazing, Penguin. I can't go to such faraway places.❞

MESSAGE.JP: こねこさんにも　あいました。
MESSAGE.EN: He met Kitten as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: He met Kitten as well.

MESSAGE.JP: 「ぺんぎんさんは、ほんとうにすごいなあ。」
MESSAGE.EN: ❝Penguin, you're really amazing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝Penguin, you're really amazing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぺんぎんさんは、うれしくなりました。
MESSAGE.EN: Penguin became delighted.
MESSAGE.Translation: Penguin became delighted.

MESSAGE.JP: ぺんぎんさんはみんなにすごい、といってもらえました。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone was calling him amazing.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone was calling him amazing.

MESSAGE.JP: おほしさまのなかまたちと　いっしょに、ぺんぎんさんは、みんなに　てをふりました。
MESSAGE.EN: Together with Star's friends, Penguin waved at everyone.
MESSAGE.Translation: Together with Star's friends, Penguin waved at everyone.

MESSAGE.JP: 「がんばって、よかったな。」
MESSAGE.EN: ❝I'm glad I tried my hardest.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝I'm glad I tried my hardest.❞

MESSAGE.JP: おしまい
MESSAGE.EN: The end.
MESSAGE.Translation: The end.

MESSAGE.JP: ペンギンたちが住んでいる場所から、『どうぶつのまち』にきた一匹のペンギンの話らしい。
MESSAGE.EN: It appears to be a story about a penguin who lived with other animals in a place called ❛Animal City.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: It appears to be a story about a penguin who lived with other animals in a place called ❛Animal City.❜

MESSAGE.JP: ペンギンは何をやってもうまくいかなくて、子猫にまで馬鹿にされてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: No matter what he was doing, he couldn't do anything right, and even the children made fun of him.
MESSAGE.Translation: No matter what he was doing, he couldn't do anything right, and even the children made fun of him.

MESSAGE.JP: 「ぼくはだめなぺんぎんなんだ。」
MESSAGE.EN: ❝I'm a good-for-nothing penguin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝I'm a good-for-nothing penguin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: しょんぼりしているペンギンに、お星様が話しかける。
MESSAGE.EN: And so the heartbroken penguin talked to a star.
MESSAGE.Translation: And so the heartbroken penguin talked to a star.

MESSAGE.JP: お星様の国まで来たペンギンは今までひとりもいない。それをやったらみんなすごいと認めてくれる、と。
MESSAGE.EN: There wasn't anyone who had ever gone to the Star Country before. If he were to do that, everyone would acknowledge how great he was.
MESSAGE.Translation: There wasn't anyone who had ever gone to the Star Country before. If he were to do that, everyone would acknowledge how great he was.

MESSAGE.JP: ペンギンは勇気を出してお星様の国まで行き、みんなにすごいと認めてもらい、そこでおしまいらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: He gathered up all of his courage and travelled all way to the Star Country, and that's where the story seemed to end.
MESSAGE.Translation: He gathered up all of his courage and travelled all way to the Star Country, and that's where the story seemed to end.

MESSAGE.JP: 軽く読んでみよう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'll just skim through it...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'll just skim through it...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…なんというか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How should I put it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How should I put it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: このペンギンと小毬さんの姿がかぶって、妙におかしくなった。
MESSAGE.EN: The image of the penguin character merged with Komari-san's in my mind, giving me a funny feeling.
MESSAGE.Translation: The image of the penguin character merged with Komari-san's in my mind, giving me a funny feeling.

MESSAGE.JP: なんというか…すごく小毬さんらしい話だな。
MESSAGE.EN: How to put it... This story was so very much like Komari-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: How to put it... This story was so very much like Komari-san.

MESSAGE.JP: さらにいくつかの話を読んでいく。
MESSAGE.EN: I began reading some of the other stories.
MESSAGE.Translation: I began reading some of the other stories.

MESSAGE.JP: 『どうぶつのまち』はシリーズ化しているらしく、他にも同じような動物の話が何本かあった。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed to be turning into an ❛Animal City❜ series, with similar stories featuring different animals.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed to be turning into an ❛Animal City❜ series, with similar stories featuring different animals.

MESSAGE.JP: …どうやら、どれも登場キャラクターは何かしらの動物になっているようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It looked like all of the characters appearing in the book were animals.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It looked like all of the characters appearing in the book were animals.

MESSAGE.JP: その中に、動物以外のキャラクターが出ている話を発見する。
MESSAGE.EN: But I came across one story that had characters other than animals.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I came across one story that had characters other than animals.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（あ、これはなんか他のと毛色が違うな）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Ah, this one seems to be giving off a different vibe.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Ah, this one seems to be giving off a different vibe.)

MESSAGE.JP: 森の中に住んでいた８人の小人と、そこに訪れた男の子と女の子の話らしい。
MESSAGE.EN: It looked to be a story about a forest, where eight dwarves lived, and to which, one day, a girl and a boy made a journey.
MESSAGE.Translation: It looked to be a story about a forest, where eight dwarves lived, and to which, one day, a girl and a boy made a journey.

MESSAGE.JP: そのふたりの訪問者が、森に住む小人さんたちの悩みをひとつずつ解決していく、という内容のようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The story revolved around how they solved different problems the dwarves were facing.
MESSAGE.Translation: The story revolved around how they solved different problems the dwarves were facing.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …まだこれは途中みたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It wasn't finished yet.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It wasn't finished yet.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ていうか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And actually...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And actually...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「これを間違えて渡すとか、小毬さんらしいというか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Giving me this by mistake sure is something only Komari-san would do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Giving me this by mistake sure is something only Komari-san would do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 事実を知ったときの小毬さんのうろたえぶりが目に浮かんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I could almost imagine what kind of expression she would make once she discovered what had happened.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could almost imagine what kind of expression she would make once she discovered what had happened.

MESSAGE.JP: あれを教室でやられると、恥ずかしいのはこっちになる気がする…。
MESSAGE.EN: But if I returned it during class, the one feeling embarrassed would be me...
MESSAGE.Translation: But if I returned it during class, the one feeling embarrassed would be me...

MESSAGE.JP: 授業終了、途端にざわめきだす教室内。
MESSAGE.EN: Just as the lesson came to an end, the usual liveliness returned to the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just as the lesson came to an end, the usual liveliness returned to the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…小毬さん、これ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Komari-san, here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Komari-san, here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 教科書とノートを返しに小毬さんの席に向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: I walked over to her seat to return her textbook and notes.
MESSAGE.Translation: I walked over to her seat to return her textbook and notes.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あ、だいじょうぶでよかったね、指されても」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ah, isn't it great how I was okay even though I got called on.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ah, isn't it great how I was okay even though I got called on.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、小毬さんがだいじょうぶじゃなかったけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, you weren't really okay though...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, you weren't really okay though...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「そんなことないよ。全然平気」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝That's not true. I was perfectly fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝That's not true. I was perfectly fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「りんちゃんが教科書見せてくれたし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Rin-chan let me see her textbook.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Rin-chan let me see her textbook.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 自分が損な役回りばかりしているのに気付いているのだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder, has she never considered that she might be sacrificing too much helping other people?
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder, has she never considered that she might be sacrificing too much helping other people?

MESSAGE.JP: ひとまず教科書とノートを手渡す。
MESSAGE.EN: I handed the textbook and notes back to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I handed the textbook and notes back to her.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あれ、このノート」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Huh, this notebook.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Huh, this notebook.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ああ、なんか一緒に渡されたんだけどさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Aah, this is something you gave me along with everything else.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Aah, this is something you gave me along with everything else.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふええええっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fueee!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fueee!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ああ、やっぱりこうなるのか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Aah, I knew she'd react like this...
MESSAGE.Translation: Aah, I knew she'd react like this...

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うあーん、これまだ途中なのに～…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Uoon, this isn't finished yet～...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Uoon, this isn't finished yet～...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや別に恥ずかしいことじゃ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, it's not something to get embarrassed about.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, it's not something to get embarrassed about.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「え？　うん、恥ずかしくはないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Eh? Yep, I'm not embarrassed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Eh? Yep, I'm not embarrassed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、あれ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「こういうのって、人に見られたら恥ずかしそうだって思ったけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I thought you'd be embarrassed if somebody saw this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I thought you'd be embarrassed if somebody saw this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「理樹君、それは違いますよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Riki-kun, you're wrong～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Riki-kun, you're wrong～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「人に見てもらいたいから描くんだよ、こういうの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I'm drawing this because I want others to see it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I'm drawing this because I want others to see it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…そんなもんなの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Is that so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Is that so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、そんなもんなのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yep, it is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yep, it is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「理樹君は恥ずかしがり屋さんだから、そう思うのかもしれないね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝You're a shy person, Riki-kun, that's probably why you thought so.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝You're a shy person, Riki-kun, that's probably why you thought so.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Mmh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Mmh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 見てもらいたいから描く。
MESSAGE.EN: She's drawing this because she wants others to see it.
MESSAGE.Translation: She's drawing this because she wants others to see it.

MESSAGE.JP: 言われてみればそうかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: If I think about it like that, she's probably right.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I think about it like that, she's probably right.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「えへへ、あんまり見てくれる人もいないけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ehehe, not many have seen it yet, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ehehe, not many have seen it yet, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そこは照れくさそうに言う。
MESSAGE.EN: She said bashfully.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said bashfully.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕は結構好きだけどね、そういうの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I liked it a lot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I liked it a lot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんか、ほほえましいって言うかほのぼのって言うか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It was, well, charming, or I should rather say, heartwarming...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It was, well, charming, or I should rather say, heartwarming...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「小毬さんらしいと思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think it's really like you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think it's really like you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「え、そ、そうかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Eh, y, you think so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Eh, y, you think so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「…うあーん、やっぱり途中だったのがもったいない～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝...Uaa～n, such a waste, though... it's not finished yet～...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝...Uaa～n, such a waste, though... it's not finished yet～...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれ、でもこれって、もう先の話とか出来てるんじゃないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh, but well, aren't the earlier stories complete?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh, but well, aren't the earlier stories complete?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ううん、全然まだだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Nope, that's just the beginning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Nope, that's just the beginning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「…いつ出来るかは、全然わかんないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝...I have no idea when I can finish them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝...I have no idea when I can finish them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、出来たら読ませてよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let me read them once you're done.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let me read them once you're done.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、約束」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yep, it's a promise.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yep, it's a promise.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ハリセンボンさん用意しておきますね～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Mr. Balloon Fish is getting prepared～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Mr. Balloon Fish is getting prepared～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …いや、それは飲み込めない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Nope, I've got no idea what you're talking about.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Nope, I've got no idea what you're talking about.

MESSAGE.JP: そこで携帯がメールを受信する。
MESSAGE.EN: At that point, I received a text.
MESSAGE.Translation: At that point, I received a text.

MESSAGE.JP: そっと確認すると、朱鷺戸さんからの呼び出しだった。
MESSAGE.EN: When I checked, I saw it was Tokido-san calling me out.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I checked, I saw it was Tokido-san calling me out.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「理樹君、なにかご用事？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Riki-kun, do you have something you need to do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Riki-kun, do you have something you need to do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、話の途中でごめん。ちょっと出てくる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah. Sorry for leaving mid-conversation, but I've gotta go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah. Sorry for leaving mid-conversation, but I've gotta go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「わかったよー。どうぞごゆっくり～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝It's fine. Take your time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝It's fine. Take your time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「というわけで、理樹くんにもう一度囮役をお願いしたいんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝And so, I want you to play the bait again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝And so, I want you to play the bait again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「了解」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Understood.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Understood.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「わーい！
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Awesome!
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Awesome!

MESSAGE.JP: って、また僕!?」
MESSAGE.EN: Wait, me again!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Wait, me again!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「うわ、また来たか、やっつけなノリツッコミ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Woah, there you go again. Playing off of yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Woah, there you go again. Playing off of yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「あのね。あなたは、あたしのパートナーなんでしょ。自覚ある？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Hey. You are my partner. You know that, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Hey. You are my partner. You know that, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あるさ。ただ、たまにはだだをこねてみたくなるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah. But sometimes I just feel like throwing a tantrum.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah. But sometimes I just feel like throwing a tantrum.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「じゃ、了解なのね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝So, you understand?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝So, you understand?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そりゃ、僕の務めだもの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, that's my job.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, that's my job.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「いい子ね。言うこときく子は好きよ。ただノリツッコミはどうかと思うけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Good boy. I like it when kids do as they're told. The playing off of yourself is a little weird, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Good boy. I like it when kids do as they're told. The playing off of yourself is a little weird, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「で、いくつか覚えてて欲しいんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝So, I want you to remember a few things.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝So, I want you to remember a few things.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「謹んで遠慮するよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I respectfully decline...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I respectfully decline...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「あれくらいでへこたれちゃ駄目よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Don't lose heart so quickly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Don't lose heart so quickly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「面白がってるでしょ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm just amusing myself...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm just amusing myself...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕のぼやきも聞いてない風だ。
MESSAGE.EN: My words fell on deaf ears.
MESSAGE.Translation: My words fell on deaf ears.

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「いいわ。で、いくつか覚えてて欲しいんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Okay, so, I want you to remember a few things.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Okay, so, I want you to remember a few things.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「この学校にスパイが潜んでるのは話したわよね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝I told you there were spies lurking in the school, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝I told you there were spies lurking in the school, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、前に少なくとも４人はいるって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, you said there are at least four.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, you said there are at least four.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「でもね、昨日全部倒したから、敵がわからないの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝But yesterday I defeated them all, so now I don't know who the enemy is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝But yesterday I defeated them all, so now I don't know who the enemy is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いなくなったんじゃなくて？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you sure there just aren't any?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you sure there just aren't any?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「日本は特殊だから潜みにくいのは確かね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Japan is special, so it definitely is harder to hide.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Japan is special, so it definitely is harder to hide.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「でも、重要性から考えると、カバー役で誰かが潜入していると考えるのが妥当なの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝But considering how serious this is, it's best to assume that someone has successfully infiltrated with their cover intact.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝But considering how serious this is, it's best to assume that someone has successfully infiltrated with their cover intact.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「おそらく、あたしも知らない味方までいると思うわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝There's good chance one of my comrades is here, even though I wouldn't know who they were.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝There's good chance one of my comrades is here, even though I wouldn't know who they were.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「味方…それも知らないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A comrade... that you wouldn't know?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A comrade... that you wouldn't know?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「ええ、知らないわ。あたしが知ってるのは、上司との連絡方法だけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Yeah, one I wouldn't know. All I know is how to get hold of my boss.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Yeah, one I wouldn't know. All I know is how to get hold of my boss.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんで？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「知らないことは話せないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝I can't tell people things I don't know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝I can't tell people things I don't know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「必要なこと以外は知らない方が安全なのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝It's safer if I don't know any more than I need to.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝It's safer if I don't know any more than I need to.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「どんな人間でも拷問されたら喋るわ。情報が漏れれば、自分以外の人間が死ぬの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Anybody can be made to talk under torture. If I give up information, people will die.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Anybody can be made to talk under torture. If I give up information, people will die.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「だから、現場には必要な情報しか渡さない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝That's why they only give necessary information to people on scene.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝That's why they only give necessary information to people on scene.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 背筋が薄ら寒くなるが、穏やかな言い方は変わらない。
MESSAGE.EN: A chill ran down my spine, but my calm way of talking didn't change.
MESSAGE.Translation: A chill ran down my spine, but my calm way of talking didn't change.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも…僕にはいろいろと教えてくれるんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But... you've told me all sorts of things.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But... you've told me all sorts of things.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「…あたしには理樹くんが必要だから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝...Because I need you, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝...Because I need you, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「なんでもないわ、気にしないで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Nothing. Don't worry about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Nothing. Don't worry about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「それより、作戦を説明するわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝More importantly, let me explain the plan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝More importantly, let me explain the plan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何をしたらいいのかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What should I do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What should I do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「簡単なことよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝It's simple.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝It's simple.❞

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず、教室まで戻ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: For the time being, I went back to the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: For the time being, I went back to the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: あまりすることはないが、しばらくは待機。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't have much to do, but I had a while to wait.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't have much to do, but I had a while to wait.

MESSAGE.JP: 手にはトランプのようなカードの束。
MESSAGE.EN: In my hand was a bundle of cards that resembled playing cards.
MESSAGE.Translation: In my hand was a bundle of cards that resembled playing cards.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸さんのお手製。中には様々な行動が書かれていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Tokido-san had made them. A number of different actions were written on them.
MESSAGE.Translation: Tokido-san had made them. A number of different actions were written on them.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は言われた通り、休憩が終わる寸前にめくった。
MESSAGE.EN: Like I was told, I flipped them over when the break was over.
MESSAGE.Translation: Like I was told, I flipped them over when the break was over.

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「いい？　あなたの行動は監視されていると仮定して」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Okay? Let's assume that your actions are being monitored.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Okay? Let's assume that your actions are being monitored.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「もしかしたら無駄な行動かも知れないけど、そこは我慢して」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝These instructions may not tell you to do anything meaningful, but don't worry about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝These instructions may not tell you to do anything meaningful, but don't worry about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「もし相手が理樹くんを狙ってるなら、まずは行動パターンを把握しようとするわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝If the enemy is targeting you, the first thing they'll try to do is learn your behaviors and patterns.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝If the enemy is targeting you, the first thing they'll try to do is learn your behaviors and patterns.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「その上で、監視要員が何人必要かを割り出すの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Based on that, they'll determine how many people would be needed for surveillance.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Based on that, they'll determine how many people would be needed for surveillance.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「前の一件で敵の人員が減ったから、補充しようとするか、外から監視するわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Because their numbers were thinned in the last incident, they'll have to replace them or conduct surveillance from outside.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Because their numbers were thinned in the last incident, they'll have to replace them or conduct surveillance from outside.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「学校はカリキュラムが決まっているし、行動もかなり限定されるから、相手はそこまで大掛かりな監視は行わないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝The school's curriculum is fixed and the students' actions are pretty restricted, so they won't need to pull out all the stops.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝The school's curriculum is fixed and the students' actions are pretty restricted, so they won't need to pull out all the stops.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「大掛かりって？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝All the stops?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝All the stops?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「そうね…一人の敵を見張るのに三十人投入することもあるわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Yep. There are times when there are 30 agents to watch one enemy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Yep. There are times when there are 30 agents to watch one enemy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんなに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No way...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No way...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「相手も車なら、車やバイクも数台必要だし作戦指揮を行う簡易の司令部も用意する」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝If the target is traveling by car, you'd need to be ready with cars, motorcycles, as have a conveniently located operational headquarters.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝If the target is traveling by car, you'd need to be ready with cars, motorcycles, as have a conveniently located operational headquarters.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「常に複数のカメラとビデオで相手をモニタリングすることもあるわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Usually you'd also have a number of cameras and video recorders to monitor the target too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Usually you'd also have a number of cameras and video recorders to monitor the target too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「電話は全て盗聴され、郵便物もわからないように開封される」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝All of your phone calls are tapped and your mail is opened without your knowledge.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝All of your phone calls are tapped and your mail is opened without your knowledge.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「留守中を見計らって、自分の部屋は必ず捜索される」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝While you're away, they definitely search your room.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝While you're away, they definitely search your room.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「それらを全て積み重ねて、相手の移動先、接触する人間、行動パターンを洗い出すの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝They do all that to understand where you go, the people you know, and your behavioral patterns.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝They do all that to understand where you go, the people you know, and your behavioral patterns.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「２週間もあれば、理樹くんの全てが一冊のファイルに納まるわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝In two weeks, they'll compile everything about you in a single file.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝In two weeks, they'll compile everything about you in a single file.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「本気になった組織から逃げ出せる者はほとんどいない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝There aren't many people who can escape from an organization that takes its surveillance seriously.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝There aren't many people who can escape from an organization that takes its surveillance seriously.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wow...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wow...❞

MESSAGE.JP: プライバシーもへったくれもあったものじゃない…。
MESSAGE.EN: There goes any privacy I had...
MESSAGE.Translation: There goes any privacy I had...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なら、どうするの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, what should I do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, what should I do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「でも、包囲網はまだ完成されてないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝The net hasn't been completely set yet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝The net hasn't been completely set yet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「だから、偶然を借りて行動するの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝So we'll take this chance to act.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝So we'll take this chance to act.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「このカードには様々な指示が書かれてるわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝There are a bunch of directions written on those cards.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝There are a bunch of directions written on those cards.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「相手は理樹くんの行動パターンを把握して、弱みや隙、協力者を探そうとしてる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝The enemy will try and learn your behavior patterns and find any weaknesses, openings, or associates.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝The enemy will try and learn your behavior patterns and find any weaknesses, openings, or associates.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「だから、カードをシャッフルしてランダムに行動するの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝So you'll shuffle the cards and carry out what is written on them so your actions will be randomized.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝So you'll shuffle the cards and carry out what is written on them so your actions will be randomized.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「一度に三枚めくって。書かれた内容を連続して行う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Turn over three at a time. Then do what's written in that order.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Turn over three at a time. Then do what's written in that order.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「がんばってね、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Good luck, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Good luck, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「まあ、ゲームだと思って、気楽に考えることね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Well, if you think of it as a game, it could be fun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Well, if you think of it as a game, it could be fun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「じゃ、ゲームスタート」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝So, game start!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝So, game start!❞

MESSAGE.JP: …というわけで、僕は朱鷺戸さんからもらったカードに従って行動することになった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...With that, it was decided that I would follow the directions on the cards I got from Tokido-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...With that, it was decided that I would follow the directions on the cards I got from Tokido-san.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、いつの間にこんなカードを作ったんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: But when did she have time to make these?
MESSAGE.Translation: But when did she have time to make these?

MESSAGE.JP: めくったカードには、わざわざ手書きで文章が書かれている。
MESSAGE.EN: There were carefully handwritten sentences on the cards I turned over.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were carefully handwritten sentences on the cards I turned over.

MESSAGE.JP: 端正だけど、やや小さなかわいらしい文字だ。
MESSAGE.EN: The characters were graceful, but also a little small and cute.
MESSAGE.Translation: The characters were graceful, but also a little small and cute.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枚を表に向ける。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked at three of them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked at three of them.

MESSAGE.JP: 出た内容はと…。
MESSAGE.EN: Written on them was...
MESSAGE.Translation: Written on them was...

MESSAGE.JP: 『トイレに行き２分篭る』『全速力で廊下を走って階段を下りる』『誰かに体当たりする』
MESSAGE.EN: [Go to the bathroom and stay in a stall for two minutes.][Run down the hallway at full speed and head downstairs.][Slam into someone.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Go to the bathroom and stay in a stall for two minutes.][Run down the hallway at full speed and head downstairs.][Slam into someone.]

MESSAGE.JP: …どうしたものやら。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Those were my orders.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Those were my orders.

MESSAGE.JP: まずはトイレに行くとしようか。
MESSAGE.EN: Guess I'll go to the bathroom first.
MESSAGE.Translation: Guess I'll go to the bathroom first.

MESSAGE.JP: こもってみた…。
MESSAGE.EN: I went in a stall...
MESSAGE.Translation: I went in a stall...

MESSAGE.JP: ときおり小用を足す人の気配がする。
MESSAGE.EN: I occasionally sensed someone take a leak.
MESSAGE.Translation: I occasionally sensed someone take a leak.

MESSAGE.JP: 時計を見ながら、２分間待ってみた。
MESSAGE.EN: I watched the clock and waited for two minutes.
MESSAGE.Translation: I watched the clock and waited for two minutes.

MESSAGE.JP: で、次は廊下をと…。
MESSAGE.EN: Okay, next is the hallway...
MESSAGE.Translation: Okay, next is the hallway...

MESSAGE.JP: いきなりダッシュして、反対側の階段まで走り出した。
MESSAGE.EN: I suddenly broke out in a dash and ran to the staircase on the other side of the hall.
MESSAGE.Translation: I suddenly broke out in a dash and ran to the staircase on the other side of the hall.

MESSAGE.JP: 何人かが何事かと僕を見る。
MESSAGE.EN: A lot of people looked at me suspiciously.
MESSAGE.Translation: A lot of people looked at me suspiciously.

MESSAGE.JP: 恥ずかしい…。
MESSAGE.EN: So embarrassing...
MESSAGE.Translation: So embarrassing...

MESSAGE.JP: 逃げるように階段を何段か飛ばしながら、一階まで降り続けた。
MESSAGE.EN: I leaped down the stairs a few steps at a time like I was running away from something and continued down to the first floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: I leaped down the stairs a few steps at a time like I was running away from something and continued down to the first floor.

MESSAGE.JP: 次は誰かに体当たりしないといけないんだけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: Next I needed to slam into someone...
MESSAGE.Translation: Next I needed to slam into someone...

MESSAGE.JP: 真人でいいか。
MESSAGE.EN: Would Masato be okay?
MESSAGE.Translation: Would Masato be okay?

MESSAGE.JP: 怪我しそうにないし。
MESSAGE.EN: It wouldn't hurt him.
MESSAGE.Translation: It wouldn't hurt him.

MESSAGE.JP: で、真人は…と。
MESSAGE.EN: Okay, I'll go with Masato...
MESSAGE.Translation: Okay, I'll go with Masato...

MESSAGE.JP: いたいた。
MESSAGE.EN: There he is.
MESSAGE.Translation: There he is.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「真人」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ん？　どうした？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Huh? What's wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Huh? What's wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: どんっ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Bam.*
MESSAGE.Translation: *Bam.*

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわぁっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Woah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Woah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 跳ね返されてしまった…。
MESSAGE.EN: I was sent flying back...
MESSAGE.Translation: I was sent flying back...

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「へぇ…いい遊びを思いついたもんだな。一対一の筋肉おしくらまんじゅうか！　今度はこっちからいくぜっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Heh... I got a good idea for a game. One on one chest bumping! It's my turn now!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Heh... I got a good idea for a game. One on one chest bumping! It's my turn now!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人が僕に向かって飛びかかる！
MESSAGE.EN: Masato came flying toward me!
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato came flying toward me!

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「圧死しますから！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You'll crush me to death!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You'll crush me to death!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 一目散に立ち去った。
MESSAGE.EN: I moved out of the way as quickly as possible.
MESSAGE.Translation: I moved out of the way as quickly as possible.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うわあああああぁぁぁぁぁぁぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uwaaaaaaaaaah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uwaaaaaaaaaah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はぁ、はぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haa, haa...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haa, haa...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人から逃げるのに手こずってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: I had a hard time getting away from him.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had a hard time getting away from him.

MESSAGE.JP: その真人は階段から転げ落ちていった。まあ…大丈夫だと思う…。
MESSAGE.EN: He had fallen down the stairs. Well... he'll probably be okay...
MESSAGE.Translation: He had fallen down the stairs. Well... he'll probably be okay...

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「おつかれさま」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Good work.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Good work.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸さんが僕の後ろに現れる。
MESSAGE.EN: Tokido-san appeared behind me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Tokido-san appeared behind me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「本当にこれでいいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is this really going to work?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is this really going to work?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「ええ、上手くこなしてるわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Yeah, it's going great.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Yeah, it's going great.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ところで朱鷺戸さんって、どこで僕を見張ってるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝By the way, where were you watching me from?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝By the way, where were you watching me from?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「それは教えない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝I'm not going to tell you that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝I'm not going to tell you that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「だって教えたらあたしの方を向くでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝If I told you, you'd look in my direction.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝If I told you, you'd look in my direction.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「スパイがもっとも警戒するのは目線なの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Spies are extremely sensitive to glances.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Spies are extremely sensitive to glances.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「必要のないところで必要のないものを見るって、結構目立つのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Something unnecessary in an unnecessary place stands out quite a bit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Something unnecessary in an unnecessary place stands out quite a bit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なるほど…。
MESSAGE.EN: I see...
MESSAGE.Translation: I see...

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あれ、りんちゃん、なにかご用事？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Huh, Rin-chan, did you want something?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Huh, Rin-chan, did you want something?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「後でもいいんだが、大丈夫か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Is that okay? This can wait until later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Is that okay? This can wait until later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「こっちの話は今終わったところだから、どうぞ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝We've just finished talking, so go ahead～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝We've just finished talking, so go ahead～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「理樹、いくぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki, let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki, let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんだっけ？
MESSAGE.EN: What's this about?
MESSAGE.Translation: What's this about?

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は記憶をたぐり寄せる。
MESSAGE.EN: I racked my memory, and then I remembered.
MESSAGE.Translation: I racked my memory, and then I remembered.

MESSAGE.JP: …２−Ａ１番の恋患いを癒せ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Heal 2-A1 from lovesickness.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Heal 2-A1 from lovesickness.

MESSAGE.JP: 紙切れの文字を思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I recalled the contents of that scrap of paper.
MESSAGE.Translation: I recalled the contents of that scrap of paper.

MESSAGE.JP: 今鈴に課せられているのは恋の仲介役だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin was now entrusted with the role of matchmaker.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin was now entrusted with the role of matchmaker.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕のいないところでは勝手なことはしない約束だったから、鈴はこうして来たんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: We made a promise that she wouldn't do anything when I wasn't around, that's why she was standing here now.
MESSAGE.Translation: We made a promise that she wouldn't do anything when I wasn't around, that's why she was standing here now.

MESSAGE.JP: 振り返ると、鈴が無言で頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned around, and Rin nodded at me without saying a word.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned around, and Rin nodded at me without saying a word.

MESSAGE.JP: なんだっけ？
MESSAGE.EN: What's this about?
MESSAGE.Translation: What's this about?

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は記憶をたぐり寄せる。
MESSAGE.EN: I racked my memory, and then I remembered.
MESSAGE.Translation: I racked my memory, and then I remembered.

MESSAGE.JP: …２−Ａ１番の恋患いを癒せ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Heal 2-A1 from lovesickness.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Heal 2-A1 from lovesickness.

MESSAGE.JP: 紙切れの文字を思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I recalled the contents of that scrap of paper.
MESSAGE.Translation: I recalled the contents of that scrap of paper.

MESSAGE.JP: 今鈴に課せられているのは恋の仲介役だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin was now entrusted with the role of matchmaker.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin was now entrusted with the role of matchmaker.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕のいないところでは勝手なことはしない約束だったから、鈴はこうして待っていたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: We made a promise that she wouldn't do anything when I wasn't around, that's why she was standing here now.
MESSAGE.Translation: We made a promise that she wouldn't do anything when I wasn't around, that's why she was standing here now.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「用があるから、じゃあね、小毬さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I have something to do, so see you later, Komari-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I have something to do, so see you later, Komari-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、何かわからないけど、がんばってね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yep, I don't really get it, but good luck.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yep, I don't really get it, but good luck.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんに見送られ、僕は鈴と教室を後にした。
MESSAGE.EN: She saw us off, as we quickly left the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: She saw us off, as we quickly left the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「で、何から始めるんだっけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, how do we begin?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, how do we begin?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あたしがざざみから趣味とか理想の男を聞き出す。知り合いだからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I will ask Zazami about stuff - her hobbies and her type of guy. Because we know each other.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I will ask Zazami about stuff - her hobbies and her type of guy. Because we know each other.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それを２−Ａの相川くんに教えてあげるんだったね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And then you'll relay it to Aikawa-kun from 2-A, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And then you'll relay it to Aikawa-kun from 2-A, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「っと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 足が滑る。足を開いて、すんでの所で転けずに済んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: My foot slipped. I did the splits, barely keeping myself from falling.
MESSAGE.Translation: My foot slipped. I did the splits, barely keeping myself from falling.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんか廊下、ワックスで磨いた後なのかな。滑りやすいね。気をつけなよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's like the corridor's polished with wax. The floor's really slippery, so watch out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's like the corridor's polished with wax. The floor's really slippery, so watch out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は構うことなくすたすたと歩いていく。
MESSAGE.EN: She paid no heed to my words, hastily walking ahead.
MESSAGE.Translation: She paid no heed to my words, hastily walking ahead.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「いた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It's her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It's her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴が急に止まる。
MESSAGE.EN: She suddenly came to a halt.
MESSAGE.Translation: She suddenly came to a halt.

MESSAGE.JP: ふたり隠れて、様子を伺う。
MESSAGE.EN: We hid ourselves, observing the situation.
MESSAGE.Translation: We hid ourselves, observing the situation.

MESSAGE.JP: ４人の女子生徒と共に廊下を歩く後ろ姿があった（あの髪型は後ろ姿だけでそれとわかる）。
MESSAGE.EN: We saw her from behind, walking along the corridor with four other girls (even from behind, it was easy to tell it was her, thanks to that hairstyle of hers).
MESSAGE.Translation: We saw her from behind, walking along the corridor with four other girls (even from behind, it was easy to tell it was her, thanks to that hairstyle of hers).

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「相変わらず取り巻きに囲われてるな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝She's surrounded by her minions like always.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝She's surrounded by her minions like always.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「とてもえらっそうだ。慕われているというより、従えてるな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝All high-and-mighty. It's not as if she's liked by them, but more like they simply obey her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝All high-and-mighty. It's not as if she's liked by them, but more like they simply obey her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、転けた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, she fell.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, she fell.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 取り巻きのひとりが滑って尻餅をついていた。
MESSAGE.EN: One of her followers slipped and toppled onto her back.
MESSAGE.Translation: One of her followers slipped and toppled onto her back.

MESSAGE.JP: さて…笹瀬川さんはどういった反応をするんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Now... how will Sasasegawa-san react?
MESSAGE.Translation: Now... how will Sasasegawa-san react?

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「おーーーほっほっほっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Ah-ha-ha-ha!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Ah-ha-ha-ha!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 高笑いしていた！
MESSAGE.EN: She laughed out loud.
MESSAGE.Translation: She laughed out loud.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「絵に描いたように笑うな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What over-the-top stereotypical laughter...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What over-the-top stereotypical laughter...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そんな軽い腰では、レギュラーなんてほど遠くてよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝If you keep acting like that, you can only dream of becoming a regular.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝If you keep acting like that, you can only dream of becoming a regular.❞

MESSAGE.JP: それだけを言い捨てて、先をいく。
MESSAGE.EN: She said that and simply continued walking.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said that and simply continued walking.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ったく、あいつは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Geez, what a character...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Geez, what a character...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴がひょこっと出ていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin dashed out.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin dashed out.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、尻餅をついたままの女子生徒に手を差し伸べ、無言のまま引っ張り上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: She held out her hand to the girl who was lying on the floor and helped her up.
MESSAGE.Translation: She held out her hand to the girl who was lying on the floor and helped her up.

MESSAGE.JP: `女生徒@「ありがとうございます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Student@❝Thanks a lot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Student@❝Thanks a lot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…気をつけろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Be careful.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Be careful.❞

MESSAGE.JP: むすっとしたままそれだけを言った。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin's expression was stern as she said this.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin's expression was stern as she said this.

MESSAGE.JP: その前では、取り巻きのひとりが笹瀬川さんの肩を叩いて、その状況を知らせようとしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Ahead of them, one of Sasasegawa-san's followers tapped her on the shoulder to inform her of the incident.
MESSAGE.Translation: Ahead of them, one of Sasasegawa-san's followers tapped her on the shoulder to inform her of the incident.

MESSAGE.JP: 笹瀬川さんが振り返り、鈴の姿を認める。
MESSAGE.EN: Sasasegawa-san turned around until Rin came into her line of sight.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sasasegawa-san turned around until Rin came into her line of sight.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「棗鈴っ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Rin Natsume!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Rin Natsume!❞

MESSAGE.JP: いつもと逆のパターンだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: It was the reverse of their normal encounter...
MESSAGE.Translation: It was the reverse of their normal encounter...

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あなた、わたくしの後輩たちを懐柔でもしようというおつもり!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Are you trying to win favor with my underclassman!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Are you trying to win favor with my underclassman!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女生徒@「佐々美先輩、ソフトボール部の危機です！　今度こそやっつけてしまいましょう！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Student@❝Sasami-senpai, our softball club's in trouble! We need to put an end to this once and for all!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Student@❝Sasami-senpai, our softball club's in trouble! We need to put an end to this once and for all!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「臨むところだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That's all I could ask for.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That's all I could ask for.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「臨んだらダメだよ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's not what you should be asking for!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's not what you should be asking for!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あ、そうだった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Ah, you're right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Ah, you're right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「悪いが今回はバトルはなしだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Sorry, but it's not a battle this time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Sorry, but it's not a battle this time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「なしとかありとかという問題ではなくてよ！　これはソフトボール部の存続を賭けた抗争よ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Whether it's a battle or not isn't the issue here! This is a vendetta with the future of our softball club at stake!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Whether it's a battle or not isn't the issue here! This is a vendetta with the future of our softball club at stake!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「いや、懐柔なんてしてない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝No, I wasn't trying to win anyone's favor.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝No, I wasn't trying to win anyone's favor.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 笹瀬川さんは、転けた女子に顔を向ける。
MESSAGE.EN: Sasasegawa-san turned to face the student who had fallen earlier.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sasasegawa-san turned to face the student who had fallen earlier.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あなた、どうなの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You, report.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You, report.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女生徒@「僭越ながら…佐々美先輩、棗先輩は…とても優しい方です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Student@❝She might be impudent, but... Sasami-senpai, Natsume-senpai's... a very kind person.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Student@❝She might be impudent, but... Sasami-senpai, Natsume-senpai's... a very kind person.❞

MESSAGE.JP: みごとに懐柔されていた！
MESSAGE.EN: She perfectly won her favor!
MESSAGE.Translation: She perfectly won her favor!

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「見たこと…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝See what you have done...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝See what you have done...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 怒りで震えている。
MESSAGE.EN: She was trembling with rage.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was trembling with rage.

MESSAGE.JP: `女生徒@「ですが、私、加藤多香子は、佐々美先輩にお付き添いする気持ちは決して揺るぎません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Student@❝However, my, Takako Katou's determination to escort Sasami-senpai is unwavering.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Student@❝However, my, Takako Katou's determination to escort Sasami-senpai is unwavering.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「だそうだ。よかったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You heard her. Good for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You heard her. Good for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: さらにぷるぷるとその肩が震えている…。
MESSAGE.EN: Her shoulders trembled even more than before...
MESSAGE.Translation: Her shoulders trembled even more than before...

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ところで、おまえの趣味はなんだ？　土日とか何をしてるんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝By the way, what are your hobbies? Are you doing anything this Saturday?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝By the way, what are your hobbies? Are you doing anything this Saturday?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴の空気の読めなさは一級品だ！
MESSAGE.EN: Rin's inability to grasp the situation was beyond measure!
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin's inability to grasp the situation was beyond measure!

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そんなこと訊いてどうするつもりですの…それを肴にわたくしをまたコケにしたいわけですの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝What are you planning to do if I tell you? ...Aren't you going to use the info to make fun of me again?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝What are you planning to do if I tell you? ...Aren't you going to use the info to make fun of me again?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「コケになんてしない。ただ、もっとよく知りたいだけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I wasn't going to make fun of you. I just want to know more about you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I wasn't going to make fun of you. I just want to know more about you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「もっと親しくなるために…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I want to become closer...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I want to become closer...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…させせがわささみという女の子のことをな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...to the girl called Sasami Sasesegawa.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...to the girl called Sasami Sasesegawa.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 惜しい！
MESSAGE.EN: So close, yet so far!
MESSAGE.Translation: So close, yet so far!

MESSAGE.JP: でも、気持ちは伝わったのだろう。笹瀬川さんが震えさせていた拳を下ろした。
MESSAGE.EN: But her feelings probably did reach Sasasegawa-san. She lowered the fist she was shaking before.
MESSAGE.Translation: But her feelings probably did reach Sasasegawa-san. She lowered the fist she was shaking before.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「やっぱり馬鹿にしてますのね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You're making fun of me after all...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You're making fun of me after all...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あと、理想の男はどんなだ？　見てくれとか性格とか具体的に教えてほしい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝And, what's your type of guy? Tell me what he should look like, about his personality and everything else...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝And, what's your type of guy? Tell me what he should look like, about his personality and everything else...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「土日もソフトボールの練習…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝This Saturday I have softball practice...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝This Saturday I have softball practice...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「理想の殿方は剣道部の宮沢様…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝My ideal man is Miyazawa-sama of the kendo club...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝My ideal man is Miyazawa-sama of the kendo club...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「これでいいかしら？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Will that do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Will that do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うん、ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yeah, thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yeah, thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 笹瀬川さんは再び取り巻きを引き連れ、廊下を歩いていった。
MESSAGE.EN: She proceeded to walk down the hall, her minions flocking nearby.
MESSAGE.Translation: She proceeded to walk down the hall, her minions flocking nearby.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「しかし、どうしたものだろ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝So, what do we do now...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝So, what do we do now...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「困ったね、理想の男性が謙吾だなんて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's a problem, her ideal man is Kengo, huh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's a problem, her ideal man is Kengo, huh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「いかにショックを与えず伝えるか、だな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝How can we let him know without shocking him too much...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝How can we let him know without shocking him too much...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「とりあえず、謙吾はどう思うか聞いてみよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Let's talk to Kengo first and see what he thinks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Let's talk to Kengo first and see what he thinks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えっ、いきなりすごいとこ行くねっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, we're getting right to the point all of a sudden?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, we're getting right to the point all of a sudden?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「というわけなんだが、どうだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝So that's how it is, what do you think?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝So that's how it is, what do you think?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「どうと言われてもな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Even if you ask me this, huh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Even if you ask me this, huh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「その前にまずその笹瀬川さんを知ってる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Before that, do you know who Sasasegawa-san is?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Before that, do you know who Sasasegawa-san is?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「知ってはいる。なぜかやたらと廊下ですれ違い、毎回挨拶をされてるからな」
