MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I do. For some reason she always greets me when we pass each other in the hall.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I do. For some reason she always greets me when we pass each other in the hall.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あーアプローチには入ってるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, she's making a move on you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, she's making a move on you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「で、なんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝So, now what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝So, now what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「どう答えたらおまえたちはこの話を終わらせてくれるんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝How should I answer you, to get this over with?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝How should I answer you, to get this over with?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「それはもちろん、こっちにその気はない、だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That you don't feel the same way, of course.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That you don't feel the same way, of course.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「こっちにその気はない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I don't feel the same way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I don't feel the same way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「これで満足か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Are you satisfied?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Are you satisfied?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「助かるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're a big help.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're a big help.❞

MESSAGE.JP: その足で、２−Ａのクラスまで赴き、相川くんを呼び出す。
MESSAGE.EN: Afterward, we headed to class 2-A and called Aikawa-kun.
MESSAGE.Translation: Afterward, we headed to class 2-A and called Aikawa-kun.

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「あ、きみたち。どう？　なんか進展あった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝Ah, it's you guys. How'd it go? Any progress?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝Ah, it's you guys. How'd it go? Any progress?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yep.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yep.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「まず安心してくれ。謙吾にその気はない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝First of all, don't worry. Kengo doesn't feel the same way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝First of all, don't worry. Kengo doesn't feel the same way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「謙吾？　宮沢さんがどうかしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝Kengo? What about Miyazawa-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝Kengo? What about Miyazawa-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「実は…笹瀬川佐々美の思い人は謙吾だったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝To be honest... Kengo's the person Sasami Sasasegawa had in mind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝To be honest... Kengo's the person Sasami Sasasegawa had in mind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 相川くんは遠い目になって固まる。
MESSAGE.EN: Aikawa-kun had a distant look in his eyes as he stiffened.
MESSAGE.Translation: Aikawa-kun had a distant look in his eyes as he stiffened.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「だから、謙吾のほうにはその気はないって言っただろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That's why I told you that Kengo doesn't feel the same way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That's why I told you that Kengo doesn't feel the same way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「逆にチャンスじゃないか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Isn't this your chance?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Isn't this your chance?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「じゃあ謙吾の魅力とは何か…まずそれを考えてみるか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Then, what's so appealing about Kengo... Let's consider that first.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Then, what's so appealing about Kengo... Let's consider that first.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それでいい？　相川くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is that okay with you? Aikawa-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is that okay with you? Aikawa-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「はぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝Haa...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝Haa...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ショックは隠しきれないようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: He was unable to hide his shock.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was unable to hide his shock.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「謙吾は馬鹿でかくて恐いし、愛想もないが、強い」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Kengo is stupidly huge and scary, unfriendly, strong.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Kengo is stupidly huge and scary, unfriendly, strong.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あいつの魅力は強さだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝His appeal is his strength.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝His appeal is his strength.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「どうだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What do you think?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What do you think?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、男らしさという意味でなら強さは大きな魅力になってると思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, if you think about it in terms of masculinity, strength should be very important.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, if you think about it in terms of masculinity, strength should be very important.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「だろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝See?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝See?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「その強い謙吾を、ささみの前でのしてしまえば、おまえに惚れるに違いない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝If you take this strong Kengo down before Sasami's eyes, she'll no doubt fall for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝If you take this strong Kengo down before Sasami's eyes, she'll no doubt fall for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「でも、僕スポーツもやってないし、絶対勝てないんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝But I'm not doing any sports, there's no chance for me to win...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝But I'm not doing any sports, there's no chance for me to win...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だってさ。どうするのさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝True. So what now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝True. So what now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…ざざぜがわざざみという女の子のことをな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...with the girl called Zazami Zazazegawa.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...with the girl called Zazami Zazazegawa.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわあ、決めるべきところで噛みまくりだ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Whoa, you got her name wrong at the decisive moment!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Whoa, you got her name wrong at the decisive moment!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「やっぱり馬鹿にしてますのね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝So you were making fun of me after all...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝So you were making fun of me after all...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あと、理想の男はどんなだ？　見てくれとか性格とか具体的に教えてほしい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝And, what's your type of guy? Tell me what he should look like, about his personality and everything else...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝And, what's your type of guy? Tell me what he should look like, about his personality and everything else...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「く…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Guh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Guh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「土日もソフトボールの練習…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝This Saturday I have softball practice...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝This Saturday I have softball practice...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「理想の殿方は剣道部の宮沢様…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝My ideal man is Miyazawa-sama of the kendo club...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝My ideal man is Miyazawa-sama of the kendo club...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「これで文句ありませんわねっ、あなたたちやっておしまいなさい!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I gather you must be satisfied now, you there, take care of her!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I gather you must be satisfied now, you there, take care of her!❞

MESSAGE.JP: びしっ！　ばしっ！　ばきっ！　どぐっ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Punch*! *Kick*! *Wham*! *Bam*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Punch*! *Kick*! *Wham*! *Bam*!

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわー、まあ、待ってっ、はい、離れてっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Whoa, wha-, hold up, break it up!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Whoa, wha-, hold up, break it up!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 仲裁に入る。
MESSAGE.EN: I intervened.
MESSAGE.Translation: I intervened.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えっ？　なにがっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? What!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? What!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず鈴を引き離して２−Ａのクラスまで引きずっていく。
MESSAGE.EN: I separated Rin from the others and dragged her along to class 2-A.
MESSAGE.Translation: I separated Rin from the others and dragged her along to class 2-A.

MESSAGE.JP: 辿りつくと入り口から、相川くんを呼び出す。
MESSAGE.EN: When we finally got there, we called for Aikawa-kun.
MESSAGE.Translation: When we finally got there, we called for Aikawa-kun.

MESSAGE.JP: 結局バトルになった!!
MESSAGE.EN: It turned into a battle in the end, after all!
MESSAGE.Translation: It turned into a battle in the end, after all!

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「わたくしまでなんと長い道のりだったことでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You've come a long way to have me face you now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You've come a long way to have me face you now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ご褒美にわたくし自ら受けてたちましょう！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝As a reward, I shall take you on myself!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝As a reward, I shall take you on myself!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「もーおまえ、ぶっっ倒す！　問答無用ですわっ、今度こそ地面に這いつくばらしてやるっ!!　むきーーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Geez, you! I'll beat you to a pulp! No excuses, this time I'll definitely make you bite the dust! Mukiii!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Geez, you! I'll beat you to a pulp! No excuses, this time I'll definitely make you bite the dust! Mukiii!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ああ、笹瀬川さんのキャラが壊れかけている…。
MESSAGE.EN: Aah, her character's falling apart...
MESSAGE.Translation: Aah, her character's falling apart...

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あーもう、ぜっったい今度こそ地面に這いつくばらしてやりますわっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Ah geez, this time I'll make you eat dirt for sure!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Ah geez, this time I'll make you eat dirt for sure!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「見てなさい!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Just you watch!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Just you watch!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「このわたくしが…４戦４敗…ありえないことですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝For me... to lose four battles out of four... is unthinkable.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝For me... to lose four battles out of four... is unthinkable.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「今度こそ地面に這いつくばらしてやりますわ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I'll definitely make you eat dirt this time!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I'll definitely make you eat dirt this time!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「今度は本気で参りますわよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Don't expect me to hold back this time...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Don't expect me to hold back this time...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あら意外にやりますのね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You are holding up unexpectedly well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You are holding up unexpectedly well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ではわたくし自ら受けてたちましょう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Well then, I shall take you on myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Well then, I shall take you on myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「こんな尻の青い下級生にすら勝てないなんて、話にもならないですわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝To think you can't even beat these novice underclassmen. This isn't even worth talking about.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝To think you can't even beat these novice underclassmen. This isn't even worth talking about.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、ミッション中じゃないし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, we weren't on a mission.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, we weren't on a mission.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ミッションコンプリート」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Mission Complete.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Mission Complete.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやミッションなんてないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, that wasn't a mission.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, that wasn't a mission.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「よっしゃあぁぁぁーーっ！　勝ったあぁぁーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Hell yeah～! I wiiin!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Hell yeah～! I wiiin!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `ソフト部員@「念願の打倒棗鈴をついに佐々美様が達成された！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Club Member@❝Finally, Sasami-sama achieved the long-sought defeat of Rin Natsume!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Club Member@❝Finally, Sasami-sama achieved the long-sought defeat of Rin Natsume!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ふっふっふ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Fufufu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Fufufu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「はーはっはっは！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Ha-ha-ha-ha!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Ha-ha-ha-ha!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あーーはっはっはっは！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝A――hahaha!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝A――hahaha!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「いきますわよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝We shall take our leave.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝We shall take our leave.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `ソフト部員@「念願の打倒棗鈴をついに佐々美様が達成された！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Club Member@❝Finally, Sasami-sama achieved the long-sought defeat of Rin Natsume!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Club Member@❝Finally, Sasami-sama achieved the long-sought defeat of Rin Natsume!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ふっふっふ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Fufufu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Fufufu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「って、念願とか、ついには余計ですわっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Wha-, don't say things like long-sought or finally!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Wha-, don't say things like long-sought or finally!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「これぐらいお手の物ですの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝This much is an easy task for me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝This much is an easy task for me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `ソフト部員@「はっ、お手の物でございました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Club Member@❝Ma'am, an easy task it was!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Club Member@❝Ma'am, an easy task it was!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「いきますわよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝We shall take our leave.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝We shall take our leave.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「本気になれば、よっっゆーーっですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝It's a PIECE OF CAKE when I get serious!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝It's a PIECE OF CAKE when I get serious!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ざっとこんなものですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝That's about right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝That's about right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、ミッション中じゃないし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, we weren't on a mission.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, we weren't on a mission.❞

MESSAGE.JP: その足で、２−Ａのクラスまで赴き、相川くんを呼び出す。
MESSAGE.EN: Afterward, we headed to class 2-A and called Aikawa-kun.
MESSAGE.Translation: Afterward, we headed to class 2-A and called Aikawa-kun.

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「あ、きみたち。どう？　なんか進展あった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝Ah, it's you guys. How'd it go? Any progress?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝Ah, it's you guys. How'd it go? Any progress?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Aah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Aah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「なんか、息切れてない？　何してきたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝You're out of breath? What were you doing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝You're out of breath? What were you doing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「戦ってきた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Fighting.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Fighting.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「ええぇ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝Eeeh!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝Eeeh!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「冗談のようでほんとの話なんだけど、流してくれると助かるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It may sound like she's joking, but it's actually the truth... but let's set that aside.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It may sound like she's joking, but it's actually the truth... but let's set that aside.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「はぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝Haa...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝Haa...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「話もちゃんとしてきた。趣味はないそうだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I talked to her. She doesn't seem to have any hobbies.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I talked to her. She doesn't seem to have any hobbies.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「で、理想の男はウチの謙吾だそうだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝And, it looks like her ideal man is our Kengo.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝And, it looks like her ideal man is our Kengo.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 相川くんは遠い目になって固まる。
MESSAGE.EN: Aikawa-kun froze, and his eyes seemed to stare into the distance.
MESSAGE.Translation: Aikawa-kun froze, and his eyes seemed to stare into the distance.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんだ？　すごいショックを受けてるようだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What? It's like you're deeply shocked.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What? It's like you're deeply shocked.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あるいは、具合でも悪いのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Or, perhaps you're not feeling well?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Or, perhaps you're not feeling well?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「間違いなく前者だろうね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Without a doubt, it's the former...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Without a doubt, it's the former...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんだ、こんなことでショックを受けるのか。大げさな奴だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What, you're shocked by something like this? You're blowing it out of proportion.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What, you're shocked by something like this? You're blowing it out of proportion.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「理想の男が具体的だからねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's because her ideal guy is so specific.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's because her ideal guy is so specific.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「芸能人とかならまだしも、同じ学校にいるんだし…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If it were a celebrity it'd be one thing, but he even goes to the same school...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If it were a celebrity it'd be one thing, but he even goes to the same school...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんていうか、敵わない、みたいな敗北感を覚えたんじゃない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How to say it... it must be like the feeling of crushing defeat from meeting an unbeatable opponent.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How to say it... it must be like the feeling of crushing defeat from meeting an unbeatable opponent.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そうなのか…ツナ缶やるから元気だせ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Is that so... Cheer up, have some tuna.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Is that so... Cheer up, have some tuna.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 缶を取り出してぷちん、と蓋を開ける。
MESSAGE.EN: She brought out a can of tuna and opened the lid.
MESSAGE.Translation: She brought out a can of tuna and opened the lid.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「おまえにじゃない！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It's not for you!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It's not for you!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 匂いに誘われてか、猫がまたわらわらと集まりだし、ツナ缶は結局彼らの餌となる。
MESSAGE.EN: Cats were attracted by the smell and began gathering around, and in the end they were the ones who ate the tuna.
MESSAGE.Translation: Cats were attracted by the smell and began gathering around, and in the end they were the ones who ate the tuna.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、謙吾のほうにはその気はないと思うから、そんなに落ち込まなくてもいいんじゃないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But, I don't think Kengo feels the same way about her, so you don't have to feel so down.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But, I don't think Kengo feels the same way about her, so you don't have to feel so down.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「えっ、そんなことどうしてわかるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝Eh, how do you know that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝Eh, how do you know that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 光明が差したのか、目に生気が戻る。
MESSAGE.EN: He finally saw a ray of hope, and life returned to his eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: He finally saw a ray of hope, and life returned to his eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「長いつきあいだからね…なんとなく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We've been friends for a long time... so, I just know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We've been friends for a long time... so, I just know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「とりあえず謙吾を倒そう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝First of all, we've got to defeat Kengo.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝First of all, we've got to defeat Kengo.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「おや、これまた突飛な案がでたよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, it's another nutty plan...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, it's another nutty plan...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あいつの魅力は強さだ。それ以外に考えられない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝His only appeal is strength. I can't think of anything else.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝His only appeal is strength. I can't think of anything else.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「その強い謙吾を、ざぜんだぜん子の前でのしてしまえば、おまえに惚れるに違いない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝If you take this strong Kengo down before that Zazendazen girl's eyes, she will no doubt fall for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝If you take this strong Kengo down before that Zazendazen girl's eyes, she will no doubt fall for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「これまたツッコミどころ満載だぞ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's another remark I could comment so much on...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's another remark I could comment so much on...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「とりあえず、ざぜんだぜん子とは、笹瀬川佐々美さんのことでしょうか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝So first of all, is that Zanzendazen girl Sasami Sasasegawa...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝So first of all, is that Zanzendazen girl Sasami Sasasegawa...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「察しがよくて助かるよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's great that you understand...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's great that you understand...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「でも、僕スポーツもやってないし、絶対勝てないんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝But I'm not doing any sports, there's no way I can win...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝But I'm not doing any sports, there's no way I can win...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だってさ。どうするのさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝True. So what now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝True. So what now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そうだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Let's see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Let's see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「卑怯ではあるが、ここは不意打ちだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It might be underhanded, but we'll pull a surprise attack.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It might be underhanded, but we'll pull a surprise attack.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「それでも勝てそうな気がしないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝But it still doesn't seem like I'd win.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝But it still doesn't seem like I'd win.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「じゃ、不意打ち×３だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Then, a triple surprise attack.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Then, a triple surprise attack.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝Huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝Huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「まず最初にあたしが、急いでいて転けたふりをして謙吾の足元に滑り込む」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝First of all, I'll pretend to be in a hurry and fall down, targeting his legs.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝First of all, I'll pretend to be in a hurry and fall down, targeting his legs.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「すると、謙吾は間違いなく避けるために飛び上がるだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝If I do, he'll no doubt jump aside to avoid me, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝If I do, he'll no doubt jump aside to avoid me, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕らはうん、と頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: We nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: We nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「で、次に理樹が後ろから、『Ａ定食お待ちー！』と言って、お盆を謙吾の飛び上がった後頭部に向けて投げつける」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Next, Riki will come from behind yelling ❛One A-set lunch, sorry for the wait!❜ and fling a tray at the back of Kengo's head.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Next, Riki will come from behind yelling ❛One A-set lunch, sorry for the wait!❜ and fling a tray at the back of Kengo's head.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 長くなるから、ツッコむのはよそう…。
MESSAGE.EN: It was getting long, so I saved my constructive feedback for later.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was getting long, so I saved my constructive feedback for later.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「すると、あいつは飛び上がりながら、頭を屈めて、丸くなるだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝When you do, Kengo will have to lean over while still in mid-air, and curl into a ball, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝When you do, Kengo will have to lean over while still in mid-air, and curl into a ball, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕らはうん、と頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: We nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: We nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「その体勢に追い込めば、次の攻撃はよけようがなくなる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝And when he's in that posture, he won't be able to avoid an attack anymore.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝And when he's in that posture, he won't be able to avoid an attack anymore.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そこを『宮沢謙吾敗れたり！』と言いつつ、あいつのどてっぱらにおまえがキックをかませ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Then, you'll shout ❛Kengo Miyazawa, I shall defeat you!❜ and kick him in the stomach.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Then, you'll shout ❛Kengo Miyazawa, I shall defeat you!❜ and kick him in the stomach.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「いやぁ、かましたとしても、きかないような…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝Well, even if you make me shout that while kicking, it won't do much...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝Well, even if you make me shout that while kicking, it won't do much...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「勢いをつけて渾身の蹴りを打て。２００メートルぐらい向こうから助走してこい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You'll have to put all your strength in the kick. Start running from 200 meters away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You'll have to put all your strength in the kick. Start running from 200 meters away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「長い廊下だねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's one long corridor...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's one long corridor...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「体当たりみたいな感じでいいのかなあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝Can't I just slam him with my body...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝Can't I just slam him with my body...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うん、いい。とりあえず向こうはよけるすべがないからな、勢いさえあれば吹き飛ぶ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yep, you can. He'll have no way to avoid your attack, so as long as you put some strength into it, he'll be blown away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yep, you can. He'll have no way to avoid your attack, so as long as you put some strength into it, he'll be blown away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あいつが吹き飛ぶ姿なんて、なかなか拝めるものではないから、これはものすごいインパクトだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Him being blown away isn't your everyday scene, it'll certainly make quite an impact.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Him being blown away isn't your everyday scene, it'll certainly make quite an impact.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そしておまえは、あの謙吾を一発でのした男として伝説になる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝And thus you'll become legendary as the guy who brought Kengo down in a single attack.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝And thus you'll become legendary as the guy who brought Kengo down in a single attack.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「決行は、次の休み時間だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝We'll set the plan in motion next break.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝We'll set the plan in motion next break.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕らが黙っていると、そう鈴が勝手に決める。
MESSAGE.EN: Before we could put in a word, Rin went ahead and decided everything.
MESSAGE.Translation: Before we could put in a word, Rin went ahead and decided everything.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ささみはあたしが誘い出しておく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'll call out Sasami.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'll call out Sasami.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「本当にやるの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝Are we really going to do this...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝Are we really going to do this...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「やる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝We are.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝We are.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「さざんがきゅー子はあたしが誘い出しておく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'll call out Sazangakyu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'll call out Sazangakyu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「本当にやるの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝Are we really going to do this...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝Are we really going to do this...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「やる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝We are.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝We are.❞

MESSAGE.JP: きゅぴーんと鈴の目が光った！
MESSAGE.EN: Rin's eyes were positively glowing!
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin's eyes were positively glowing!

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「スタンバイオーケー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Standby okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Standby okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 携帯電話に向けて告げる。
MESSAGE.EN: I conveyed through my cellphone.
MESSAGE.Translation: I conveyed through my cellphone.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『謙吾、入ります』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Kengo, coming in.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Kengo, coming in.]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「オーケー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『ささみも入ります』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Sasami, coming in too.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Sasami, coming in too.]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『ざざ子も入ります』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Zazami, coming in too.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Zazami, coming in too.]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『ミッション…スタート！』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Mission... Start!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Mission... Start!]

MESSAGE.JP: さすが兄妹だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: They were siblings, all right...
MESSAGE.Translation: They were siblings, all right...

MESSAGE.JP: たったったと鈴が謙吾に向かって駆けていく。
MESSAGE.EN: She dashed off in Kengo's direction.
MESSAGE.Translation: She dashed off in Kengo's direction.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そこあぶなーーいっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Watch out!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Watch out!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 声をあげながら謙吾にスライディングをかます。
MESSAGE.EN: She yelled and started sliding.
MESSAGE.Translation: She yelled and started sliding.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「しねぇー！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Die～e!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Die～e!❞

MESSAGE.JP: どう考えても滑って転けた人には思えない台詞を口にしながら、謙吾にスライディングをかます。
MESSAGE.EN: She exclaimed something a person slipping and falling definitely shouldn't be saying.
MESSAGE.Translation: She exclaimed something a person slipping and falling definitely shouldn't be saying.

MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝*Mh*...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝*Mh*...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 予想通り床を蹴り、謙吾が飛んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: As expected, Kengo kicked off the floor and jumped.
MESSAGE.Translation: As expected, Kengo kicked off the floor and jumped.

MESSAGE.JP: 今度は僕の番だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was my turn.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was my turn.

MESSAGE.JP: 言うの恥ずかしい…。
MESSAGE.EN: It's embarrassing to say this...
MESSAGE.Translation: It's embarrassing to say this...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え…Ａ定食お待ちー！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh... One A-set lunch, sorry for the wait!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh... One A-set lunch, sorry for the wait!❞

MESSAGE.JP: その謙吾の後頭部に向けて、僕はフリスビーのように空のお盆を投げつける。
MESSAGE.EN: Aiming at the back of his head, I flung a tray as though it were a Frisbee.
MESSAGE.Translation: Aiming at the back of his head, I flung a tray as though it were a Frisbee.

MESSAGE.JP: どうやってそれを察知したのか…
MESSAGE.EN: Somehow, he managed to detect it...
MESSAGE.Translation: Somehow, he managed to detect it...

MESSAGE.JP: なんと振り向きもせずそれを片手で掴み取ってみせた！
MESSAGE.EN: Without even turning his head, he seized it with just one hand!
MESSAGE.Translation: Without even turning his head, he seized it with just one hand!

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「宮沢謙吾、敗れたりぃーー！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝Kengo Miyazawa, I shall defeat you!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝Kengo Miyazawa, I shall defeat you!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 直後走り込んできた相川くんが、謙吾と顔を正面から見合わせる。
MESSAGE.EN: Right behind came Aikawa-kun, rushing toward Kengo head on.
MESSAGE.Translation: Right behind came Aikawa-kun, rushing toward Kengo head on.

MESSAGE.JP: その顔が焦りにゆがむが、勢いは止められない。
MESSAGE.EN: His face was distorted with impatience, but his momentum was unstoppable.
MESSAGE.Translation: His face was distorted with impatience, but his momentum was unstoppable.

MESSAGE.JP: そのまま謙吾に突っ込んでいく。
MESSAGE.EN: He was going to crash into Kengo like this.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was going to crash into Kengo like this.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾は宙に浮いたまま、空いている手で相川くんの服の袖を掴む。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo, still in mid-air, caught hold of Aikawa-kun's sleeve with his free hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo, still in mid-air, caught hold of Aikawa-kun's sleeve with his free hand.

MESSAGE.JP: そして着地すると同時体を折って、相川くんを背負い投げした。
MESSAGE.EN: And just as he landed, performed a flying mare on Aikawa-kun.
MESSAGE.Translation: And just as he landed, performed a flying mare on Aikawa-kun.

MESSAGE.JP: びたん！と床に思い切り打ち据えられる。
MESSAGE.EN: *BLAM*! He slammed him to the floor with all of his might.
MESSAGE.Translation: *BLAM*! He slammed him to the floor with all of his might.

MESSAGE.JP: すべての動きが止まっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Everything went still.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everything went still.

MESSAGE.JP: 相川くんはぴくりともしない。
MESSAGE.EN: Aikawa-kun wasn't so much as twitching a muscle.
MESSAGE.Translation: Aikawa-kun wasn't so much as twitching a muscle.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「宮沢さん、曲者ですの!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Miyazawa-san, was that a scoundrel!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Miyazawa-san, was that a scoundrel!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: その光景を前に呆然と立ちつくしていた笹瀬川さんがようやくそう言って駆けつける。
MESSAGE.EN: Sasasegawa-san, who had been watching the scene unfold in blank amazement, finally managed to get some words out as she hurried toward Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sasasegawa-san, who had been watching the scene unfold in blank amazement, finally managed to get some words out as she hurried toward Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「やばい、ささみだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Oh no, it's Sasami.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Oh no, it's Sasami.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「やばい、ざざみだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Oh no, it's Zazami.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Oh no, it's Zazami.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴が立ち上がると、気絶したままの相川くんを引っ張ってこちらに逃げてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin got to her feet and hurried away, dragging the unconscious Aikawa-kun behind her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin got to her feet and hurried away, dragging the unconscious Aikawa-kun behind her.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「理樹っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾がこちらに顔を向けた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo looked toward me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo looked toward me.

MESSAGE.JP: 怒られる…!?
MESSAGE.EN: Is he mad...!?
MESSAGE.Translation: Is he mad...!?

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「何も注文していないし、ここは学食ではないし、そもそも何も載っていない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I didn't order anything, this isn't the cafeteria, and there isn't even anything on the tray.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I didn't order anything, this isn't the cafeteria, and there isn't even anything on the tray.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ツッコまれた！
MESSAGE.EN: He made a critical comment!
MESSAGE.Translation: He made a critical comment!

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「新しい遊びか？　また恭介の奴か…困った奴だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Another game? That Kyousuke again... what a troublesome guy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Another game? That Kyousuke again... what a troublesome guy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, no...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, no...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ほらと言って、盆を投げ返してきた。
MESSAGE.EN: He tossed the tray back to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: He tossed the tray back to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 胸に当てて、なんとか受け止める。
MESSAGE.EN: I managed to stop it with my chest.
MESSAGE.Translation: I managed to stop it with my chest.

MESSAGE.JP: いや、成功するはずがない…。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, there was no chance it could have worked...
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, there was no chance it could have worked...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「相川くん、どうだった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How's Aikawa-kun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How's Aikawa-kun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「保健室でしばらく休むとのことだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝He's resting in the infirmary for now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝He's resting in the infirmary for now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それはきっと精神的なダメージも含めてだねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's surely psychological damage as well...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's surely psychological damage as well...❞

MESSAGE.JP: お大事にとしかいいようがない…。
MESSAGE.EN: Thank goodness he was all right, though...
MESSAGE.Translation: Thank goodness he was all right, though...

MESSAGE.JP: さて、ぽっかり時間が空いてしまったわけだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: All right, I have some free time now.
MESSAGE.Translation: All right, I have some free time now.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな時間はもちろん…。
MESSAGE.EN: Of course I'll...
MESSAGE.Translation: Of course I'll...

MESSAGE.JP: 休んでおこう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'll take a nap...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'll take a nap...

MESSAGE.JP: 休み時間。
MESSAGE.EN: Break time.
MESSAGE.Translation: Break time.

MESSAGE.JP: カードの次の三枚を引いてみた。
MESSAGE.EN: I pulled out the next three cards.
MESSAGE.Translation: I pulled out the next three cards.

MESSAGE.JP: 『中庭で踊る』『誰かと手を繋いで歩く』『２階廊下の消火器を３階に持っていく』
MESSAGE.EN: [Dance in the courtyard.][Walk while holding someone's hand.][Take the second floor fire extinguisher to the third floor.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Dance in the courtyard.][Walk while holding someone's hand.][Take the second floor fire extinguisher to the third floor.]

MESSAGE.JP: …また難易度の高い行動だなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Another difficult set of actions.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Another difficult set of actions.

MESSAGE.JP: やらないと朱鷺戸さんに文句言われそうだし…パートナーとしてやるしかないか…。
MESSAGE.EN: If I don't do them, Tokido-san will complain... so as her partner, I guess I have no choice...
MESSAGE.Translation: If I don't do them, Tokido-san will complain... so as her partner, I guess I have no choice...

MESSAGE.JP: 幸運なことに、中庭には誰もいなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Luckily, no one was in the courtyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: Luckily, no one was in the courtyard.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はりゃっ！　ほりゃっ！　うまうっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Harya! Horya! Umau!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Harya! Horya! Umau!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 思いつく限りのステップを踏む。
MESSAGE.EN: I did whatever steps I could think of.
MESSAGE.Translation: I did whatever steps I could think of.

MESSAGE.JP: 踊っているというより、まるで酔拳のようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was closer to drunken boxing than dancing.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was closer to drunken boxing than dancing.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なにしてるんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What are you doing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What are you doing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわぁああっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uwaah!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uwaah!❞

MESSAGE.JP: いきなり見つかってしまった！
MESSAGE.EN: Somebody saw me!
MESSAGE.Translation: Somebody saw me!

MESSAGE.JP: 猫が紛れ込んできたのか、鈴の足元には猫が一匹懐いている。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a cat at Rin's feet that seemed to have just slipped in.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a cat at Rin's feet that seemed to have just slipped in.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、なんでもないから、お気になさらずっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's nothing. Don't worry about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's nothing. Don't worry about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「本当にどうかしたのか？　今の動きは相当おかしかったぞ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Seriously, what's wrong? How you moved just now was really weird.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Seriously, what's wrong? How you moved just now was really weird.❞

MESSAGE.JP: すごく心配されてしまった…。
MESSAGE.EN: She's really worried...
MESSAGE.Translation: She's really worried...

MESSAGE.JP: いや、確かにこんなとこで踊ってたらおかしいんだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, I agree that it is pretty strange to be dancing at a place like this.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, I agree that it is pretty strange to be dancing at a place like this.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、ものすごい強い敵が現れたらさ、こういう戦い方も必要なんじゃないかって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I was just thinking that if a really strong enemy appeared, I would fight them off with this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I was just thinking that if a really strong enemy appeared, I would fight them off with this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そうか、新技か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Oh, it's a new move.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Oh, it's a new move.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「にしては、格好悪かったな。今のはどうかと思うぞ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It's a pretty lame one. Are you sure about it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It's a pretty lame one. Are you sure about it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はは、いいんだよ、うまうっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haha, it's fine. Umau!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haha, it's fine. Umau!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんだ、うまうって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What's with you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What's with you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そんなへんな戦い方する奴が身内にいたら、引くぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Having a weirdo fight like that in the group is a serious turnoff.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Having a weirdo fight like that in the group is a serious turnoff.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「慣れだよ、慣れ。はは。はりゃほれっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You just need to get used to it. Haha, harya hore!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You just need to get used to it. Haha, harya hore!❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんとか嘘を貫き通した。
MESSAGE.EN: Somehow I sold the lie.
MESSAGE.Translation: Somehow I sold the lie.

MESSAGE.JP: 次は…
MESSAGE.EN: Next is...
MESSAGE.Translation: Next is...

MESSAGE.JP: 『誰かと手を繋いで歩く』
MESSAGE.EN: [Walk while holding someone's hand.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Walk while holding someone's hand.]

MESSAGE.JP: …誰がいいんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Who should I do it with?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Who should I do it with?

MESSAGE.JP: 頼むとしたら、小毬さんあたりだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: If I ask, Komari-san will probably do it.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I ask, Komari-san will probably do it.

MESSAGE.JP: 別に性別は指定されなかったけど、男同士で手を繋いで歩くのは…。
MESSAGE.EN: It doesn't specify that it needs to be the opposite sex, but doing it with another man is a little...
MESSAGE.Translation: It doesn't specify that it needs to be the opposite sex, but doing it with another man is a little...

MESSAGE.JP: うーん、ひとりで踊るよりも、鈴に引かれそうだから、女の子のほうがいい。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, it'd probably disturb Rin more than my dancing alone, so it's better to go with a girl.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, it'd probably disturb Rin more than my dancing alone, so it's better to go with a girl.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふんふんふ～ん♪」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Funfunfu～n♪.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Funfunfu～n♪.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 考えていると、能天気に歩いている小毬さんを発見した。
MESSAGE.EN: As I thought about it, I spotted Komari-san cheerfully walking along.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I thought about it, I spotted Komari-san cheerfully walking along.

MESSAGE.JP: あ、ちょうどいい…かな？
MESSAGE.EN: Ah, this is perfect... maybe?
MESSAGE.Translation: Ah, this is perfect... maybe?

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あ、理樹君こんにちはー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Oh, hello Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Oh, hello Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「今日は絶好のお散歩日和ですねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Today is the perfect day for a walk, don't you think?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Today is the perfect day for a walk, don't you think?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、小毬さん、ちょっといいかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah. Komari-san, do you have a minute?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah. Komari-san, do you have a minute?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふえ？　なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fue? What is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fue? What is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょっとだけでいいから、手を繋いで歩いてもらえるかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Could you walk with me while holding hands? Just for a little while.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Could you walk with me while holding hands? Just for a little while.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、いいよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yep, sure～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yep, sure～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: きゅっと手を繋ぐ。
MESSAGE.EN: I grabbed her hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I grabbed her hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 小さくて柔らかい手だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Her hand was small and soft.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her hand was small and soft.

MESSAGE.JP: そのまま歩いていく。
MESSAGE.EN: We walked hand in hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: We walked hand in hand.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「今日もニコニコいい天気って感じですね～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Today's nice weather makes me feel like smiling～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Today's nice weather makes me feel like smiling～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …やっぱり恥ずかしい。
MESSAGE.EN: ...As I thought, it was embarrassing.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...As I thought, it was embarrassing.

MESSAGE.JP: 結局、そのまま小毬さんの散歩コースを一周してしまった…。
MESSAGE.EN: We ended up doing one lap of Komari-san's walk route like that.
MESSAGE.Translation: We ended up doing one lap of Komari-san's walk route like that.

MESSAGE.JP: 結構な人の目に付いてしまった気がする…。
MESSAGE.EN: It felt like everyone was watching us...
MESSAGE.Translation: It felt like everyone was watching us...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ごめんね、いきなりこんなこと頼んじゃって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry for asking you to do this all of a sudden.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry for asking you to do this all of a sudden.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「のーぷろぶれむだよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝No problem.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝No problem.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、でも恥ずかしくなかった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But wasn't it embarrassing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But wasn't it embarrassing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ほわぁぁぁぁぁっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Howaaaaah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Howaaaaah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: え？　なに!?
MESSAGE.EN: Eh? What!?
MESSAGE.Translation: Eh? What!?

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「よく考えたら、とってもはずかしいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Now that I think about it, it's really embarrassing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Now that I think about it, it's really embarrassing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 今ごろ気付いたんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: She only just noticed...?
MESSAGE.Translation: She only just noticed...?

MESSAGE.JP: まあ、目的は達成したからまあいいか。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, I achieved my objective, so whatever.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, I achieved my objective, so whatever.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、ちょっとだけでよかったから。ほんとにありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It was only for a little while, but thank you so much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It was only for a little while, but thank you so much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 逃げるようにその場から去った。
MESSAGE.EN: I got out of there like I was on the run.
MESSAGE.Translation: I got out of there like I was on the run.

MESSAGE.JP: やっぱり相手は考えた方がいいか…。
MESSAGE.EN: I should've put a little more thought into who to pick...
MESSAGE.Translation: I should've put a little more thought into who to pick...

MESSAGE.JP: クドに頼んでみようか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe I'll ask Kud...
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe I'll ask Kud...

MESSAGE.JP: 校内を探してみることにする。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to check inside.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to check inside.

MESSAGE.JP: あ、いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Oh, there she is.
MESSAGE.Translation: Oh, there she is.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わふ～っ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafuu!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafuu!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 台車にぱんぱんのゴミ袋を載せて、それを軸にくるくる回っている。
MESSAGE.EN: She had put a full trash bag on a push cart and was spinning it around and around.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had put a full trash bag on a push cart and was spinning it around and around.

MESSAGE.JP: 新しい遊びだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Is that some kind of new game?
MESSAGE.Translation: Is that some kind of new game?

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わふ～…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafuu～...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafuu～...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 止まるとうなだれる。
MESSAGE.EN: She stopped and hung her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: She stopped and hung her head.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ふう…困りました～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Fuu... not good～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Fuu... not good～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「クド、どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud, what's wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud, what's wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あっ、直枝さんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「実はその、備品の廃棄を頼まれてしまいまして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Actually, I was asked to dispose of this equipment.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Actually, I was asked to dispose of this equipment.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ところがその、貸していただいた台車の車輪が壊れてしまったようなのです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝But the push cart I borrowed to do it seems to have a broken wheel...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝But the push cart I borrowed to do it seems to have a broken wheel...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どれ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Which one?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Which one?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 台車を見てみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I took a look at the push cart.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took a look at the push cart.

MESSAGE.JP: …前輪が一箇所、壊れて回らなくなっている。
MESSAGE.EN: ...One of the front wheels was broken and wouldn't turn.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...One of the front wheels was broken and wouldn't turn.

MESSAGE.JP: そのまま無理に動かしていたせいか、もう片方も変な方向へ曲がるようになってしまったようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She had been forcing it to move like that and it had been turning weirdly in one direction.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had been forcing it to move like that and it had been turning weirdly in one direction.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「これはちょっとすぐには直らないね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This won't be a quick fix...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This won't be a quick fix...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そうですか～…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Really～?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Really～?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「では、直接手で持っていくことにします」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Then I'll just carry it by hand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Then I'll just carry it by hand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゴミ袋に手を掛ける。
MESSAGE.EN: She took the bag in hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: She took the bag in hand.

MESSAGE.JP: …ゴミ袋は体の小さなクドには明らかに不相応なサイズだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The bag was clearly far too big for a small girl like Kud.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The bag was clearly far too big for a small girl like Kud.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「大丈夫？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「がんばりますっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'll do my best.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'll do my best.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「よいしょっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Heave-ho.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Heave-ho.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わ、わふーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝W-wafuu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝W-wafuu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: よろよろ。
MESSAGE.EN: She was teetering.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was teetering.

MESSAGE.JP: 危なっかしい…。
MESSAGE.EN: It looked dangerous...
MESSAGE.Translation: It looked dangerous...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…クド、やっぱり僕が持っていくよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Kud, I'll carry it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Kud, I'll carry it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「い、いえいえっ、そんなっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝N-no, no. No way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝N-no, no. No way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「大丈夫、僕だってクドよりは力もちだし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's okay. I'm stronger than you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's okay. I'm stronger than you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そ、そうですか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝T-that's true...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝T-that's true...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「では、こうしましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Okay, let's do it like this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Okay, let's do it like this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりで持っていくことになった。
MESSAGE.EN: We decided to both carry it.
MESSAGE.Translation: We decided to both carry it.

MESSAGE.JP: 向かい合わせになって横からゴミ袋を支える形だ。
MESSAGE.EN: We faced each other and carried the bag from the sides.
MESSAGE.Translation: We faced each other and carried the bag from the sides.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「よいしょっ、よいしょっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Heave, ho.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Heave, ho.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 身長差のせいで、クドはゴミ袋に抱きつくだけになっている。
MESSAGE.EN: Because of our height difference, Kud was more or less hugging the bag.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because of our height difference, Kud was more or less hugging the bag.

MESSAGE.JP: 正直、さっぱり重量を支えられてない。
MESSAGE.EN: Honestly, she wasn't really helping me carry it at all.
MESSAGE.Translation: Honestly, she wasn't really helping me carry it at all.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「よいしょっ、よいしょっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Heave, ho.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Heave, ho.❞

MESSAGE.JP: まあ、がんばってくれてるみたいだし、無理をさせることもないか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, she seemed to be doing her best and not pushing herself too hard...
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, she seemed to be doing her best and not pushing herself too hard...

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh, what's wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh, what's wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「な、なんでもないです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I-it's nothing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I-it's nothing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わふっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafuu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafuu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh? What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh? What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あ、いえ、その…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, um, well...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, um, well...❞

MESSAGE.JP: さっきから手が触れるたびにクドが声を上げているみたいだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Every time my hand touched hers, she made a noise.
MESSAGE.Translation: Every time my hand touched hers, she made a noise.

MESSAGE.JP: 確かに、ちょっと気恥ずかしい。
MESSAGE.EN: This is definitely a little embarrassing.
MESSAGE.Translation: This is definitely a little embarrassing.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（待てよ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Hold on...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Hold on...)

MESSAGE.JP: ここで手を重ねて持っていけば、手を繋いでることにならないだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: If our hands are on top of each others while we carry this, couldn't I count that as holding hands?
MESSAGE.Translation: If our hands are on top of each others while we carry this, couldn't I count that as holding hands?

MESSAGE.JP: そうすれば、荷物運びと手を繋ぐという目的のふたつがまとめて達成できるじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: If I do, I could accomplish both the bag carrying and the hand holding objectives at the same time.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I do, I could accomplish both the bag carrying and the hand holding objectives at the same time.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「は、はいっ、なんでしょうっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Y-Yes? What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Y-Yes? What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕の手にクドの手を重ねて支えてほしいんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I want you to put your hand on top of mine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I want you to put your hand on top of mine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「か、かかっ、重ねてですかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝O-on top of yours?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝O-on top of yours?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そ、それはそのっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝T-that's...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝T-that's...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「頼むよ…大事なことなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Please... it's important.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Please... it's important.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そ、それは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝B-but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝B-but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わ、わかりましたっ。不肖クドリャフカ、お手を重ねてまいりますっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Okay. I, the unworthy Kudryavka, shall put my hand on yours.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Okay. I, the unworthy Kudryavka, shall put my hand on yours.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「いざっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝There.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝There.❞

MESSAGE.JP: さらにこっちに負荷が掛かった…。
MESSAGE.EN: Even more of the burden was put on me...
MESSAGE.Translation: Even more of the burden was put on me...

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ふう、助かりました。ありがとうございますー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Whew, you were a big help. Thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Whew, you were a big help. Thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、こっちも助かったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, you helped me too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, you helped me too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はい？　なんでしょう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I did? How?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I did? How?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、いや、こっちの話だから。なんでもないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, umm, it's personal, don't worry about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, umm, it's personal, don't worry about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ひとまず、これで目的は達成できた。
MESSAGE.EN: Anyway, I'd accomplished my objective.
MESSAGE.Translation: Anyway, I'd accomplished my objective.

MESSAGE.JP: …と思う。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I think.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I think.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さん…。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san...
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san...

MESSAGE.JP: って、そんなに面識もないのに何で僕は西園さんを真っ先に思い浮かべたんだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Wait, we're barely even acquaintances, so why is Nishizono-san the first person I thought of...
MESSAGE.Translation: Wait, we're barely even acquaintances, so why is Nishizono-san the first person I thought of...

MESSAGE.JP: 中庭まで来てしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: I arrived in the courtyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: I arrived in the courtyard.

MESSAGE.JP: …そして、西園さんはそこにいた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...And Nishizono-san was there.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...And Nishizono-san was there.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…直枝さんですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Naoe-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Naoe-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「こんにちは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Hello.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Hello.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、こんにちは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, hello.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, hello.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: What the heck.
MESSAGE.Translation: What the heck.

MESSAGE.JP: とても『手を繋いで一緒に歩いて』なんて頼めるような雰囲気には思えない。
MESSAGE.EN: I can't see this as a ❛let's hold hands and walk together❜ atmosphere at all.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can't see this as a ❛let's hold hands and walk together❜ atmosphere at all.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、決めたからにはやらないと…。
MESSAGE.EN: But I made my choice, so I have to go through with it...
MESSAGE.Translation: But I made my choice, so I have to go through with it...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さん、実は、お願いがあってきたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san, actually, I have a request.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san, actually, I have a request.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…なんですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...What is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...What is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕と手を繋いで歩い」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hold hands and walk with me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hold hands and walk with me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「お断りします」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I refuse.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I refuse.❞

MESSAGE.JP: やっぱり…。
MESSAGE.EN: Of course...
MESSAGE.Translation: Of course...

MESSAGE.JP: 何で僕はこんな茨の道を選んで歩いてるんだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Why did I decide to walk such a thorny path...
MESSAGE.Translation: Why did I decide to walk such a thorny path...

MESSAGE.JP: でも、決めたことだ。
MESSAGE.EN: But I made my choice.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I made my choice.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そ、そんなこと言わないで…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝D-don't say that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝D-don't say that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「嫌です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I won't do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I won't do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょっとでいいんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Just for a little while.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Just for a little while.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…したくありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I don't want to.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I don't want to.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ小指絡めるだけでいいからっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then we can just intertwine our pinkies.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then we can just intertwine our pinkies.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「そのほうが嫌です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I won't do that either.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I won't do that either.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「大体なぜわたしにそんなことを頼むんですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Why are you asking me to do that kind of thing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Why are you asking me to do that kind of thing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「からかわれるのは趣味ではありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I don't enjoy being teased.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I don't enjoy being teased.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、理由は話せないんだけど…それでも、やらなきゃいけないことなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I can't tell you the reason... but even so, I need to do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I can't tell you the reason... but even so, I need to do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「どうやら本気のようですが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝You seem rather serious...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝You seem rather serious...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「それでも嫌です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝But I still won't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝But I still won't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ええっ…な、なんで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eeh... w-why?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eeh... w-why?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「それは、その…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Well, umm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Well, umm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「は、は…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I'm em... em...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I'm em... em...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「白菜」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Embalming.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Embalming.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 白菜…？
MESSAGE.EN: Embalming...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Embalming...?

MESSAGE.JP: それはひょっとして、僕の歯がくさいと言う事を暗に言っているんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Is she maybe trying to tell me that my breath smells like death?
MESSAGE.Translation: Is she maybe trying to tell me that my breath smells like death?

MESSAGE.JP: 思わず口臭を確認する。
MESSAGE.EN: I checked my breath without thinking.
MESSAGE.Translation: I checked my breath without thinking.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ではなく…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝That's not it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝That's not it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ちがうんだ。良かった。
MESSAGE.EN: It's something different. Thank god.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's something different. Thank god.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「は、はず…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I'm em... emba...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I'm em... emba...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「さようなら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Good bye.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Good bye.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ええぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eeeh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eeeh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: こうなったら、仕方ない。奥の手だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It's come to this, so I have no choice but to play my trump card.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's come to this, so I have no choice but to play my trump card.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「実は…謙吾がメガネを掛けたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝To tell you the truth... Kengo put on glasses.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝To tell you the truth... Kengo put on glasses.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぴく、と西園さんが反応する。
MESSAGE.EN: That got a slight reaction out of her.
MESSAGE.Translation: That got a slight reaction out of her.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「すると、とたんに謙吾の性格が一変した」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝When he put them on, his personality suddenly changed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝When he put them on, his personality suddenly changed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そして今まさに、恭介をせめ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And right now he's attacking Kyousuke...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And right now he's attacking Kyousuke...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「行きましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんは立ちがると、むんずと僕の手をつかむ。
MESSAGE.EN: She stood up and violently grabbed my hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: She stood up and violently grabbed my hand.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、その…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, umm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, umm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: そして早足で歩き出す。
MESSAGE.EN: We started walking really fast.
MESSAGE.Translation: We started walking really fast.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょっ、待った西園さんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hold on, Nishizono-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hold on, Nishizono-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 引きずられる形になる。
MESSAGE.EN: She was dragging me behind her.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was dragging me behind her.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「受恭…非常に興味深いです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Kyousuke being assaulted... this is unusually interesting.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Kyousuke being assaulted... this is unusually interesting.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「さあ直枝さん、どこですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝So Naoe-san, where are they?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝So Naoe-san, where are they?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ざく。
MESSAGE.EN: *Stab*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Stab*.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ぎゃぁあーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Gyaaah!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Gyaaah!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 傘が頭に当たる。
MESSAGE.EN: Her parasol hit me in the head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her parasol hit me in the head.

MESSAGE.JP: って言うか、刺さる。
MESSAGE.EN: Or rather stabbed me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Or rather stabbed me.

MESSAGE.JP: …中庭を出る前ほどで、ようやく止まってくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Before we got out of the courtyard, she stopped.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Before we got out of the courtyard, she stopped.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…嘘をついてまで、わたしと手を繋ぎたかったんですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Did you want to hold my hand so badly that you lied?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Did you want to hold my hand so badly that you lied?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Y-yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Y-yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: いや、引きずられたり刺さったりまではしたくなかったけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, I didn't want to get dragged and stabbed...
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, I didn't want to get dragged and stabbed...

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…仕方がありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Well in that case.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Well in that case.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そっと手をつかむ。
MESSAGE.EN: She held my hand gently.
MESSAGE.Translation: She held my hand gently.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「少しだけ、ですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Just for a bit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Just for a bit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さん…ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san... thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san... thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…やむにやまれず、です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...You forced this on me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...You forced this on me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 数歩歩くと。
MESSAGE.EN: We walked a few steps.
MESSAGE.Translation: We walked a few steps.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…以上になります」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...That's it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...That's it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、ありがとう。本当に助かったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, thanks. You really helped me out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, thanks. You really helped me out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 額に傘の跡はついたけど。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though I have a scratch on my forehead from your parasol.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though I have a scratch on my forehead from your parasol.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…では」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Bye.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Bye.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 元の場所に戻っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: She went back to where she was.
MESSAGE.Translation: She went back to where she was.

MESSAGE.JP: ひとまず、これで目的は達成だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Anyway, I'd accomplished my objective.
MESSAGE.Translation: Anyway, I'd accomplished my objective.

MESSAGE.JP: 最後は…『２階廊下の消火器を３階に持っていく』。
MESSAGE.EN: My last objective is... ❛Take the second floor fire extinguisher to the third floor.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: My last objective is... ❛Take the second floor fire extinguisher to the third floor.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 消火器か。
MESSAGE.EN: The fire extinguisher, huh?
MESSAGE.Translation: The fire extinguisher, huh?

MESSAGE.JP: 廊下にあるんだけど、これを持っていけばいいのかな？
MESSAGE.EN: There's one in the hallway, but is it okay to take it?
MESSAGE.Translation: There's one in the hallway, but is it okay to take it?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「よっこいしょ…と」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There we go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There we go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: それほど重くないから、これなら大丈夫か。
MESSAGE.EN: It's not that heavy, so I should be okay.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's not that heavy, so I should be okay.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「理樹、そんなものをどうするんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Riki, what are you doing with that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Riki, what are you doing with that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 見つかってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: Somebody saw me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Somebody saw me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「３階に持っていくんだけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Taking it to the third floor.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Taking it to the third floor.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「何に使う。ぼやでも出たならともかく、勝手に動かしてはいけない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝To do what? Even if there's a small fire, you can't just move them around as you like.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝To do what? Even if there's a small fire, you can't just move them around as you like.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや～まったくその通りなんだけどね、一瞬だから見逃してっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well you're absolutely right, but could you look away for just a second.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well you're absolutely right, but could you look away for just a second.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「なんだその茶目っけたっぷりな言い方は…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What's with that playful way of talking...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What's with that playful way of talking...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「…まあ、一瞬だけだぞ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...Well, just for a second, okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...Well, just for a second, okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ありがとう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thanks...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thanks...❞

MESSAGE.JP: あんな言い逃れ方が謙吾に通じるんだ…意外だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo going along with that evasive way of talking... was unexpected...
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo going along with that evasive way of talking... was unexpected...

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ほぅ、重そうだな。どれ俺に貸してみろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Oh, that looks heavy. Let me see it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Oh, that looks heavy. Let me see it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ありがとう、大丈夫だから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thanks, but I'm okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thanks, but I'm okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「いつでも力になるぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I'll help you any time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I'll help you any time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、頼もしいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thanks, that's reassuring.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thanks, that's reassuring.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾と別れて３階を目指す。
MESSAGE.EN: I left Kengo and headed for the third floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: I left Kengo and headed for the third floor.

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「いい感じ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝That was perfect.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝That was perfect.❞

MESSAGE.JP: また後ろから彼女の声が。
MESSAGE.EN: Her voice came from behind me again.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her voice came from behind me again.

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「二人、当たりがついたわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝I sniffed out two suspects.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝I sniffed out two suspects.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうなんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Really...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Really...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 一体どこにこの人は隠れてるんだろう…さっぱりわからなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Where in the world was she hiding...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Where in the world was she hiding...?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうやって見つけてるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How'd you find them?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How'd you find them?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「まだ秘密よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝That's still a secret.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝That's still a secret.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「知ってるとそれを意識しちゃうでしょ？　だと意味がないのよねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝If you knew, you'd be conscious of it, right? And that would make this pointless.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝If you knew, you'd be conscious of it, right? And that would make this pointless.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それはそうだけど、だんだん頭がおかしな奴になっていく気がするよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's true, but I feel like I'm becoming more and more of a weirdo.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's true, but I feel like I'm becoming more and more of a weirdo.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「大丈夫よ、あなたはすでにおかしいから！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝It's okay. You are already weird!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝It's okay. You are already weird!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばん、と肩を叩かれる。
MESSAGE.EN: She hit me on the shoulder.
MESSAGE.Translation: She hit me on the shoulder.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、そうかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, was I...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, was I...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ちょっと照れてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I was kind of embarrassed.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was kind of embarrassed.

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「うわ…ほんとおかしいわ、あなた…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Woah... you really are weird...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Woah... you really are weird...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 引かれる。
MESSAGE.EN: She had a look of disgust on her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had a look of disgust on her face.

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「今は頑張って。あともう少しだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Bear with it for now. There's just a little more.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Bear with it for now. There's just a little more.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「次は昼休み？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What about lunch break?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What about lunch break?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「昼休みはいいわ。いつも通りに過ごして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Lunch break is fine. Do what you usually do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Lunch break is fine. Do what you usually do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「でも、何で神北さんだったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝But why Kamikita-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝But why Kamikita-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「でも、何で能美さんだったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝But why Noumi-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝But why Noumi-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「でも、何で西園さんだったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝But why Nishizono-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝But why Nishizono-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 本当にどこで見てるんだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Seriously, just where was she watching from...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Seriously, just where was she watching from...?

MESSAGE.JP: チャイムが鳴ると同時に隣の席の真人と談笑。
MESSAGE.EN: Once the school chime rang, I began chatting with Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: Once the school chime rang, I began chatting with Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: 喉が渇いてきた。真人は人の湿気まで吸い取ってるのではないか。
MESSAGE.EN: I was getting thirsty. Does Masato absorb even body moisture from people around him?
MESSAGE.Translation: I was getting thirsty. Does Masato absorb even body moisture from people around him?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「喉乾いたからジュース買ってくるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm thirsty, I'm gonna go buy something to drink.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm thirsty, I'm gonna go buy something to drink.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだよ、こいつは他人の湿気まで吸い取ってるんじゃねえか？　だからこんなにも暑苦しいんじゃねえか？　どうだ、この仮説は!?とでも言いたげだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What's this? 'Does he absorb even body moisture from people around him? Is that why it's always so stifling? How's this theory?' is what you looked like you're wanting to ask...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What's this? 'Does he absorb even body moisture from people around him? Is that why it's always so stifling? How's this theory?' is what you looked like you're wanting to ask...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやいやいや…（でもほぼ正解だ！）」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, no, no... (Although, you're almost right on the money)!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, no, no... (Although, you're almost right on the money)!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 自販機へ向かうその途中。
MESSAGE.EN: I was on my way to the vending machine, when...
MESSAGE.Translation: I was on my way to the vending machine, when...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 今は使われていない、旧称『第二美術室』のほうに、見知った姿を見つけた。
MESSAGE.EN: I spotted a familiar person in what was formerly called ❛the second fine arts classroom.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: I spotted a familiar person in what was formerly called ❛the second fine arts classroom.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was Kurugaya-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was Kurugaya-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（あの人、あんなところで何やってるんだろう）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(What's she doing there?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(What's she doing there?)

MESSAGE.JP: 第二美術室は、少し前まで美術部の部室代わりになっていて、今では完全に倉庫扱いをされている場所だ。
MESSAGE.EN: The second fine arts classroom had previously served as a club room for the fine arts club, but by now it had turned into something like a storehouse.
MESSAGE.Translation: The second fine arts classroom had previously served as a club room for the fine arts club, but by now it had turned into something like a storehouse.

MESSAGE.JP: とてもそんなところに用があるとは思い難かった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was very hard to imagine that anyone would have business in such a place.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was very hard to imagine that anyone would have business in such a place.

MESSAGE.JP: ていうか、また数学はサボるんだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: And, did she skip math class again...?
MESSAGE.Translation: And, did she skip math class again...?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「つかまりたくないなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't want to get caught by her...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't want to get caught by her...❞

MESSAGE.JP: さっさとジュースだけ買って教室に戻ることにしよう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I should go buy my drink already and get back to class...
MESSAGE.Translation: I should go buy my drink already and get back to class...

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は早足で自販機へ向かった。
MESSAGE.EN: I hurried to the vending machine.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hurried to the vending machine.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「やあ、少年。奇遇だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Hey, young man. What a coincidence.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Hey, young man. What a coincidence.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ぶっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Guh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Guh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …しかし回り込まれてしまった！
MESSAGE.EN: ...I ended up getting caught!
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I ended up getting caught!

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ていうか、なに!?　来ヶ谷さん、さっき校舎の中にいなかった!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, what's going on? Kurugaya-san, weren't you just in the school building!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, what's going on? Kurugaya-san, weren't you just in the school building!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「いや、いたが、それが何か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, I was, what about it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, I was, what about it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんで先に来るのさっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How'd you get here ahead of me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How'd you get here ahead of me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まあ…イリュージョンとでも言っておこう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well... let's say it was an illusion.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well... let's say it was an illusion.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、説明になってない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, that hardly explains a thing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, that hardly explains a thing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「理樹君、それは無粋というものだ。手品の種明かしなどしないほうがいいものだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Riki-kun, your question lacks refinement. It's better not to learn the secret behind the magic.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Riki-kun, your question lacks refinement. It's better not to learn the secret behind the magic.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、手品とかそんなんなの…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, that was a magic trick or something...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, that was a magic trick or something...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ああ、そんなんなのだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Yes, something like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Yes, something like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「よし、ちょうどいい。今日もお茶会としゃれ込もうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You're right on time. Let's have a tea party again today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You're right on time. Let's have a tea party again today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、あのさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, you know...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, you know...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「いやなに、今日も私のおごりだ。遠慮せずとも良い」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What's wrong? It's my treat today. No need to hold back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What's wrong? It's my treat today. No need to hold back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや他の要因で遠慮したいんだけどさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I've got another reason for holding back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I've got another reason for holding back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「はっはっは、別に私と噂になろうと一向に構わんぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Hahaha, I don't really mind if rumors begin spreading about us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Hahaha, I don't really mind if rumors begin spreading about us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ふむ、スキャンダラスなふたりだ。そう考えるとなかなか心躍るものがあるぞ、おねーさんは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Fumu, a scandalous couple. I get excited just thinking about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Fumu, a scandalous couple. I get excited just thinking about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 口で何を言っても無駄だ、と理解した。
MESSAGE.EN: I realized that it'd be useless trying to say anything.
MESSAGE.Translation: I realized that it'd be useless trying to say anything.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃ、僕はこ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then, I'll be g――❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then, I'll be g――❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「れで、といって逃げるなら無駄だと言っておこう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Going, is what you wanted to say, but it's no use running.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Going, is what you wanted to say, but it's no use running.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 読まれてる…。
MESSAGE.EN: She saw right through me...
MESSAGE.Translation: She saw right through me...

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「いやいや、絶好のお茶日和だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝My, my, isn't it perfect weather for drinking tea?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝My, my, isn't it perfect weather for drinking tea?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「こんな日にコンクリートの箱の中で、ただ数式を解き続けるなど犯罪の領域だ、全く」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝To seclude oneself in a concrete box solving mathematical equations on such a day would be criminal, seriously.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝To seclude oneself in a concrete box solving mathematical equations on such a day would be criminal, seriously.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 校則という法を犯している咎人が、木々の隙間からのぞく青空を見上げながら言う。
MESSAGE.EN: Says the criminal violating school regulations, while gazing at the blue sky through the gaps between tree branches and leaves.
MESSAGE.Translation: Says the criminal violating school regulations, while gazing at the blue sky through the gaps between tree branches and leaves.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「さて…では楽しいお茶会と行こう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Now then... let's go enjoy some tea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Now then... let's go enjoy some tea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言いながら、イーゼルを組み立て始める。
MESSAGE.EN: She said, setting up an easel.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said, setting up an easel.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「来ヶ谷さん、言ってる台詞と行動がリンクしてないんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kurugaya-san, I don't see how your actions relate to what you're saying.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kurugaya-san, I don't see how your actions relate to what you're saying.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ああ、なに、ただの手慰みだ。気にせずとも良い」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Aah, this? It's just something to keep my hands busy. Pay it no mind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Aah, this? It's just something to keep my hands busy. Pay it no mind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: イーゼルに隅の方が少し黄ばんだ、古そうなキャンバスを立て掛ける。
MESSAGE.EN: There was an old-looking canvas, slightly yellow in the corners, resting on the easel.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was an old-looking canvas, slightly yellow in the corners, resting on the easel.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「やはり素描には木炭がいい。一欠けのパンも用意してな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Charcoal is great for a rough sketch. I've prepared some bread as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Charcoal is great for a rough sketch. I've prepared some bread as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、絵とか描くんだったら僕教室戻っていいかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, if you're going to be drawing something, I'm heading back to class...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, if you're going to be drawing something, I'm heading back to class...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「モデルはキミだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You're the model.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You're the model.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ええっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eeh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eeh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「なに、楽にしてればよい。ただし逃げれば死」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What? Make yourself comfortable. However, if you run away, you'll die.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What? Make yourself comfortable. However, if you run away, you'll die.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haa...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haa...❞

MESSAGE.JP: とんでもない人につかまってしまった…。
MESSAGE.EN: I was caught by an outrageous person...
MESSAGE.Translation: I was caught by an outrageous person...

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…そうだな、理樹君は数学のテストが気になるか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...I see, are you worried about the math test, Riki-kun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...I see, are you worried about the math test, Riki-kun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: しゃしゃしゃ、と木炭のペンをキャンバスに走らせながら言う。
MESSAGE.EN: She asked while running a charcoal pencil across the canvas.
MESSAGE.Translation: She asked while running a charcoal pencil across the canvas.

MESSAGE.JP: よく見ると、キャンバスに画用紙を載せてあるもののようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I noticed then that there was a drawing paper set on the canvas.
MESSAGE.Translation: I noticed then that there was a drawing paper set on the canvas.

MESSAGE.JP: 画板を使わないのは、来ヶ谷さんなりのこだわりなのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: It might've been out of habit that she wasn't using a drawing board.
MESSAGE.Translation: It might've been out of habit that she wasn't using a drawing board.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、気になるといえばそうだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, you could say that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, you could say that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「そうか。まあ付き合ってもらっている礼と言ってはなんだが、この私が直々に教授してやろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I see. Well, as thanks for accompanying me, I'll give you a private lesson.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I see. Well, as thanks for accompanying me, I'll give you a private lesson.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…はぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Haa.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Haa.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんはちょっと席をはずすと、数学のテキストとルーズリーフの束を持って戻ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: She left her seat for a bit and returned holding a math textbook and some notes.
MESSAGE.Translation: She left her seat for a bit and returned holding a math textbook and some notes.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「さあ、解らないことがあったらなんでも訊くといい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Go ahead, if there's anything at all you don't understand, just ask.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Go ahead, if there's anything at all you don't understand, just ask.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　いや、まあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? Well, um...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? Well, um...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言っている間もキャンバスに線を引き続けている。
MESSAGE.EN: She continued moving her hand across the canvas as she said this.
MESSAGE.Translation: She continued moving her hand across the canvas as she said this.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そういえば、こないだの課題でわからないとこがあったんだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Now that you mention it, there was something I didn't get in our last homework.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Now that you mention it, there was something I didn't get in our last homework.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ほう、どのあたりだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Hoo, what part?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Hoo, what part?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ああ、見せずとも良い。聞けば解る」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Aah, no need to show me. I'll understand if you just tell me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Aah, no need to show me. I'll understand if you just tell me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sure...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sure...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ほんとかなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: For real?
MESSAGE.Translation: For real?

MESSAGE.JP: ひとまず、一緒に解説も載ってる例題を言ってみよう。
MESSAGE.EN: To begin with, I selected an example with the answer provided.
MESSAGE.Translation: To begin with, I selected an example with the answer provided.

MESSAGE.JP: まあ、空で答えられたらその時点でものすごいんだけど。
