MESSAGE.Translation: Perhaps they found the book when one of them accidentally kicked it across the floor.  That would have left them without a clue as to where it might have fallen from.

MESSAGE.JP: 彼女たちには、本の持ち主が分からなかったとしても無理はない。
MESSAGE.EN: It's not far fetched to assume they couldn't figure out whose book it was.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's not far fetched to assume they couldn't figure out whose book it was.

MESSAGE.JP: 仮定に仮定を重ねる話だから、自分でも考えすぎだとは思う。
MESSAGE.EN: Those were simply my assumptions through, and I was afraid that I was overthinking things.
MESSAGE.Translation: Those were simply my assumptions through, and I was afraid that I was overthinking things.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、もしそうなったとしたら。
MESSAGE.EN: But, if I was right.
MESSAGE.Translation: But, if I was right.

MESSAGE.JP: 誰の物とも分からない本を拾い上げる。
MESSAGE.EN: They picked up somebody else's book.
MESSAGE.Translation: They picked up somebody else's book.

MESSAGE.JP: 返したくても、返せない。
MESSAGE.EN: They wanted to return it, but couldn't.
MESSAGE.Translation: They wanted to return it, but couldn't.

MESSAGE.JP: 体育の授業も近づいている。
MESSAGE.EN: And P.E. was about to start.
MESSAGE.Translation: And P.E. was about to start.

MESSAGE.JP: 取り敢えず自分の机に入れておく。持ち主を探すのは後からでもできる。
MESSAGE.EN: So they probably put it in their own desk with the intention of searching for the owner later.
MESSAGE.Translation: So they probably put it in their own desk with the intention of searching for the owner later.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、忘れてしまった。あるいは、明日でもいいと思った。
MESSAGE.EN: But then they forgot about it. Or, perhaps, left it for tomorrow.
MESSAGE.Translation: But then they forgot about it. Or, perhaps, left it for tomorrow.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「彼女の机の中に、あるかも知れない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It might be inside one of the girls' desks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It might be inside one of the girls' desks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「彼女、ですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝One of the girls'?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝One of the girls'?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は昼休みの終わりに見たことを西園さんに伝えた。
MESSAGE.EN: I told her what I saw after lunch.
MESSAGE.Translation: I told her what I saw after lunch.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何の根拠もないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's just a guess though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's just a guess though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あの子たちの中の誰かが持っているかも知れない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝One of those girls might have it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝One of those girls might have it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…それは同時に、持っていないかも知れないということですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...But it's also possible that none of them have it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...But it's also possible that none of them have it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、確かめてみる価値はあると思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But I think it's worth investigating.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But I think it's worth investigating.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三人の顔を思い浮かべる。
MESSAGE.EN: I remembered their faces.
MESSAGE.Translation: I remembered their faces.

MESSAGE.JP: あまりしゃべったことはない。
MESSAGE.EN: I've never really had the chance to talk to them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I've never really had the chance to talk to them.

MESSAGE.JP: いきなり机を漁ったことを知られたら、きっと嫌われるだろうなあ…。
MESSAGE.EN: If they found out I searched their desks, they'd surely hate me...
MESSAGE.Translation: If they found out I searched their desks, they'd surely hate me...

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんも黙り込んでしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: She lapsed into silence.
MESSAGE.Translation: She lapsed into silence.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしが見張りをします」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I'll be the lookout.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I'll be the lookout.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、わかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「って、ちょっと待った。僕がやるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wha-, hold on. Am I the one doing it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wha-, hold on. Am I the one doing it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「そういう話の流れだと思ったのですが、違いましたか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I thought that's what you were getting at, was I mistaken?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I thought that's what you were getting at, was I mistaken?❞

MESSAGE.JP: いや、違うっていうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, rather than mistaken...
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, rather than mistaken...

MESSAGE.JP: 女の子の机の中を見るのは、同じ女の子の方が良いんじゃないかなあ。
MESSAGE.EN: Wouldn't it be better that a girl looks in another girl's desk?
MESSAGE.Translation: Wouldn't it be better that a girl looks in another girl's desk?

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「毒を食らわば皿まで、です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝In for a penny, in for a pound.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝In for a penny, in for a pound.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんか怖いこと言ってるし。
MESSAGE.EN: She just said something scary.
MESSAGE.Translation: She just said something scary.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はため息をひとつ吐く。
MESSAGE.EN: I sighed.
MESSAGE.Translation: I sighed.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「分かったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝All right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝All right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「誰か入ってきそうだったら、すぐに教えてね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Tell me right away if you see anyone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Tell me right away if you see anyone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ひとり目の机の中。
MESSAGE.EN: I tried the first desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried the first desk.

MESSAGE.JP: …なんか触った。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I felt something.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I felt something.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ひょっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hyah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hyah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぐにょってしたこれは…。
MESSAGE.EN: Something soft...
MESSAGE.Translation: Something soft...

MESSAGE.JP: 食パン？
MESSAGE.EN: Bread?
MESSAGE.Translation: Bread?

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「どうしたんですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Is something wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Is something wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、ううん。なにも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝N, no. It's nothing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝N, no. It's nothing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 他にも教科書やノート、辞書などが入っている。プリント類もたくさん。
MESSAGE.EN: There also were notes, dictionaries, handouts and other stuff.
MESSAGE.Translation: There also were notes, dictionaries, handouts and other stuff.

MESSAGE.JP: 多分、新学期早々、何も持ち帰ってないんだろうなあ。
MESSAGE.EN: She probably hadn't taken anything home yet, since it was the beginning of the new term.
MESSAGE.Translation: She probably hadn't taken anything home yet, since it was the beginning of the new term.

MESSAGE.JP: …あんまり、人のことは言えないけど。僕の机の中だって、そんなに綺麗じゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I wasn't one to talk though. My own desk was pretty messy.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I wasn't one to talk though. My own desk was pretty messy.

MESSAGE.JP: なるべく痕跡が残らないように手探りしてみるけど、文庫本の大きさの物はない。
MESSAGE.EN: I tried to search while disturbing as little as possible, but I couldn't find anything resembling a book.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried to search while disturbing as little as possible, but I couldn't find anything resembling a book.

MESSAGE.JP: それにしても、ごちゃごちゃだ。
MESSAGE.EN: But man, what a mess.
MESSAGE.Translation: But man, what a mess.

MESSAGE.JP: 女の子の机の中は必ずしも、ファンタジーではないらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Seems like girls' desks aren't necessarily all that tidy.
MESSAGE.Translation: Seems like girls' desks aren't necessarily all that tidy.

MESSAGE.JP: ふたり目の机の中。
MESSAGE.EN: I tried the second desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried the second desk.

MESSAGE.JP: こちらは、至って綺麗。手応えが何もない。
MESSAGE.EN: This one was immaculate. I couldn't find anything at all.
MESSAGE.Translation: This one was immaculate. I couldn't find anything at all.

MESSAGE.JP: 毎日、全部持ち帰っているのか。
MESSAGE.EN: Was she taking everything home with her every day?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was she taking everything home with her every day?

MESSAGE.JP: それはそれで、すごいな。
MESSAGE.EN: That's impressive in a way.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's impressive in a way.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんがドアの傍に立ちつつ、僕を見ている。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked at Nishizono-san, standing beside the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked at Nishizono-san, standing beside the door.

MESSAGE.JP: 無言で首を振ると、西園さんは無表情のまま僅かにうつむいた。
MESSAGE.EN: Without a word, I shook my head, and she emotionlessly hung her head in response.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without a word, I shook my head, and she emotionlessly hung her head in response.

MESSAGE.JP: さて、三人目。
MESSAGE.EN: Now, time to check the third desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: Now, time to check the third desk.

MESSAGE.JP: 伊藤さんの席だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Itou-san's desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: Itou-san's desk.

MESSAGE.JP: もとより、確率の低い可能性ではあったけれど、ここにもないとなると打つ手に困る。
MESSAGE.EN: The probability was even lower now, but if it weren't here either, I'd be out of clues.
MESSAGE.Translation: The probability was even lower now, but if it weren't here either, I'd be out of clues.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は一冊の本を、ゆっくりと取り出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I carefully took the book out.
MESSAGE.Translation: I carefully took the book out.

MESSAGE.JP: 地味なグリーンの表紙の文庫本。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a normal paperback book with a green cover.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a normal paperback book with a green cover.

MESSAGE.JP: ところどころのかすれは、持ち主が本を繰り返し読んでいることの証。
MESSAGE.EN: The cover was worn thin in places, proof that it had been thoroughly read many times by its owner.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cover was worn thin in places, proof that it had been thoroughly read many times by its owner.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Here it is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Here it is.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「違った、かな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Isn't this the one?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Isn't this the one?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「いいえ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Yes, it is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Yes, it is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 静かに首を横に振る。
MESSAGE.EN: She nodded her head quietly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She nodded her head quietly.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「これです。確かにこの本です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝That's the book. I'm certain it's my book.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝That's the book. I'm certain it's my book.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が本を手渡すと、愛おしそうにその胸に抱いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I handed it to her, and she carefully clasped it to her chest.
MESSAGE.Translation: I handed it to her, and she carefully clasped it to her chest.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「良かった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I'm so glad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I'm so glad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 本当に、嬉しそうな声だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Her voice was filled with genuine happiness.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her voice was filled with genuine happiness.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕も良かったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I am too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I am too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…どうしてですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Why?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Why?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さんが、そんな風に笑えるって分かったから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Because I now know that you can smile like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Because I now know that you can smile like that.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…直枝さんが言うと、そんな台詞にも嫌味がないですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Naoe-san, you're not making fun of me, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Naoe-san, you're not making fun of me, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: そう言って、たおやかに微笑んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She said as a smile brightened her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said as a smile brightened her face.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…ありがとうございました。…本当にありがとうございました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Thank you very much... Really, thank you very much...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Thank you very much... Really, thank you very much...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さん。ひとつ、いいかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san. Can I ask you something?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san. Can I ask you something?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「なんでしょうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝What is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝What is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「その本は、どんな本なのかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What kind of book is that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What kind of book is that?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんはしばらくの無言の後、口を開く。
MESSAGE.EN: She remained silent for a while, and then finally answered.
MESSAGE.Translation: She remained silent for a while, and then finally answered.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「卑怯ですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝That's not playing fair.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝That's not playing fair.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…やっぱり、そうかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I guess it's not.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I guess it's not.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「このタイミングではわたしが断れないことを分かっていて、それを訊くのですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝You knew I couldn't refuse to answer and still asked me anyway.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝You knew I couldn't refuse to answer and still asked me anyway.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…否定はできない…かも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I can't deny that... Probably.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I can't deny that... Probably.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「別に恩に着せよう、とか思ってる訳じゃないんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's not like I expected anything in return.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's not like I expected anything in return.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「前に西園さんは言ったよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You told me this before, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You told me this before, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「その本に書かれていることは、西園さんそのものだって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's written in that book is your own self.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's written in that book is your own self.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕は…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の言葉を途中で遮る。
MESSAGE.EN: She interrupted me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She interrupted me.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…どうぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 持っていた本を、僕に差し出す。
MESSAGE.EN: She handed me the book she was holding onto.
MESSAGE.Translation: She handed me the book she was holding onto.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝May I?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝May I?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…ここでダメですと言うほど、わたしは意地悪ではありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I'm not so rude as to say you can't at this point.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I'm not so rude as to say you can't at this point.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 『$K7若山牧水$K0歌集』
MESSAGE.EN: [$K7Bokusui Wakayama$K0 Poetry Collection]
MESSAGE.Translation: [$K7Bokusui Wakayama$K0 Poetry Collection]

MESSAGE.JP: 表紙の一番上には、そう書かれていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The title was written at the top of the cover.
MESSAGE.Translation: The title was written at the top of the cover.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「若山牧水…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Bokusui Wakayama...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Bokusui Wakayama...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 明治から大正にかけての歌人だということくらいは知っている。
MESSAGE.EN: I only knew that he was a poet who wrote from the Meiji period to the Taisho era.
MESSAGE.Translation: I only knew that he was a poet who wrote from the Meiji period to the Taisho era.

MESSAGE.JP: ぱらぱらとページをめくる。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned the worn-out pages.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned the worn-out pages.

MESSAGE.JP: どのページも、親指の当たるところが薄く汚れていた。
MESSAGE.EN: On each page, there was a discoloration where one would hold their thumb.
MESSAGE.Translation: On each page, there was a discoloration where one would hold their thumb.

MESSAGE.JP: 読み込まれている本には、特徴がある。
MESSAGE.EN: All books that are read have their own special characteristic.
MESSAGE.Translation: All books that are read have their own special characteristic.

MESSAGE.JP: 長い時間をかけて刻まれる持ち主の癖。
MESSAGE.EN: A long period of their owner's life is engraved onto their pages.
MESSAGE.Translation: A long period of their owner's life is engraved onto their pages.

MESSAGE.JP: 読んでいる人の心を映すような痕跡が。
MESSAGE.EN: It's like they're reflecting traces of their owner's heart.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's like they're reflecting traces of their owner's heart.

MESSAGE.JP: 本には開き癖があった。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a crease on the book's spine.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a crease on the book's spine.

MESSAGE.JP: そのページに来ると、引っかかるようにして指が止まる。
MESSAGE.EN: When my finger reached the page it was marking, it stopped as if held by it.
MESSAGE.Translation: When my finger reached the page it was marking, it stopped as if held by it.

MESSAGE.JP: 見開いた本が、ともするとばらけてしまいそうな程だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I opened the worn out book, which felt like it could fall to pieces if opened with too much force.
MESSAGE.Translation: I opened the worn out book, which felt like it could fall to pieces if opened with too much force.

MESSAGE.JP: この本は短歌集だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a collection of tanka.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a collection of tanka.

MESSAGE.JP: ひらがなにすれば三十一文字で終わる短歌が、一行置きに並べられている。
MESSAGE.EN: Each of them was thirty one syllables long.
MESSAGE.Translation: Each of them was thirty one syllables long.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんが繰り返し繰り返し、開いたページ。
MESSAGE.EN: This was the page she had turned to over and over again.
MESSAGE.Translation: This was the page she had turned to over and over again.

MESSAGE.JP: そのページに配置されたひとつの歌が、僕の心を捉える。
MESSAGE.EN: And the sole poem written on the page captivated my heart.
MESSAGE.Translation: And the sole poem written on the page captivated my heart.

MESSAGE.JP: 白鳥は哀しからずや空の青$dうみのあをにも染まず$dただよふ
MESSAGE.EN:
Bird with wings of white, I wonder, is she not sad?
 Left alone, ne'er touched
 by the blue of yonder sky, or the blue of hither sea.
MESSAGE.Translation:
Bird with wings of white, I wonder, is she not sad?
 Left alone, ne'er touched
 by the blue of yonder sky, or the blue of hither sea.

MESSAGE.JP: 小さく声に出して、読んでみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I read it aloud in a quiet voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: I read it aloud in a quiet voice.

MESSAGE.JP: 確か、国語の授業で習った憶えがある。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sure I learned it once in Japanese class.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sure I learned it once in Japanese class.

MESSAGE.JP: …その時は右から左だった気がするけれど。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I recall that I was supposed to read it from right to left at that time.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I recall that I was supposed to read it from right to left at that time.

MESSAGE.JP: その歌に喚起されて。
MESSAGE.EN: The words had a major impact on me.
MESSAGE.Translation: The words had a major impact on me.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はここが教室だということも忘れ。
MESSAGE.EN: I lost track of my surroundings.
MESSAGE.Translation: I lost track of my surroundings.

MESSAGE.JP: 今が夕方だということも忘れて。
MESSAGE.EN: And of time.
MESSAGE.Translation: And of time.

MESSAGE.JP: 青、を見た。
MESSAGE.EN: I saw the ❛blue.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: I saw the ❛blue.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 海だろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Was it the sea?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was it the sea?

MESSAGE.JP: 空だろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Or was it the sky?
MESSAGE.Translation: Or was it the sky?

MESSAGE.JP: ただ、ひたすらの青。
MESSAGE.EN: All around, an endless blue.
MESSAGE.Translation: All around, an endless blue.

MESSAGE.JP: それは――とても。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a very...
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a very...

MESSAGE.JP: とても、寂しい光景だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Very lonely scene.
MESSAGE.Translation: Very lonely scene.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はどの位の時間、そのページを開いたままにしていたんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder how long I kept this page open.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder how long I kept this page open.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…直枝さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: その声で、我に返る。
MESSAGE.EN: The sound of her voice brought me back to reality.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sound of her voice brought me back to reality.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、…ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah... I'm sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah... I'm sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「白鳥は哀しからずや空の青　うみのあをにも染まず　ただよふ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Bird with wings of white, I wonder, is she not sad? Left alone, ne'er touched by the blue of yonder sky, or the blue of hither sea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Bird with wings of white, I wonder, is she not sad? Left alone, ne'er touched by the blue of yonder sky, or the blue of hither sea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 流れるような声で、彼女は唄った。
MESSAGE.EN: She recited the poem, her voice flowing like a stream.
MESSAGE.Translation: She recited the poem, her voice flowing like a stream.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんだか…寂しい歌だね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This is... a lonely poem.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This is... a lonely poem.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「そう思いますか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Do you think so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Do you think so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うまく言えないけど…とても孤独感を覚えるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I can't put it into words, but... it really gives me a feeling of isolation.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I can't put it into words, but... it really gives me a feeling of isolation.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「青に混じることができずに、ひとり海を漂う白鳥の歌だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's a poem about a bird, unable to touch either the blue above or below it, just gliding over the sea all alone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's a poem about a bird, unable to touch either the blue above or below it, just gliding over the sea all alone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「この歌が西園さんは好きなんだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, do you like this poem, Nishizono-san...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, do you like this poem, Nishizono-san...?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしは寂しいとは思いません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I don't think it's lonely.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I don't think it's lonely.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「この歌は希望に満ちている――」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It's full of hope...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It's full of hope...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「そんな風にさえ思うんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝That's what I think.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝That's what I think.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 教室の窓から西陽が射す。
MESSAGE.EN: The setting sun was seeping through the window.
MESSAGE.Translation: The setting sun was seeping through the window.

MESSAGE.JP: 夕暮れ時を迎えていた。もう、青空はそこにない。
MESSAGE.EN: It was already dusk. The blue of the sky was already gone.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was already dusk. The blue of the sky was already gone.

MESSAGE.JP: 昼と夜のはざまに、僅かな時間だけ姿を現す茜色の空があった。
MESSAGE.EN: Outside the sky was crimson red, which showed itself only during the brief period between day and night.
MESSAGE.Translation: Outside the sky was crimson red, which showed itself only during the brief period between day and night.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は窓際に近づく。
MESSAGE.EN: I walked closer to the window.
MESSAGE.Translation: I walked closer to the window.

MESSAGE.JP: そこから、グラウンドの様子を見渡すことができる。
MESSAGE.EN: I could see across the sports field from there.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could see across the sports field from there.

MESSAGE.JP: まだ、みんな練習をしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone was still practicing.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone was still practicing.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴や来ヶ谷さんには『後で行くから』と伝えてある。
MESSAGE.EN: I had told Rin and Kurugaya-san that I'd be by later.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had told Rin and Kurugaya-san that I'd be by later.

MESSAGE.JP: もしかしたら、僕を待っているのかも知れない。
MESSAGE.EN: They might be waiting for me.
MESSAGE.Translation: They might be waiting for me.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は孤独じゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm not alone.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm not alone.

MESSAGE.JP: だけど、西園さんは――。
MESSAGE.EN: But, Nishizono-san...
MESSAGE.Translation: But, Nishizono-san...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…そろそろ練習に戻らないと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I need to get back to practice soon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I need to get back to practice soon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「野球ですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Baseball?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Baseball?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: （一緒にやらない？）
MESSAGE.EN: (Do you want to go with me?)
MESSAGE.Translation: (Do you want to go with me?)

MESSAGE.JP: その言葉が喉まで出かかる。
MESSAGE.EN: The words came to my mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: The words came to my mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、以前に断られている。ふたたび断られたら、もう二度と誘えないだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: But I had been turned down before. If I were turned down again, I might never have a chance to invite her again.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I had been turned down before. If I were turned down again, I might never have a chance to invite her again.

MESSAGE.JP: 結局、僕は言い出せなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: In the end, I didn't say anything.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the end, I didn't say anything.

MESSAGE.JP: けれど、西園さんが野球なんかやるだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: I doubted if she'd even want to play baseball.
MESSAGE.Translation: I doubted if she'd even want to play baseball.

MESSAGE.JP: そう思うと、僕は言い出すことができなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Thinking that I couldn't say a word.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thinking that I couldn't say a word.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「本は戻しておくね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll put the book back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll put the book back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…そうですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...All right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...All right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ここで持ち帰ってしまえば、明日、伊藤さんは入っているはずの本がないことに慌ててしまうだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: If she took the book back now, Itou-san would surely panic upon finding it gone tomorrow.
MESSAGE.Translation: If she took the book back now, Itou-san would surely panic upon finding it gone tomorrow.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「大丈夫、きっと明日になったら返してくれるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's all right, I'm sure she'll return it to you tomorrow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's all right, I'm sure she'll return it to you tomorrow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 不安そうな西園さんを励ますように言った。
MESSAGE.EN: I said as cheerfully as I could, since she looked uncertain.
MESSAGE.Translation: I said as cheerfully as I could, since she looked uncertain.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「そう…願います」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I... hope so.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I... hope so.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は伊藤さんの机の中に本を戻した。
MESSAGE.EN: I put the book back in Itou-san's desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: I put the book back in Itou-san's desk.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、またね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: グラウンドに向かおうとした、僕を西園さんが呼び止める。
MESSAGE.EN: I was heading for the field when Nishizono-san called out to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was heading for the field when Nishizono-san called out to me.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「あの…これから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Um... Would it be...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Um... Would it be...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「練習を見学しても、よろしいですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Would it be okay if I come and watch you practice now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Would it be okay if I come and watch you practice now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 一瞬、耳を疑う。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't believe my ears.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't believe my ears.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ほんとに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Really?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Really?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「以前に誘ったのは、直枝さんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝You're the one who invited me before.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝You're the one who invited me before.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「その誘いを、いまお受けしたからと言って、驚かれるのは失礼です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I am merely accepting your offer now, it's rude of you to look so surprised.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I am merely accepting your offer now, it's rude of you to look so surprised.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「いかがでしょう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝How about it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝How about it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、もちろん、大歓迎だよ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, of course, that'd be great!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, of course, that'd be great!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「よし、じゃあ行こうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝All right, shall we go then?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝All right, shall we go then?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「みんな、もうグラウンドに集まってると思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think they're all on the field now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think they're all on the field now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「そんなに慌てなくても、ご一緒しますから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝You don't have to be in such a hurry, I'll come with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝You don't have to be in such a hurry, I'll come with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あっ、ご、ごめん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, s, sorry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, s, sorry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんが日傘を広げて、夕暮れの空の下に出る。
MESSAGE.EN: She raised her parasol, and set out under the evening sky.
MESSAGE.Translation: She raised her parasol, and set out under the evening sky.

MESSAGE.JP: 少女が差す傘の影が長く伸びた。
MESSAGE.EN: The shadow from her parasol was long.
MESSAGE.Translation: The shadow from her parasol was long.

MESSAGE.JP: グラウンド。放課後。
MESSAGE.EN: At the baseball field. After school.
MESSAGE.Translation: At the baseball field. After school.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「遅くなって、ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry, I'm late.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry, I'm late.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「見学希望者を連れてきたんだけど、いいかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I brought along someone who wants to watch us practice, is that okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I brought along someone who wants to watch us practice, is that okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 白球を追っているみんなに声をかける。
MESSAGE.EN: I called out to the people chasing the white ball.
MESSAGE.Translation: I called out to the people chasing the white ball.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介がこちらを向く。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke looked at us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke looked at us.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「もちろん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Of course.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Of course.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 涼しげに快諾。
MESSAGE.EN: He expressed his consent in a refreshing tone.
MESSAGE.Translation: He expressed his consent in a refreshing tone.

MESSAGE.JP: 学年が違うから、ふたりは初対面のはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: He was a third year student, so it must have been their first time meeting.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was a third year student, so it must have been their first time meeting.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「三年の棗恭介だ。ええと、鈴とは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'm a third year, Kyousuke Natsume. Um... And Rin?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'm a third year, Kyousuke Natsume. Um... And Rin?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「同じクラスだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝They're in the same class.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝They're in the same class.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そっか。鈴が世話になっている。兄の恭介だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I see. Thank you for taking care of Rin. I'm her brother Kyousuke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I see. Thank you for taking care of Rin. I'm her brother Kyousuke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そう改めて挨拶をする。
MESSAGE.EN: He greeted her one more time.
MESSAGE.Translation: He greeted her one more time.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「はい。いつも窓から入ってこられるので存じてます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Yes. I know you, the one who always comes down from the window.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Yes. I know you, the one who always comes down from the window.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そっか。そりゃそうだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I see. Well that's how it is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I see. Well that's how it is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕たちのクラスでは恭介は有名人だ。
MESSAGE.EN: He was a celebrity in our class.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was a celebrity in our class.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「西園美魚と申します」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝My name is Mio Nishizono.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝My name is Mio Nishizono.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりはそうして挨拶を終えた。
MESSAGE.EN: And with that, their greetings concluded.
MESSAGE.Translation: And with that, their greetings concluded.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「理樹…入るのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki... Is she joining us?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki... Is she joining us?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の背中越しに窺うように鈴が訊いてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin asked, peeking out from behind me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin asked, peeking out from behind me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、まだわからないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm not sure yet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm not sure yet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…そうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: しばらく間がある。
MESSAGE.EN: After a small pause.
MESSAGE.Translation: After a small pause.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんが少し不安な顔をした。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san had a slightly troubled expression.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san had a slightly troubled expression.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ゆっくり見ていって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Watch us as long as you like.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Watch us as long as you like.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「はい、棗さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Okay, Natsume-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Okay, Natsume-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …第一次接近遭遇は、まずまずみたいでほっとする。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Their first encounter ever went smoothly enough, I felt relieved.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Their first encounter ever went smoothly enough, I felt relieved.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「見られると、緊張しますぅ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I get nervous when someone's watching me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I get nervous when someone's watching me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ほわあっ、エラーしたら、どうしよう、どうしよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Howa, what should I do, what if I mess up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Howa, what should I do, what if I mess up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「いや、おまえたちは普段から変わらんだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That'd be no different from what you always do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That'd be no different from what you always do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: パンパンっ、と恭介が手を叩く。
MESSAGE.EN: *Clap*clap*, Kyousuke clapped his hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Clap*clap*, Kyousuke clapped his hands.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「よし、じゃあ練習を続けるぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝All right, let's get back to practice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝All right, let's get back to practice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「今日は見学者もいるしな。気合い入れていこう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We have someone watching us today, show her the best you can do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We have someone watching us today, show her the best you can do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: グラウンドに入る前に、来ヶ谷さんが肩を叩いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Before I took the field, Kurugaya-san patted me on the shoulder.
MESSAGE.Translation: Before I took the field, Kurugaya-san patted me on the shoulder.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「よかったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I'm happy for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I'm happy for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「何があったかは知らないが、万事上手くいったようじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I don't know what happened, but it seems like everything worked out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I don't know what happened, but it seems like everything worked out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ、見目麗しくなるのはいいことだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Yep, it's good to see her looking her best again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Yep, it's good to see her looking her best again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「よくやった、少年」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well done, young man.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well done, young man.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そして、練習開始だ。
MESSAGE.EN: And so practice began.
MESSAGE.Translation: And so practice began.

MESSAGE.JP: みんな頑張って練習した。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone did their best during practice.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone did their best during practice.

MESSAGE.JP: …今日は、女子組がグラウンドの片隅に集まっているようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The girls seem to have all gathered in one corner of the field today.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The girls seem to have all gathered in one corner of the field today.

MESSAGE.JP: みんな頑張って練習した。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone did their best during practice.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone did their best during practice.

MESSAGE.JP: それは悪意と呼ぶほど、明確な意思ではないかも知れない。
MESSAGE.EN: Perhaps it couldn't even be called ill will.
MESSAGE.Translation: Perhaps it couldn't even be called ill will.

MESSAGE.JP: 持ち主の分からない本が床に落ちている。表紙がすり切れたような古い本だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It wasn't clear who the owner of the book lying on the floor was. It was old and the cover was tattered from much use.
MESSAGE.Translation: It wasn't clear who the owner of the book lying on the floor was. It was old and the cover was tattered from much use.

MESSAGE.JP: 『大切にされている』と思うと同程度の確率で『ゴミだ』と思う人もいるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: There were as many people who would think ❛That book must be important❜ as people who would think ❛It must be garbage.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: There were as many people who would think ❛That book must be important❜ as people who would think ❛It must be garbage.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は教室の後ろの隅に足を運んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I went to the corner in the back of the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: I went to the corner in the back of the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: ここまではさっきは探していない。きっと西園さんも探していないだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't look for it here before. I don't think Nishizono-san did either.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't look for it here before. I don't think Nishizono-san did either.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はゴミ箱の中に手を入れる。
MESSAGE.EN: I reached into the garbage can.
MESSAGE.Translation: I reached into the garbage can.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの方は見たくなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't want to look at Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't want to look at Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: でも…空だった。
MESSAGE.EN: But... it was empty.
MESSAGE.Translation: But... it was empty.

MESSAGE.JP: 掃除が終わった後だから、当然か。
MESSAGE.EN: They'd finished cleaning the classroom already, so it was only natural.
MESSAGE.Translation: They'd finished cleaning the classroom already, so it was only natural.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 不安げな声が聞こえた。
MESSAGE.EN: She asked in a worried tone.
MESSAGE.Translation: She asked in a worried tone.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なかったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It wasn't there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It wasn't there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もしかしたら…焼却場かも知れない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Maybe... It's in the waste incinerator.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Maybe... It's in the waste incinerator.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゴミ箱の中身を捨てに行った生徒が本に気づいたか、気づかなかったか分からない。
MESSAGE.EN: Did the students notice there was a book inside the trash can when they threw it away or not? I had no idea.
MESSAGE.Translation: Did the students notice there was a book inside the trash can when they threw it away or not? I had no idea.

MESSAGE.JP: 本当にゴミ箱に本が捨てられたかも分からない。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe they really threw away the book along with the rest of the trash.
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe they really threw away the book along with the rest of the trash.

MESSAGE.JP: すべては憶測に過ぎないんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That was only a guess though.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was only a guess though.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…どこに行くんですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Where are you going?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Where are you going?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「焼却炉に決まってるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝To the incinerator.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝To the incinerator.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…やめてください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Please don't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Please don't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 強い口調だった。
MESSAGE.EN: She said in an assertive tone.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said in an assertive tone.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「どうして、あるかないかも分からないのにそこまでするんですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Why are you going so far, even though you're not even sure whether it's really there or not?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Why are you going so far, even though you're not even sure whether it's really there or not?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まだ間に合うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I can still make it in time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I can still make it in time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「焼却炉に火が入るのは、もう少し後のはずだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝They're supposed to be burning the trash for a little longer.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝They're supposed to be burning the trash for a little longer.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さんが大切だって言う本が燃えてしまうかも知れないのに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Your precious book might get burned as well...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Your precious book might get burned as well...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…誰かには大切な物でも、他の誰かにはゴミに過ぎない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...What's precious to one person can be no more than trash to someone else.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...What's precious to one person can be no more than trash to someone else.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ただ、それだけの話です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝That's all it means.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝That's all it means.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「どうして、それを受け入れられないのですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Why can't you accept it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Why can't you accept it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうしてって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Because...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Because...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの瞳にあるのは、拒絶の光だった。
MESSAGE.EN: A light of denial flickered in her eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: A light of denial flickered in her eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしは、先ほど言ったとおりです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I already said it earlier.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I already said it earlier.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「本は見つからなくても構いません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I don't care if we can't find the book.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I don't care if we can't find the book.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「内容は覚えていますし、また買うこともできます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I've committed it to memory, and I can get a new one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I've committed it to memory, and I can get a new one.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の顔をじっと見る。
MESSAGE.EN: She was looking at me intently.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was looking at me intently.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さんの方が泣きそうな顔をしていますよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝You look like you're about to cry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝You look like you're about to cry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: わずかに表情を緩めた。
MESSAGE.EN: Her expression softened.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her expression softened.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「なにかつらい想い出でもあるのですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Some painful memory?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Some painful memory?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「でも…わたしは『わたし』です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝But... this is ❛me.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝But... this is ❛me.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「西園美魚は、直枝さんではありません…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Mio Nishizono is not Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Mio Nishizono is not Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしに自分を重ねても、無駄なことです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It's useless trying to feel as if you're me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It's useless trying to feel as if you're me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんなつもりは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That wasn't my int...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That wasn't my int...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ない、とは言い切れなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Intention, I tried to say but couldn't finish.
MESSAGE.Translation: Intention, I tried to say but couldn't finish.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I'm sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I'm sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さんが謝ることではありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝There's nothing to apologize for, Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝There's nothing to apologize for, Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「そもそも、あるかないかも分からない場所を探すのは非効率です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝There wasn't any use in searching since we don't even know if it's in here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝There wasn't any use in searching since we don't even know if it's in here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…箱を開けない限り、中のことは分からないのですから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...You won't know what's inside a box until you open it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...You won't know what's inside a box until you open it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「進んで開ける理由もないでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Then, why open it in the first place?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Then, why open it in the first place?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 結局、僕らはそれ以上本を探すのを止めた。
MESSAGE.EN: In the end, we gave up our search for the book.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the end, we gave up our search for the book.

MESSAGE.JP: 練習のために僕はグラウンドへ向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: I began heading back to the sports field.
MESSAGE.Translation: I began heading back to the sports field.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしは帰ります」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I'm going back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I'm going back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、それじゃあね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: その僕を呼び止める。
MESSAGE.EN: She called out to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She called out to me.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしがクラスでどう呼ばれているか知っていますか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Do you know what they call me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Do you know what they call me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: カゲナシ。
MESSAGE.EN: No shadow.
MESSAGE.Translation: No shadow.

MESSAGE.JP: 知っていたけど、面と向かっては言えなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I did know, but I couldn't say it to her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: I did know, but I couldn't say it to her face.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の沈黙を肯定と受け取ったようで、西園さんは話を続けた。
MESSAGE.EN: Taking my silence for an answer, she continued.
MESSAGE.Translation: Taking my silence for an answer, she continued.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ですから、直枝さんが気にすることはありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝That's why you shouldn't worry, Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝That's why you shouldn't worry, Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「誰も石ころを憎くて蹴る人はいません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝No one kicks a small pebble because they hate it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝No one kicks a small pebble because they hate it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「それと同じです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It's the same thing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It's the same thing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「本は不幸な偶然が重なって紛失したにすぎません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝The book was lost due to bad luck.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝The book was lost due to bad luck.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…僕はそこまで割り切ることはできないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I'm not so sure that's what happened.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I'm not so sure that's what happened.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんなに僕は落ち込んでいるように見えるのかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do I really look that upset to you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do I really look that upset to you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 悪意。
MESSAGE.EN: Ill will.
MESSAGE.Translation: Ill will.

MESSAGE.JP: そうとも言い切れない出来事にさえ、僕の心は揺れる。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though I couldn't be sure that was the case, I was shaken to my core.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though I couldn't be sure that was the case, I was shaken to my core.

MESSAGE.JP: たとえようのない、もやもやした気持ち。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a feeling of uncertainty, incomparable to anything else.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a feeling of uncertainty, incomparable to anything else.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしは気にしていませんから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It doesn't bother me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It doesn't bother me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さんも気にしないで下さい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝So it shouldn't bother you either, Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝So it shouldn't bother you either, Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: それは、西園さんなりの励ましらしいから。
MESSAGE.EN: She tried to encourage me in her own way.
MESSAGE.Translation: She tried to encourage me in her own way.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「また、明日ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll see you tomorrow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll see you tomorrow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 別れ際、僕は精一杯の声を出した。
MESSAGE.EN: I said in a loud voice as we parted.
MESSAGE.Translation: I said in a loud voice as we parted.

MESSAGE.JP: 気にしていないはずはない。
MESSAGE.EN: She couldn't be okay with this.
MESSAGE.Translation: She couldn't be okay with this.

MESSAGE.JP: だったら、どうして必死に本を探していたのか。
MESSAGE.EN: If she was, why was she so desperately looking for it at first?
MESSAGE.Translation: If she was, why was she so desperately looking for it at first?

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が一緒に探すと言ったときに、救われた顔をしたのか。
MESSAGE.EN: And when I offered to help, she looked as if her savior had appeared before her.
MESSAGE.Translation: And when I offered to help, she looked as if her savior had appeared before her.

MESSAGE.JP: いくらでも反論はできた。
MESSAGE.EN: There were plenty of arguments I could make.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were plenty of arguments I could make.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、できなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: But I didn't.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I didn't.

MESSAGE.JP: 別に気にすることでもないか…。
MESSAGE.EN: It's not something I should worry about...
MESSAGE.Translation: It's not something I should worry about...

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「何してんだよ、理樹っち」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What are you spacing out for, Rikicchi?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What are you spacing out for, Rikicchi?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ああ、行くよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Aah, let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Aah, let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 練習が再開される。
MESSAGE.EN: We resumed practice.
MESSAGE.Translation: We resumed practice.

MESSAGE.JP: ボールを追いながらも、目の端では西園さんのことを気にかけた。
MESSAGE.EN: Even during practice I was worried about Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even during practice I was worried about Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 地面に伸びる校舎の陰に、日傘を傾けて西園さんは立っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She was standing in the shadow of the school building holding the parasol in her hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was standing in the shadow of the school building holding the parasol in her hands.

MESSAGE.JP: みんなが帰った後、西園さんに話しかける。
MESSAGE.EN: After everyone left I asked her.
MESSAGE.Translation: After everyone left I asked her.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうだった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What did you think?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What did you think?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 賑やかないつもの調子に、西園さんはちょっと戸惑っているようには見えた。
MESSAGE.EN: She looked a little bewildered by the liveliness.
MESSAGE.Translation: She looked a little bewildered by the liveliness.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、いきなりは無理だろうけど、少しずつ馴染んでいけるんじゃないかって。
MESSAGE.EN: But it was only natural since it was all so sudden, maybe she'll get used to this noisy atmosphere little by little.
MESSAGE.Translation: But it was only natural since it was all so sudden, maybe she'll get used to this noisy atmosphere little by little.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな期待をした。
MESSAGE.EN: At least that's what I hoped.
MESSAGE.Translation: At least that's what I hoped.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「皆さん、とても楽しそうです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝You all look like you're having a lot of fun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝You all look like you're having a lot of fun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、そうでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You think so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You think so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「基本的にはバカばっかりだからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We're pretty much just fooling around.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We're pretty much just fooling around.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ですから…わたしには」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝But... It's...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝But... It's...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「少しばかり眩しすぎるようです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝A little too bright for me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝A little too bright for me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 遠くに空を見る。
MESSAGE.EN: She looked at the distant sky.
MESSAGE.Translation: She looked at the distant sky.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「この日傘がなければ、傍にいることもできないかも知れません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I probably wouldn't even be able to stand here, if not for this parasol.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I probably wouldn't even be able to stand here, if not for this parasol.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…だったら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕らが日傘になるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We'll become a parasol for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We'll become a parasol for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「みんなが日傘になれば、一緒にいられる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If we all become a parasol for you, you'll be able to be with us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If we all become a parasol for you, you'll be able to be with us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんがグラウンドに立つ姿を想像してみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I imagined how she'd be standing out on the field.
MESSAGE.Translation: I imagined how she'd be standing out on the field.

MESSAGE.JP: 白球追いかけ、とはさすがに無理かも知れないけど。
MESSAGE.EN: It'd probably be impossible for her to chase after the ball though.
MESSAGE.Translation: It'd probably be impossible for her to chase after the ball though.

MESSAGE.JP: 応援している姿を。
MESSAGE.EN: But I can imagine her standing there.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I can imagine her standing there.

MESSAGE.JP: 喉をからして、声を出す姿を。
MESSAGE.EN: Cheering for us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Cheering for us.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「相当、恥ずかしいことを言っているという自覚はありますか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Do you understand what embarrassing things you're saying?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Do you understand what embarrassing things you're saying?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…そうかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I am?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I am?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも僕は…本当にそう思ったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But... That's really what I think.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But... That's really what I think.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の言葉に西園さんは答えなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't respond to my words.
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't respond to my words.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…悪くないですね。こういうのも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...It's not too bad either. Something like this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...It's not too bad either. Something like this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ただ、小さくそう呟いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She only murmured quietly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She only murmured quietly.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「では、今日はこれで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝That's it for me for today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝That's it for me for today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「よかったら、また見に来てよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you don't mind, come back again and watch us sometime.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you don't mind, come back again and watch us sometime.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんは背中を向ける。
MESSAGE.EN: She turned her back to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She turned her back to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 返事はなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: There was no answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was no answer.

MESSAGE.JP: 願わくば。
MESSAGE.EN: I prayed.
MESSAGE.Translation: I prayed.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の期待が本当になる日が来ますように。
MESSAGE.EN: That my hopes would come true one day.
MESSAGE.Translation: That my hopes would come true one day.

MESSAGE.JP: みんな頑張って練習した。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone did their best during practice.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone did their best during practice.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「もうこんな時間か…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Is it this late already...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Is it this late already...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まだ続けるか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Should we continue?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Should we continue?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「よし、続けよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝All right, let's keep going.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝All right, let's keep going.❞

MESSAGE.JP: みんな頑張って練習した。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone did their best during practice.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone did their best during practice.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「よし、終わりにしよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝All right, let's call it a day.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝All right, let's call it a day.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「というわけで、旧家具部の部室の鍵を借りてきました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝And thus, I've borrowed a key for the former furniture club's clubroom.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝And thus, I've borrowed a key for the former furniture club's clubroom.❞

MESSAGE.JP: その日の練習後、前話したクドの部屋の家具を探しにいくことにした。
MESSAGE.EN: After the day's practice, we went in search of the furniture Kud had mentioned before.
MESSAGE.Translation: After the day's practice, we went in search of the furniture Kud had mentioned before.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そっか、じゃあ行こうかって、うあ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝All right, let's get going then, whoa!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝All right, let's get going then, whoa!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なにそのでっかい鍵」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's with this huge key?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's with this huge key?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドは５０センチほどの鈍色をした鍵を左腕で抱えている。
MESSAGE.EN: She was holding a key that was roughly 50cm in length.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was holding a key that was roughly 50cm in length.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「鍵です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It's a key.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It's a key.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そりゃ見ればわかるけど、なにその鍵…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No kidding, but what kind of key is that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No kidding, but what kind of key is that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「倉庫の鍵だそうです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It's the key for the storeroom.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It's the key for the storeroom.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「入ったらミノタウロスが出てきそうだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's like a minotaur will come out if you use it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's like a minotaur will come out if you use it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「アリアドネの糸玉も必要でしょうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Do we need Ariadne's thread too?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Do we need Ariadne's thread too?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…いや」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...No.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...No.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は腕組みをしながら答える。
MESSAGE.EN: I answered, crossing my arms.
MESSAGE.Translation: I answered, crossing my arms.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「むしろ必要なのは、テセウスだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What we really need is Theseus.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What we really need is Theseus.❞

MESSAGE.JP: さてその役を誰に頼もう？
MESSAGE.EN: So, who should we entrust this role to?
MESSAGE.Translation: So, who should we entrust this role to?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「というわけで、鈴、頼むよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, we're counting on you, Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, we're counting on you, Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「いいけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Well, fine...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Well, fine...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ふつうの扉だな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It's a normal door...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It's a normal door...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「テセウスさまー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Theseus-sama～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Theseus-sama～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴の腕にクドがからみついている。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud coiled around Rin's arm.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud coiled around Rin's arm.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「手乗りインコがなんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝So what's this thecodont parakeet?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝So what's this thecodont parakeet?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「『て』しか合ってないよ、鈴。それはともかく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The only part you got right was ❛The,❜ Rin, but anyhow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The only part you got right was ❛The,❜ Rin, but anyhow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「テセウスだってば。アテネの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Theseus was, well, Athen's...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Theseus was, well, Athen's...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 王子様、と言おうとして、僕は言い換えた。
MESSAGE.EN: Prince, I was going to say, but rephrased.
MESSAGE.Translation: Prince, I was going to say, but rephrased.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「英雄。謎の家具部倉庫探索を手伝ってよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A hero. O help us explore the mysterious furniture club warehouse.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A hero. O help us explore the mysterious furniture club warehouse.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「いいけど暇だし…でも、なんであたしだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝All right, I'm free anyway... but why me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝All right, I'm free anyway... but why me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何か出たら蹴り飛ばしてもらおうと思って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If something comes out, you'll kick it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If something comes out, you'll kick it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 不服そうな目で見られる。
MESSAGE.EN: She was looking at me with dissatisfaction in her eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was looking at me with dissatisfaction in her eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: まあ、実は、クドとなら仲良くなれるかなと引き合わせてみたわけだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, to be honest, I just thought she could get along with Kud, that's why I called her out.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, to be honest, I just thought she could get along with Kud, that's why I called her out.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「頼もしいですー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You're so reliable～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You're so reliable～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…わかったから腕離せ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...I get it already, let go of my arm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...I get it already, let go of my arm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ああ、いい感じだったのに。
MESSAGE.EN: Aah, just when it was going so well.
MESSAGE.Translation: Aah, just when it was going so well.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はぁい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Oka～y.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Oka～y.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドは鈴から離れると背伸びしながら鈴の隣を歩いている。
MESSAGE.EN: She stepped away from Rin, and began stretching her body while following Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: She stepped away from Rin, and began stretching her body while following Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴の仕草をまねているらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: She was mimicking Rin's movements.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was mimicking Rin's movements.

MESSAGE.JP: クドは、鈴がちらりと見る度に素知らぬふりを決め込んでいるけれどバレバレだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Every time Rin looked over at her, Kud tried to pretend like she wasn't doing anything, but it was all too obvious.
MESSAGE.Translation: Every time Rin looked over at her, Kud tried to pretend like she wasn't doing anything, but it was all too obvious.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「にしてもおっきな鍵だな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But man, this is one huge key...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But man, this is one huge key...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「まるで地下迷宮の扉に使うのみたいだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝As if it's used to open the door to an underground labyrinth.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝As if it's used to open the door to an underground labyrinth.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「それで、そのダンジョンとやらはどこだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝So, where's this dungeon or whatever?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝So, where's this dungeon or whatever?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あ、はい、こちらです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, yes, this way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, yes, this way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドがスカートのポケットの中から地図を取り出す。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud produced a map from within her pocket.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud produced a map from within her pocket.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「学校案内のパンフレットだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝A pamphlet with a layout of the school.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝A pamphlet with a layout of the school.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「微妙に懐かしいなぁ、それ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That sure takes me back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That sure takes me back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ここですね。１階の奥の階段から下りるようです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It should be here. Seems we need to take the stairs at the back of the first floor.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It should be here. Seems we need to take the stairs at the back of the first floor.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「校舎内にあるのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So it's inside the school...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So it's inside the school...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そんな大きな扉なんかあるのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Was there such a big door?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Was there such a big door?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まぁ、いってみればわかると思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, we'll see it soon enough.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, we'll see it soon enough.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は二人を促した。
MESSAGE.EN: I urged them on.
MESSAGE.Translation: I urged them on.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ふつうの扉だな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It's a normal door...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It's a normal door...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「大きくもないし、おまけにドアノブも普通だね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's not huge, and on top of that, the doorknob's normal too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's not huge, and on top of that, the doorknob's normal too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: これにどうしてそんな大きな鍵が必要なのか？
MESSAGE.EN: So, what's with the giant key?
MESSAGE.Translation: So, what's with the giant key?

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「いきなり難問ですねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝A difficult problem all of a sudden.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝A difficult problem all of a sudden.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は鍵をしげしげと見た。
MESSAGE.EN: I inspected the key closely.
MESSAGE.Translation: I inspected the key closely.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「とりあえず鍵穴に当ててみたらどーだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Why don't we try to put it in first?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Why don't we try to put it in first?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そうですね…よいしょっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝That's right... There we go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝That's right... There we go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ガシ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Clang*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Clang*!

MESSAGE.JP: 鍵の先っぽがドアノブに当たる。
MESSAGE.EN: The tip of the key hit the doorknob.
MESSAGE.Translation: The tip of the key hit the doorknob.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「…開きませんね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...It won't open...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...It won't open...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、鍵穴に入ってないからね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, that's because it doesn't fit in the keyhole...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, that's because it doesn't fit in the keyhole...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「理樹、なんか考えろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki, think of something.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki, think of something.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんかって、え？　僕は頭脳労働担当？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Think of something, huh? Am I in charge of brains here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Think of something, huh? Am I in charge of brains here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「理樹からそれをとったら、真人しか残らないぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝If we took that away from you, what's left is Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝If we took that away from you, what's left is Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ああ、それはまずい、考えるよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Aah, that's bad, I'd better think of something...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Aah, that's bad, I'd better think of something...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「うーん、ひょっとしたらこうドアに押し当てるとガショーンと開くとか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Hm... Maybe when you press on it it'll go ❛gashon❜ and open?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Hm... Maybe when you press on it it'll go ❛gashon❜ and open?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんな未来仕様だったらびっくりだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'd be surprised if such advanced technology were in use here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'd be surprised if such advanced technology were in use here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやそれはさっきもうやったでしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, we already tried that before.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, we already tried that before.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「わからないじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But you can't be sure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But you can't be sure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、わかるけど、じゃあまあ、やってみてよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I can, but all right, give it a try.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I can, but all right, give it a try.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はいっ。よいしょっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes. There!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes. There!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ガシガシ。
MESSAGE.EN: She pressed on the key.
MESSAGE.Translation: She pressed on the key.

MESSAGE.JP: もちろん、開くわけがない。
MESSAGE.EN: Of course, it didn't open.
MESSAGE.Translation: Of course, it didn't open.

MESSAGE.JP: なんでみんなその発想になるのか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Why is everyone getting this idea...
MESSAGE.Translation: Why is everyone getting this idea...

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ほらみろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝There, look.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝There, look.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ええー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eeh～...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eeh～...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「困りました…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝What a problem...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝What a problem...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ひょっとしたら、メンバーが足りないのでは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Could it be because we don't have enough members?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Could it be because we don't have enough members?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「いにしえの昔から初期メンバーだけではイカさんに倒されてしまいます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Like in the old days, when with just the original members you'd be wiped out by Ika-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Like in the old days, when with just the original members you'd be wiped out by Ika-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えぇ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eeh!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eeh!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: まあ、鈴の社交問題を考えると、増やすことに異議はないけど。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, since it'll give Rin a chance to socialize more, I don't really mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, since it'll give Rin a chance to socialize more, I don't really mind.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「というわけで、小毬さんなら何か思いつくんじゃないかと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So we thought maybe you could do something about it, Komari-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So we thought maybe you could do something about it, Komari-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふえ？　クーちゃんの家具探し、なんだよね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fue? So we're looking for furniture for Kuu-chan, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fue? So we're looking for furniture for Kuu-chan, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「一応は。そのつもりなんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Pretty much. That's our intention at least.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Pretty much. That's our intention at least.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドはこくこくと頷いている。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud nodded energetically.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud nodded energetically.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「りんちゃんも家具、探してるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Rin-chan, are you looking for furniture too?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Rin-chan, are you looking for furniture too?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あたしは…なんでいるんだっけ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'm... why was I here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'm... why was I here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「インカ皇帝ですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Pharaoh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Pharaoh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そう、皇帝だからだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Right, because I'm the pharaoh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Right, because I'm the pharaoh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、それはどういうボケなの…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What kind of joke is this...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What kind of joke is this...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「インコだったよね？　確か最初のボケって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Didn't you talk about a parakeet first...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Didn't you talk about a parakeet first...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ものすっごい偉いんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝A really great one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝A really great one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: えへん、と胸を反らす鈴。
MESSAGE.EN: She cleared her throat proudly and puffed her chest out.
MESSAGE.Translation: She cleared her throat proudly and puffed her chest out.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「皇帝陛下～っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Your majesty, the pharaoh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Your majesty, the pharaoh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドがまた鈴の腕にからみつく。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud coiled around Rin's arm again.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud coiled around Rin's arm again.

MESSAGE.JP: クドが鈴の腕にからみつく。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud coiled around Rin's arm.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud coiled around Rin's arm.

MESSAGE.JP: おおーここまで仲が深まるとは…。
MESSAGE.EN: Wow, I never thought they'd become so close...
MESSAGE.Translation: Wow, I never thought they'd become so close...

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、わかったよ。みんな困ってるんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yep, I got it. You're all in trouble, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yep, I got it. You're all in trouble, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「現状理解どうもありがとうございます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thanks for understanding our present status.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thanks for understanding our present status.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「じゃあ、私がんばるよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Then, I'll try my best.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Then, I'll try my best.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「この扉を開ければいいんだよね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I just have to open this door?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I just have to open this door?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうそう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Right, right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Right, right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Mm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Mm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「わかりそう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Think you can figure it out?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Think you can figure it out?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「わかったよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I have.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I have.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「さすが小毬さんなのですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝As expected of Komari-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝As expected of Komari-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「いくよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Here I go～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Here I go～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんは一歩扉から間を取る。
MESSAGE.EN: She stood one step from the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: She stood one step from the door.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ひらけごまっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Open sesame!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Open sesame!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ズターン。僕は滑った。
MESSAGE.EN: I fell to the floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: I fell to the floor.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…いや、いくらなんでもそれは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...No, no matter how many times you say that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...No, no matter how many times you say that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ヒラケゴマってなんかヒヨコグマに似てますねっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Open Sesame kind of reminds me of Sesame Street!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Open Sesame kind of reminds me of Sesame Street!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ひよことくまを足して割ったような変なキーホルダーを取り出して僕に示すクド。
MESSAGE.EN: She showed me a key chain with a weird, fluffy creature hanging on it.
MESSAGE.Translation: She showed me a key chain with a weird, fluffy creature hanging on it.

MESSAGE.JP: 女の子のセンスはよくわからない…。
MESSAGE.EN: I could never fathom a girl's tastes...
MESSAGE.Translation: I could never fathom a girl's tastes...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「クド、きみはしばらく黙ってなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud, you keep quiet for a while.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud, you keep quiet for a while.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「…は、はぁい…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...O, okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...O, okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドは部屋の鍵だろう、それがついたキーホルダーをポケットにしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: She returned the keychain back into her pocket.
MESSAGE.Translation: She returned the keychain back into her pocket.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あ、クーちゃん、その抱えている大きな鍵見せて？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ah, Kuu-chan, let me see that big key you're holding onto.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ah, Kuu-chan, let me see that big key you're holding onto.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「んぐ…ん…ん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ngu... mmm... mmm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ngu... mmm... mmm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドは口に手を当ててふるふると首を振っている。
MESSAGE.EN: She shook her head, holding her mouth shut with her hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: She shook her head, holding her mouth shut with her hands.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…クド、話していいから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Kud, you can talk now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Kud, you can talk now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あ、そうですか…はい、どうぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, sure... Here, take it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, sure... Here, take it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「意外と軽いんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝It's surprisingly light.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝It's surprisingly light.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふえ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fue?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fue?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうかした？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「これってなんかスロットあるみたいだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Isn't this something like a slot...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Isn't this something like a slot...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぱか、と鍵の先端が開く。
MESSAGE.EN: *Zing*. The front part of the key swung open.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Zing*. The front part of the key swung open.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「鍵だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝A key.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝A key.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鍵だね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A key it is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A key it is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんでこんな手の込んだことを…。
MESSAGE.EN: Why make it so complicated...
MESSAGE.Translation: Why make it so complicated...

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「永久に封印しておきたかったんだろう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝An eternal seal has been broken...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝An eternal seal has been broken...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「封印ってなに!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What seal!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What seal!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「とにかく開けてみましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Anyway, let's open it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Anyway, let's open it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばたん。
MESSAGE.EN: *Swing*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Swing*.

MESSAGE.JP: そして扉は開くのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: And the door opened.
MESSAGE.Translation: And the door opened.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ふつうの階段だね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's a normal staircase.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's a normal staircase.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「電気もあるし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝And electric lights.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝And electric lights.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ちょっと前までつかってたみたいだしね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝It seems to have been used recently.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝It seems to have been used recently.❞

MESSAGE.JP: カツカツ、とリノリウムの床を複数の靴音が叩く。
MESSAGE.EN: Click, clack. We walked down escorted by the sound of our footsteps on linoleum.
MESSAGE.Translation: Click, clack. We walked down escorted by the sound of our footsteps on linoleum.

MESSAGE.JP: 階段の踊り場をぐるり、と回ると、いかにもな通路に出た。
MESSAGE.EN: As we reached the foot of the stairs, a full-fledged passageway opened up before our eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: As we reached the foot of the stairs, a full-fledged passageway opened up before our eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: ダクトやいろいろな配線が天井を這っている。
MESSAGE.EN: A duct and various wires decorated the ceiling.
MESSAGE.Translation: A duct and various wires decorated the ceiling.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「本当に地下ってかんじだねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝It really feels like we're underground.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝It really feels like we're underground.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「エアコンとか下水のパイプかもしれないね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The pipe is probably for air conditioning or sewer drainage.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The pipe is probably for air conditioning or sewer drainage.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「突き当たりが倉庫みたいです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It seems like the storehouse should be at the end.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It seems like the storehouse should be at the end.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 地図を持っているクドが先導する。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud, who was holding a map, was leading the way.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud, who was holding a map, was leading the way.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴はその隣。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin was by her side.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin was by her side.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんと僕は懐中電灯を持っている。
MESSAGE.EN: Komari-san and I were holding flashlights.
MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san and I were holding flashlights.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あれ、行き止まりです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Huh, it's a dead end.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Huh, it's a dead end.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「クーちゃん、道間違えた？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Kuu-chan, you went the wrong way?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Kuu-chan, you went the wrong way?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「合ってると思うんですけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I don't think so, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I don't think so, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はクドの地図をのぞき込んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked at the map Kud was holding.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked at the map Kud was holding.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「確かにここは通路みたいだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There indeed should be a passageway here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There indeed should be a passageway here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 目の前にあるのは太いパイプ。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a thick pipe in front of us.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a thick pipe in front of us.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「設備を増やしたのかもしれない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝They may have installed more stuff, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝They may have installed more stuff, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「じゃ、こっちから行ってみよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Then, let's try this way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Then, let's try this way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだね、そうしよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Right, let's do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Right, let's do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんか湿っぽい…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It's kind of damp in here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It's kind of damp in here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うーん、ちょっと涼しすぎるねえ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yeah, it's a little too cool...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yeah, it's a little too cool...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「なんか出てきそうですねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It feels like something's about to appear.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It feels like something's about to appear.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何にも出てくるわけないじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Of course nothing's going to appear.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Of course nothing's going to appear.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「わああぁぁーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Woooah!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Woooah!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 大声を上げて慌てて飛び退く鈴。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin screamed and hastily jumped back.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin screamed and hastily jumped back.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なに、どうしたの!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What happened!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What happened!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴がいた場所に立つ。
MESSAGE.EN: I walked to the place where she stood before.
MESSAGE.Translation: I walked to the place where she stood before.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「排気口かな、風が出てるね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Looks like there's air coming out of an exhaust vent.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Looks like there's air coming out of an exhaust vent.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぶおおぉぉ…
MESSAGE.EN: *Fuooo*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Fuooo*.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は風ごときで大声を上げてしまったことを恥じているようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin was embarrassed about making a loud cry because of a little wind.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin was embarrassed about making a loud cry because of a little wind.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「風ですよ、鈴さんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It's just air, Rin-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It's just air, Rin-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ああっ、そんな追い打ちを。
MESSAGE.EN: Aah, she delivered the final blow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Aah, she delivered the final blow.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…もうみんな、これ以上ついてこなくていい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...I'm fine now, you don't have to follow me anymore.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...I'm fine now, you don't have to follow me anymore.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ここから先は…あたしひとりでいく…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝From here on... I'll go by myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝From here on... I'll go by myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「大丈夫だ…必ず助けてくる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Don't worry... I'll definitely save everyone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Don't worry... I'll definitely save everyone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「無理して強がってるところ悪いけど、まったく意味がわからないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I get that you're trying to act tough, but I have no idea what you're saying.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I get that you're trying to act tough, but I have no idea what you're saying.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「誰かが悪い人に捕まってるですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Was someone captured by a villain?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Was someone captured by a villain?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「もしあたしが帰ってこなかったらあの馬鹿兄貴に…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝If I don't make it back, please tell my stupid brother...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝If I don't make it back, please tell my stupid brother...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「いや…なんでもない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝No... forget it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝No... forget it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、そんな遺言めいたことを言い出さなくても無事帰ってこれるから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, you'll definitely get back so there's no reason to be making your last will.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, you'll definitely get back so there's no reason to be making your last will.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あれー？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Hu～uh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Hu～uh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 先に進んでいた小毬さんが声を上げる。
MESSAGE.EN: Komari-san, who'd already gone on ahead, called out.
MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san, who'd already gone on ahead, called out.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「また行き止まりだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Another dead end.❞
