MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Another dead end.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「また？　…今度はタンクか。どうなってるんだ一体」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Again? ...This time a tank, huh? What in the world is going on?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Again? ...This time a tank, huh? What in the world is going on?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あ、こっちに作業口があるようです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, there seems to be a maintenance passage here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, there seems to be a maintenance passage here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 横の狭い通路に、四つんばいで入っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a cramped passageway, which one could only get through by crawling on all fours.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a cramped passageway, which one could only get through by crawling on all fours.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うわ狭っ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Whoa, so cramped!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Whoa, so cramped!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ほわあっ！　クーちゃんそこちがうちがうっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Howa! Kuu-chan, not there!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Howa! Kuu-chan, not there!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あ、ここですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, then here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, then here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「やぁん、くすぐった、くすぐったいっ、そ、そこ、紐だから、紐だからーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Stop, it's tickling, tickling, d, don't pull on that strap!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Stop, it's tickling, tickling, d, don't pull on that strap!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は四つんばいで歩きながら前を見ることが出来ません。
MESSAGE.EN: I was crawling on all fours, unable to look ahead of me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was crawling on all fours, unable to look ahead of me.

MESSAGE.JP: 前で繰り広げられているだろう会話があまりにあまりだった。
MESSAGE.EN: What they were saying up ahead was just too much to handle.
MESSAGE.Translation: What they were saying up ahead was just too much to handle.

MESSAGE.JP: どうしたらいいんでしょうか。
MESSAGE.EN: What should I do?
MESSAGE.Translation: What should I do?

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「前向いたら蹴るから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝If you look this way, I'll kick you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝If you look this way, I'll kick you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ずっと後ろ向いてること」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Keep looking back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Keep looking back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「顔を後ろ向けたままでは進めません…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If I keep looking behind me I can't make it any further...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If I keep looking behind me I can't make it any further...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「がんばれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Good luck.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Good luck.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「横暴だ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Such a tyrant...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Such a tyrant...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「出ましたっ。ここでしょうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝We're out. Are we in the right place?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝We're out. Are we in the right place?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ごぅんごぅん、と機械が動いている。
MESSAGE.EN: There was some kind of machinery in operation.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was some kind of machinery in operation.

MESSAGE.JP: 発電機のようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It looked like a power generator.
MESSAGE.Translation: It looked like a power generator.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうみても違うねここは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No matter how you look at it, that's not it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No matter how you look at it, that's not it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「クーちゃん、道間違えた？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Kuu-chan, did you go the wrong way?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Kuu-chan, did you go the wrong way?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そーかもしれませんっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I pro～bably did!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I pro～bably did!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ポカっ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Pop*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Pop*.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わふっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafu!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafu!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴がぽかり、と軽くクドの頭を叩いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin bonked her lightly on the head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin bonked her lightly on the head.

MESSAGE.JP: おお、ツッコめるほどに仲が深まっている！
MESSAGE.EN: Oh, they were now close enough for Rin to use this kind of retort on her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Oh, they were now close enough for Rin to use this kind of retort on her.

MESSAGE.JP: それはともかく…
MESSAGE.EN: But in any case...
MESSAGE.Translation: But in any case...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「つまり地下で迷っちゃったのか僕たちは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝In other words, we've gotten lost in the basement...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝In other words, we've gotten lost in the basement...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「やっぱり糸玉が必要でしたねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I knew we needed a ball of thread.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I knew we needed a ball of thread.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そういう問題なのか…？
MESSAGE.EN: Is that the problem...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Is that the problem...?

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あ、扉はっけーんっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ah, found a door!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ah, found a door!❞

MESSAGE.JP: おおう、と僕たちはどよめいた。
MESSAGE.EN: We stirred up in excitement at the announcement.
MESSAGE.Translation: We stirred up in excitement at the announcement.

MESSAGE.JP: ぐるぐる回っているうちに見慣れたリノリウムの床。
MESSAGE.EN: It was the linoleum we'd gotten accustomed to while wandering around.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was the linoleum we'd gotten accustomed to while wandering around.

MESSAGE.JP: その先に扉がある。
MESSAGE.EN: And ahead of it was a door.
MESSAGE.Translation: And ahead of it was a door.

MESSAGE.JP: 『家具部倉庫』、と書いてあった。
MESSAGE.EN: There was ❛Furniture Club Storeroom❜ written on it.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was ❛Furniture Club Storeroom❜ written on it.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「また鍵が掛かってるみたいだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Looks like we need another key.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Looks like we need another key.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「この鍵で開くでしょうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Won't this key work?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Won't this key work?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴、その鍵っぽいモニュメントは使わないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin, that key-ish monument is unusable.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin, that key-ish monument is unusable.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は鍵っぽいオブジェを抱え直した。
MESSAGE.EN: She was holding the key-like object.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was holding the key-like object.

MESSAGE.JP: がちゃり。
MESSAGE.EN: *Clack*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Clack*.

MESSAGE.JP: 倉庫の扉が…
MESSAGE.EN: The door to the storeroom...
MESSAGE.Translation: The door to the storeroom...

MESSAGE.JP: …今、開く！
MESSAGE.EN: ...opened up!
MESSAGE.Translation: ...opened up!

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「あ、遅かったわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Oh, you're late.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Oh, you're late.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ズターン。
MESSAGE.EN: *Stumble*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Stumble*!

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は滑って倒れ込んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I fell to the floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: I fell to the floor.

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「あれ？　何疲れた顔をしてるわけ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Huh? Why do you all look so tired?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Huh? Why do you all look so tired?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「す、すみません、どこから寮長さんはみえたのでしょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝S, sorry, but how did you get here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝S, sorry, but how did you get here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「そこのエレベーターだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝I just used the elevator over there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝I just used the elevator over there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「エレベーター!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Elevator!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Elevator!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「机とか階段で運べないでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝You can't move something like a desk up the stairs, can you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝You can't move something like a desk up the stairs, can you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: …確かに。
MESSAGE.EN: ...That's right.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...That's right.

MESSAGE.JP: がちゃり、と鍵を閉める。
MESSAGE.EN: *Clack*, we turned the lock.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Clack*, we turned the lock.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕たちは無言だった。
MESSAGE.EN: We stood in silence.
MESSAGE.Translation: We stood in silence.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「やっぱり、封印指定しておこうよ…この鍵」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We should probably have it sealed off, after all... this lock, that is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We should probably have it sealed off, after all... this lock, that is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「そうだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Right...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Right...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あはは…は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ahahaha... ha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ahahaha... ha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ――使えそうな家具は、寮長の手配した業者のひとが、運んでくれるそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ――All furniture that seemed usable would be transported later by a person appointed by the dorm head.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――All furniture that seemed usable would be transported later by a person appointed by the dorm head.

MESSAGE.JP: 放課後いっぱい使って、そんなオチを抱えて帰る夕暮れなのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: The day wound down to evening, and our eventful after-school time came to an end.
MESSAGE.Translation: The day wound down to evening, and our eventful after-school time came to an end.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「小毬さんに訊いてみようか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's call Komari-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's call Komari-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 教室でもクドと一緒にいるところをよく見かけるし、小毬さんならきっと快く引き受けてくれるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I've often seen them together in class, so she'd surely agree to help.
MESSAGE.Translation: I've often seen them together in class, so she'd surely agree to help.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、おっけーですよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Mm, okay～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Mm, okay～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はいっ、ありがとうございますっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Thank you very much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Thank you very much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「でも、私倉庫の場所なんて知らないなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝But, I don't know where the storeroom is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝But, I don't know where the storeroom is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「そんな大きい鍵を使うんだから、きっととっても大きい扉なんだろうねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Seeing how huge this key is, there must be a huge door too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Seeing how huge this key is, there must be a huge door too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そういえばそうだね。そんな扉なんてあったっけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Now that you mention it, was there a door that huge?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Now that you mention it, was there a door that huge?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「まかせてくださいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Leave it to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Leave it to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドがスカートのポケットの中から地図を取り出す。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud produced a map from within her pocket.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud produced a map from within her pocket.

MESSAGE.JP: 一緒にいちごのキャンディが出てきた。
MESSAGE.EN: A strawberry candy fell out along with it.
MESSAGE.Translation: A strawberry candy fell out along with it.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あっ、そうです、忘れていました。これは単語帳のお礼なのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Oh, I forgot about this. It's a thank you gift for the flash cards.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Oh, I forgot about this. It's a thank you gift for the flash cards.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「わー、ありがと～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Wah, thanks～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Wah, thanks～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「おじい様が送ってくれた特別製の飴だそうです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝This is a special candy my grandfather sent me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝This is a special candy my grandfather sent me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「私もひとつ頂きましたが、とっても美味しいのですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I helped myself to one earlier, it was really tasty.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I helped myself to one earlier, it was really tasty.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「じゃあ、食べてみるよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I'll try eating it then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I'll try eating it then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 口の中に飴を入れる。
MESSAGE.EN: She popped it into her mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: She popped it into her mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: ぱぁぁー、と周囲に幸せオーラを振り撒くような笑顔に。
MESSAGE.EN: A smile, emitting an aura of happiness, hovered about her mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: A smile, emitting an aura of happiness, hovered about her mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ほわー、これはふっごいほいひいよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Howa, it's delicious～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Howa, it's delicious～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「それは良かったです～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'm glad you like it～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm glad you like it～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 本当に幸せそうな顔だった。
MESSAGE.EN: She looked amazingly happy.
MESSAGE.Translation: She looked amazingly happy.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんの幸せオーラを後ろに連れながら、クドの案内で目的地へ向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: Emanating an aura of happiness, she trailed after Kud who was leading the way.
MESSAGE.Translation: Emanating an aura of happiness, she trailed after Kud who was leading the way.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ここだそうですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Seems like this is the place.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Seems like this is the place.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「って、すごい普通のドアなんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh, looks like a perfectly normal door...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh, looks like a perfectly normal door...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うーん、この鍵を使うドアには見えないねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Hm... It doesn't look like the kind of door you could use this key on...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Hm... It doesn't look like the kind of door you could use this key on...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんがクドの手から鍵を取る。
MESSAGE.EN: She took the key from Kud.
MESSAGE.Translation: She took the key from Kud.

MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Hmmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Hmmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 腕を組んで考え出す。
MESSAGE.EN: She clasped her hands together, deep in thought.
MESSAGE.Translation: She clasped her hands together, deep in thought.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「お、何か思いついたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, did you think of something?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, did you think of something?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「小毬さん、もうひとついちご飴があったのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Komari-san, I've got one more strawberry candy left.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Komari-san, I've got one more strawberry candy left.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「わー、ありがと～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Waah, thanks～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Waah, thanks～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …空振りだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Not quite what I had in mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Not quite what I had in mind.

MESSAGE.JP: でも小毬さんは、とても幸せそうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: But Komari-san looked unbelievably happy.
MESSAGE.Translation: But Komari-san looked unbelievably happy.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「でも、困りましたねぇ…どうしたらいいのか全然わからないのです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝But, we're really in trouble... I don't know what we should do now...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝But, we're really in trouble... I don't know what we should do now...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「この鍵を使うのは間違いないんだよね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you sure we need to use this key?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you sure we need to use this key?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そのはずなのですが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'm pretty sure...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm pretty sure...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「開いたよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Opened it～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Opened it～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えっ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: …がちゃ、と音を立ててドアが開いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...*Clank*, the door opened.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...*Clank*, the door opened.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうやって開けたのこれ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How'd you do that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How'd you do that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「この鍵に仕掛けがあったんだよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝There was a mechanism in the key～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝There was a mechanism in the key～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: どうやら大きい鍵のなかに小さい鍵が仕込んであったようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It looks like there was a small key hidden inside the huge one.
MESSAGE.Translation: It looks like there was a small key hidden inside the huge one.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「全然気付きませんでした…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I didn't notice it at all...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I didn't notice it at all...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕も…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Me neither...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Me neither...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はっ、これはいちご飴ぱうあーなのでしょうかっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, is this strawberry candy powaa!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, is this strawberry candy powaa!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「きっと食べるととても感覚が鋭くなり、頭脳明晰聡明至極なのですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'm sure all your senses sharpen once you eat it, granting a clear head and endless wisdom.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm sure all your senses sharpen once you eat it, granting a clear head and endless wisdom.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …そんなことはないと思うけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I really doubt that...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I really doubt that...

MESSAGE.JP: 扉をくぐり、先に進んでいく。
MESSAGE.EN: Opening the door, we kept moving along.
MESSAGE.Translation: Opening the door, we kept moving along.

MESSAGE.JP: 辺りは所々に電気がついているものの、薄暗くてなんだか怪しげな雰囲気だった。
MESSAGE.EN: There were lights turned on in many places, but it was still dim and the atmosphere was suspicious.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were lights turned on in many places, but it was still dim and the atmosphere was suspicious.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うーん…なんだかジメジメしてるねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Hm... It's somewhat damp in here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Hm... It's somewhat damp in here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「だんじょんというものはジメジメしているものなのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Dungeons are supposed to be damp places.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Dungeons are supposed to be damp places.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふえー、そうなんだー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fue～, is that how it is?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fue～, is that how it is?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そうなのですー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝That's how it is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝That's how it is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: のーてんきなふたりを後ろに連れ、足元を照らしながら歩く。
MESSAGE.EN: They were chatting cheerfully, as I dragged along behind them, lighting their feet.
MESSAGE.Translation: They were chatting cheerfully, as I dragged along behind them, lighting their feet.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「しかし、この学校も珍しいよね。こんなとこがあるなんてさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But our school sure is strange, having a place like this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But our school sure is strange, having a place like this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「いろいろあるほうが面白くていいよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝It's fun when there's all kinds of places～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝It's fun when there's all kinds of places～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやまあ、そう言われるとそうなんだけどさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well yeah, you're probably right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well yeah, you're probably right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Oh!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Oh!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, what's wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, what's wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ねずみさんがそこ通ってったよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝A mouse scurried over there...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝A mouse scurried over there...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、ほんと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, really?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, really?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ま、まうすさんですかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝A, a mouse?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝A, a mouse?❞

MESSAGE.JP: まあ、この様子じゃそういうのがいてもおかしくないけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, given the kind of place we were in, it wasn't anything to be surprised by.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, given the kind of place we were in, it wasn't anything to be surprised by.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あんまり長居したいとこじゃないね…急ごう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't want to hang around here forever... Let's hurry it up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't want to hang around here forever... Let's hurry it up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 足を速めると。
MESSAGE.EN: I increased my pace.
MESSAGE.Translation: I increased my pace.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わふーっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafu～!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafu～!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: どしっ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Thump*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Thump*.

MESSAGE.JP: クドが尻餅を付いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud fell backward.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud fell backward.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふええっ、どうしたのっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fuee, what happened!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fuee, what happened!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「こ、ここーっ、こくろぉちぃ!!　ですーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ko, koko, kokuroachi!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ko, koko, kokuroachi!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ええっ!?　クーちゃんがすごいいい発音で英語を喋ったよ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Eeh!? Kuu-chan, your English pronunciation just now was amazing!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Eeh!? Kuu-chan, your English pronunciation just now was amazing!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「驚くべきところはそこじゃないと思う…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's not what you should be surprised about...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's not what you should be surprised about...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「こくろっちはとてもにがてなのですーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I can't stand kokuroaches!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I can't stand kokuroaches!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ま、まだその辺にいるのかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Is, is it still around here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Is, is it still around here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんに手を握られる。
MESSAGE.EN: She was clenching her hands together.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was clenching her hands together.

MESSAGE.JP: …小毬さんもやっぱり苦手らしい。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Seems like she isn't very fond of them either.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Seems like she isn't very fond of them either.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 周囲を懐中電灯で照らす。
MESSAGE.EN: I shined around with my flashlight.
MESSAGE.Translation: I shined around with my flashlight.

MESSAGE.JP: …とりあえず、もうどこかに隠れてしまったようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Seems like it hid itself somewhere.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Seems like it hid itself somewhere.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「クド、とりあえずもうだいじょうぶだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud, it's all right now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud, it's all right now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わふー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafu～...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafu～...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「こ、腰が抜けてしまって立てません～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I, I'm so scared, I can't stand～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I, I'm so scared, I can't stand～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「困ったねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's a problem...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's a problem...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「で、でもでもっ、またここでじっとしてたらこくろっちの大群が襲い掛かってくるかもしれませんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Bu, but but, if I stay here, a whole swarm of kokuroaches might come here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Bu, but but, if I stay here, a whole swarm of kokuroaches might come here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そうしたら私たちは全滅確定なのですっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝And we'll surely be completely annihilated!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝And we'll surely be completely annihilated!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「それはいやだよ…理樹君、どうしよう～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I don't want that... Riki-kun, what do we do～?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I don't want that... Riki-kun, what do we do～?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「しょうがないなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It can't be helped...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It can't be helped...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …結局、クドを僕が背負って先に進むことに。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I ended up carrying Kud on my back.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I ended up carrying Kud on my back.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「直枝さん、申し訳ないのです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Naoe-san, I'm so sorry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Naoe-san, I'm so sorry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ん、いいよ。クドは軽いしさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Mm, it's okay. You're light too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Mm, it's okay. You're light too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「なんだか理樹君はいいお父さんになりそうだねぇ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Seems like you'd make a good father, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Seems like you'd make a good father, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、そうかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, you think so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, you think so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わふー、なんだかちょっと照れてしまいます…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafuu, I'm blushing now...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafuu, I'm blushing now...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「では直枝さんと小毬さんが夫婦なのですねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Then, wouldn't that make Naoe-san and Komari-san a married couple?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Then, wouldn't that make Naoe-san and Komari-san a married couple?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふええっ!?　ふ、ふふふ夫婦っ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fuuue!? M, m, m, married couple!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fuuue!? M, m, m, married couple!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ほわあっ!!　そ、そんなまだ手も握った事…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Howa! Bu, but we haven't even held hands yet...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Howa! Bu, but we haven't even held hands yet...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、さっき握ったんじゃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, we did before...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, we did before...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「わ、わぁーっ、どどどうしようっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Wa, waa, wh, wha, what should I do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Wa, waa, wh, wha, what should I do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、別にどうにもしなくていいと思うけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't really think you need to do anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't really think you need to do anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 思考がどこまでも飛躍していっているようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Seems like her imagination was going out of control.
MESSAGE.Translation: Seems like her imagination was going out of control.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あっ、扉はっけんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ah, found a door!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ah, found a door!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんが指差す先に、『家具部倉庫』と書かれた扉が。
MESSAGE.EN: There was ❛Furniture Club Storeroom❜ written on the door Komari-san pointed at.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was ❛Furniture Club Storeroom❜ written on the door Komari-san pointed at.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、ようやく着いたか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, we finally made it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, we finally made it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「…あの、直枝さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Um... Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Um... Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Mm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Mm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「もうだいじょうぶなのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'm fine now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm fine now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、そっか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドを背中から降ろす。
MESSAGE.EN: I let Kud off my back.
MESSAGE.Translation: I let Kud off my back.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ありがとうございましたです。わふー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Thank you very much. Wafu～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Thank you very much. Wafu～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ちょっと照れくさそうに言う。
MESSAGE.EN: She blushed a little while thanking me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She blushed a little while thanking me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、中入ってみようか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, let's go inside.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, let's go inside.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「おっけーですよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「あ、遅かったわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Oh, you're late.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Oh, you're late.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ズターン。
MESSAGE.EN: *Stumble*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Stumble*!

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は滑って倒れ込んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I fell to the floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: I fell to the floor.

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「あれ？　何疲れた顔をしてるわけ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Huh? Why do you all look so tired?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Huh? Why do you all look so tired?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「す、すみません、どこから寮長さんはみえたのでしょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝S, sorry, but how did you get here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝S, sorry, but how did you get here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「そこのエレベータだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝I just used that elevator over there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝I just used that elevator over there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「エレベータ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Elevator!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Elevator!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「机とか階段で運べないでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝You can't move something like a desk up the stairs, can you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝You can't move something like a desk up the stairs, can you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: …確かに。
MESSAGE.EN: ...That's right.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...That's right.

MESSAGE.JP: がちゃり、と鍵を閉める。
MESSAGE.EN: *Clack*, we turned the lock.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Clack*, we turned the lock.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ごめんね小毬さん、なんかすごい無駄な事に巻き込んじゃって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm sorry, Komari-san, for getting you involved in something so meaningless.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm sorry, Komari-san, for getting you involved in something so meaningless.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふえ？　ううん、気にしないでいいよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fue? No, it's fine～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fue? No, it's fine～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、楽しかったからおっけーだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yep, I had fun, so it's okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yep, I had fun, so it's okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「私もちょっぴり楽しくて嬉しかったです～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'm happy as well, since I enjoyed it a little myself～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm happy as well, since I enjoyed it a little myself～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、うれしい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, happy?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, happy?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あ、あの…わふー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝U, um... Wafuu～...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝U, um... Wafuu～...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …照れくさそうにもじもじしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She was fidgeting around with embarrassment.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She was fidgeting around with embarrassment.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「クーちゃんは理樹君におんぶしてもらって嬉しかったんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Kuu-chan is happy you gave her a piggyback ride.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Kuu-chan is happy you gave her a piggyback ride.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はい、私はあまりおんぶしてもらったことがなかったので」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, I haven't had many chances to have someone carry me piggyback before.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, I haven't had many chances to have someone carry me piggyback before.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうなの？　僕の背中でよければいつでも貸すけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Really? If my back's fine with you, I can lend it to you anytime.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Really? If my back's fine with you, I can lend it to you anytime.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「は、はいっ、ありがとうございますですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ye, yes, thank you very much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ye, yes, thank you very much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「よかったね、クーちゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Isn't that great, Kuu-chan?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Isn't that great, Kuu-chan?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: その後寮長さんに話を聞くと、使えそうな家具は、寮長の手配した業者のひとが、運んでくれるそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Afterward, the dorm head told us that she'd arrange later for someone to transport all the furniture that seemed usable.
MESSAGE.Translation: Afterward, the dorm head told us that she'd arrange later for someone to transport all the furniture that seemed usable.

MESSAGE.JP: 放課後いっぱい使って、そんなオチを抱えて帰る夕暮れなのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: The day wound down to evening, and our eventful after-school time came to an end.
MESSAGE.Translation: The day wound down to evening, and our eventful after-school time came to an end.

MESSAGE.JP: 校舎内を探す。
MESSAGE.EN: We searched around in the school building.
MESSAGE.Translation: We searched around in the school building.

MESSAGE.JP: 校舎内に戻る。
MESSAGE.EN: We returned back to the school building.
MESSAGE.Translation: We returned back to the school building.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あの、どなたをお探しですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Um... Who are you looking for?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Um... Who are you looking for?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん辺りは暇してるんじゃないかとおもってさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I was just thinking that Haruka-san might be loafing around somewhere.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I was just thinking that Haruka-san might be loafing around somewhere.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そうでしょうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Do you think so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Do you think so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ええ、暇ですとも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yep, I am.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yep, I am.❞

MESSAGE.JP: がばっ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Grasp*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Grasp*.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わふーっ!!　また捕まってしまいましたーっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafuu! I've been caught again!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafuu! I've been caught again!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 突然現れた葉留佳さんに、クドが後ろから抱きかかえられていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san suddenly appeared from out of nowhere, and grabbed Kud from behind.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san suddenly appeared from out of nowhere, and grabbed Kud from behind.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そしてそのままバックドロッ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝And here comes a back dro...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝And here comes a back dro...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ごんっ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Slam*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Slam*.

MESSAGE.JP: 後ろの壁に葉留佳さんが頭をぶつけた!!
MESSAGE.EN: She hit her own head on the wall behind her!!
MESSAGE.Translation: She hit her own head on the wall behind her!!

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「のーぅっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Nooo!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Nooo!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 頭を抱えて倒れこむ。
MESSAGE.EN: She collapsed on the floor holding her head in her hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: She collapsed on the floor holding her head in her hands.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「い、いったぁーーーーっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝O, ow～!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝O, ow～!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あ、あの…だいじょうぶですか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝U, um... Are you all right...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝U, um... Are you all right...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うぅ…後方不注意だった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Uugh... I didn't notice what was behind me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Uugh... I didn't notice what was behind me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そりゃ後ろに壁があるのにバックドロップする人はいないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think there's anyone else on this planet who would try to do a backdrop in front of a wall...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think there's anyone else on this planet who would try to do a backdrop in front of a wall...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「はるちん、猛反省」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Haruchin, thoroughly reflected on her actions.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Haruchin, thoroughly reflected on her actions.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「次はちゃんとリングの上でバックドロップしようっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Next time, I'll properly do a backdrop in the ring.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Next time, I'll properly do a backdrop in the ring.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「がんばってくださいっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Good luck with that!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Good luck with that!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あははは任せといてっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ahaha, leave it to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ahaha, leave it to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …よくわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I don't get it.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I don't get it.

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず事情を話すと。
MESSAGE.EN: I filled her in on the details.
MESSAGE.Translation: I filled her in on the details.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん、いいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yep, okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yep, okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そうですかっ、ありがとうございますっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Really, thank you very much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Really, thank you very much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「では三枝さんがテセウスさまなのです～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Then, Saigusa-san is Theseus-sama.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Then, Saigusa-san is Theseus-sama.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「よーしっ、なんかよくわかんないけど、このせてうす様に任せといてっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝All right, I don't really get it, but leave everything to this Theteus-sama.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝All right, I don't really get it, but leave everything to this Theteus-sama.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「テセウスだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's Theseus.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's Theseus.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …本当にこの人でよかったんだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Was inviting her really a good idea...?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Was inviting her really a good idea...?

MESSAGE.JP: ひとまず、目的の扉の前に移動する。
MESSAGE.EN: We set off toward the designated door.
MESSAGE.Translation: We set off toward the designated door.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「はい？　これ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Huh, that's it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Huh, that's it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「えーと、そのはずですけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Um... That should be it, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Um... That should be it, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドがスカートのポケットの中から地図を取り出す。
MESSAGE.EN: She produced a map from within her pocket.
MESSAGE.Translation: She produced a map from within her pocket.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あったねそんなの。学校案内のパンフレットだっけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I remember this, it's a pamphlet with the school layout.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I remember this, it's a pamphlet with the school layout.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「微妙に懐かしいなぁ、それ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That sure takes me back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That sure takes me back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「やはりここで間違いないようですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝There's no mistake, this should be the right place.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝There's no mistake, this should be the right place.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「んでも、鍵それでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But, is that the key?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But, is that the key?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドの持つでっかい鍵を指差す。
MESSAGE.EN: She pointed at the key Kud was holding in her hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: She pointed at the key Kud was holding in her hands.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「どこに鍵穴があるんでしょうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Where could the keyhole be?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Where could the keyhole be?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「よっし、貸してっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝All right, give it here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝All right, give it here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、見つけたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, did you find it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, did you find it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ここに違いないっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝No doubt it's here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝No doubt it's here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: でっかい鍵を受け取ると、ドアノブについた鍵穴にあてがう。
MESSAGE.EN: She took the gigantic key and tried inserting it into the keyhole on the doorknob.
MESSAGE.Translation: She took the gigantic key and tried inserting it into the keyhole on the doorknob.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あれ？　入らないよ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Huh? It doesn't go in!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Huh? It doesn't go in!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そりゃあ、サイズが全然違うのは見ればわかるでしょ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, don't you think the size is entirely incompatible...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, don't you think the size is entirely incompatible...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いや近づけたら鍵が穴にピッタリ合うように変化するとかさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, maybe the keyhole would've changed its size when you put the key near it, to match it perfectly?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, maybe the keyhole would've changed its size when you put the key near it, to match it perfectly?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんなサイバーな仕掛けはないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There can't be such a cyber mechanism in there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There can't be such a cyber mechanism in there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんでみんなその発想になるんだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Why is everyone getting such ideas...
MESSAGE.Translation: Why is everyone getting such ideas...

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「う、なにその『このひと役にたたなそー』って顔っ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ugh, what's with that ❛this person will prove to be useless❜ look on your face!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ugh, what's with that ❛this person will prove to be useless❜ look on your face!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんな顔はしてないけどちょっとそう思ったよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I wasn't making such a face, even tho I was thinking about it a little...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I wasn't making such a face, even tho I was thinking about it a little...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だいじょうぶだってっ、これからすっごい役に立つよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'm telling you it'll be fine, I'll be very useful from now on.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'm telling you it'll be fine, I'll be very useful from now on.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うっ、歯切れ悪ぅ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ugh, such foul disposition...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ugh, such foul disposition...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「役に立つといえば、輪ゴムはとても役に立つと思いますっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Speaking of usefulness, I think a rubber band is very useful.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Speaking of usefulness, I think a rubber band is very useful.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、立つね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, it is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, it is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私輪ゴム以下になったー!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Is my standing lower than that of a rubber band!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Is my standing lower than that of a rubber band!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Oh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Oh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「なにこれ、なんかついてるけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What's that, there's something stuck to it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What's that, there's something stuck to it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鍵の先端をいじると。
MESSAGE.EN: She touched the front part of the key.
MESSAGE.Translation: She touched the front part of the key.

MESSAGE.JP: ぱか、と開いた。
MESSAGE.EN: *Zing*, it opened.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Zing*, it opened.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「鍵ですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It's a key.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It's a key.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 中から小さい鍵が出てきた。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a small key inside.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a small key inside.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おー、私役に立った？　役に立った？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Oh, was I useful? Was I useful?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Oh, was I useful? Was I useful?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ばっちりなのですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Perfectly useful.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Perfectly useful.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「やはー、やったねっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yahoo, I've done it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yahoo, I've done it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドとふたりで、ぱぁん、と手を叩き合わせる。
MESSAGE.EN: She high-fived Kud.
MESSAGE.Translation: She high-fived Kud.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「輪ゴム以下から脱出したところで、行ってみようか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I escaped from being lower than a rubber band, so let's get going.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I escaped from being lower than a rubber band, so let's get going.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 懐中電灯を取り出し、中に入っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: I took out a flashlight and we stepped inside.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took out a flashlight and we stepped inside.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おー、電気は一応ついてるんだ。ところどころ切れてるけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Oh, there are lights. They're only working here and there, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Oh, there are lights. They're only working here and there, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「少し前までは普通に使われていたらしいですからねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It seems to have been used a little, recently.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It seems to have been used a little, recently.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「気をつけなよー、もしかしたらその辺から…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Watch out, who knows what's over there...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Watch out, who knows what's over there...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「悪霊ぼーんっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝A ghost bang!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝A ghost bang!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ひゃあっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Hyaa!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Hyaa!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…とか出てくるかもしれませんからネ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...might actually appear.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...might actually appear.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そ、そうなのですかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I, is that so...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I, is that so...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「悪霊はヤバいんだよー。ミニ子だったらあっという間に取り殺されちゃうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ghosts are dangerous. If it's a Shorty like you, you'll get possessed and murdered in an instant.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ghosts are dangerous. If it's a Shorty like you, you'll get possessed and murdered in an instant.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わ、わふー…悪霊ごーすとは怖いのです～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wa, wafu～... Evil ghousto are scary.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wa, wafu～... Evil ghousto are scary.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやまあ、心配しなくてもそんなのでないからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, no need to worry, there aren't any here anyway.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, no need to worry, there aren't any here anyway.❞

MESSAGE.JP: さらに地下を進む。
MESSAGE.EN: We proceeded further into the basement.
MESSAGE.Translation: We proceeded further into the basement.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「待ったーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hold it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hold it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え…何を？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh... What's wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh... What's wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ここからはもっと慎重にいかないと！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝If we don't act carefully right here!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝If we don't act carefully right here!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「その辺のパイプから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝From that pipe over there...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝From that pipe over there...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「精製マスタードガスぼーんっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Boom! Pure mustard gas!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Boom! Pure mustard gas!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わああーっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Waaa!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Waaa!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…とかあるかもしれませんからネ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...might actually happen.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...might actually happen.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そ、そうなのですかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I, is that so...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I, is that so...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「マスタードガスはやばいよー。クド公１０人の一個小隊なんて余裕で壊滅しちゃうからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Mustard gas is dangerous. A platoon of 10 Little Kuds would be completely wiped out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Mustard gas is dangerous. A platoon of 10 Little Kuds would be completely wiped out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ビラン性でびらんびらんだよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You'll get all inflamed from the inflammatory gas.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You'll get all inflamed from the inflammatory gas.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わ、わふー…ますたーどがすはだぶる怖いのです～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝W-wafuu... masutado gasu is twice as scary～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝W-wafuu... masutado gasu is twice as scary～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやまあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 何でマスタードガスなんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Why mustard gas...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why mustard gas...?

MESSAGE.JP: ちなみに精製されたマスタードガスは無色無臭なので、本当にやばい。
MESSAGE.EN: And pure mustard gas is colorless and odorless. That would be really dangerous.
MESSAGE.Translation: And pure mustard gas is colorless and odorless. That would be really dangerous.

MESSAGE.JP: 今度は葉留佳さんがいつの間にか先頭になっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: This time Haruka-san took the lead before I knew it.
MESSAGE.Translation: This time Haruka-san took the lead before I knew it.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「曲がり角だっ!!　あぶなーいっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That corner! It's dangerous!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That corner! It's dangerous!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わふーっ!?　で、でんじゃらーすなのですかっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafuu!? De, denjarous!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafuu!? De, denjarous!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや危ない事も何もないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, it's not dangerous or anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, it's not dangerous or anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんを抜かして先に進む。
MESSAGE.EN: I passed by Haruka-san and went on ahead.
MESSAGE.Translation: I passed by Haruka-san and went on ahead.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くんは知らないのですよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun, you don't know this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun, you don't know this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「実はこのダンジョンには大ボスがいて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝There's actually a powerful boss in this dungeon...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝There's actually a powerful boss in this dungeon...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「くまぼーんっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝A bear bang!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝A bear bang!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わひゃぁーっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wahyaa!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wahyaa!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…とかなるかもしれませんからネ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...might actually exist here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...might actually exist here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「悪いけど、この辺にくまはいないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry, there aren't any bears around here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry, there aren't any bears around here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「それがいるから怖いんですヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It'd be scary if there was one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It'd be scary if there was one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、いないから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, there isn't...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, there isn't...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それに話も聞いたことないし…大騒ぎになるでしょ、普通」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And this is the first I've heard about it... Such a thing would normally cause an uproar.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And this is the first I've heard about it... Such a thing would normally cause an uproar.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うぅ…うんちゃら・ざ・ぷーくらいはいるかもしれないじゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Er... whatever-the-pooh might be waiting for us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Er... whatever-the-pooh might be waiting for us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ボクのハチミツぅ～とか言いながら曲がり角から突然姿を現すかも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝He might appear, saying something like ❛My ho～ney,❜ just around the corner.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝He might appear, saying something like ❛My ho～ney,❜ just around the corner.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うわぁっ、我ながら怖いですヨこれは!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Whoa, that's plenty scary I'd say!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Whoa, that's plenty scary I'd say!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いても怖くないし、それ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That wouldn't be scary even if it happened...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That wouldn't be scary even if it happened...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「えー？　くまぷー怖いんだよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Eh? But isn't Winnie-the-pooh scary?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Eh? But isn't Winnie-the-pooh scary?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「プータローの大熊さん（４２）が襲い掛かってきたらどうするんだよっ!!　ミニ子だったら瞬殺だよ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What if a big unemployed bear (age 42) attacked you? It would mean instant death for someone like Shorty!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What if a big unemployed bear (age 42) attacked you? It would mean instant death for someone like Shorty!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わふー…プータローの大熊さん（４２）はとりぷる怖いのです～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafuu... Big unemployed bear (age 42) is tripuru scary.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafuu... Big unemployed bear (age 42) is tripuru scary.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、いないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, there isn't one here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, there isn't one here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: この人に構っているとひたすら時間だけが過ぎていくようだった…。
MESSAGE.EN: Paying attention to her is just a waste of my time...
MESSAGE.Translation: Paying attention to her is just a waste of my time...

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず、騒がしい葉留佳さんがいちいち足を止めたものの、問題なく目的地に到達。
MESSAGE.EN: Once the noisy Haruka-san quieted down, we finally reached our destination.
MESSAGE.Translation: Once the noisy Haruka-san quieted down, we finally reached our destination.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、着いたね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, we've arrived.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, we've arrived.❞

MESSAGE.JP: みれば、『家具部倉庫』、と書いてあるドアが。
MESSAGE.EN: There was ❛Furniture Club Storeroom❜ written on the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was ❛Furniture Club Storeroom❜ written on the door.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ラッキーガールなはるちんがいたおかげで、スムーズに到達出来ましたネ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Because you had Lucky Girl Haruchin with you, you made it through safely.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Because you had Lucky Girl Haruchin with you, you made it through safely.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「さいぐささん・いず・らっきーがーる・おぅけーなのですかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Saigusa-san izu raki garl, okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Saigusa-san izu raki garl, okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なぜおぅけーがつくのかはよくわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: Why she added ❛okay❜ at the end was beyond me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Why she added ❛okay❜ at the end was beyond me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あんまり騒がしくしなかったらもっと早かったんだろうけどね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It would had been faster if you didn't mess around so much, though...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It would had been faster if you didn't mess around so much, though...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「まあまあ、それは置いておいて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well now, don't mention it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well now, don't mention it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「とりあえずさっさと探しましょー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Let's start searching already.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Let's start searching already.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 中に入っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: We stepped inside.
MESSAGE.Translation: We stepped inside.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…あれ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、今度はなんなのさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, what is it this time?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, what is it this time?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「見覚えがあるなーとか思って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It seems like I've been here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It seems like I've been here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「あら、丁度よかったわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝My, you're just in time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝My, you're just in time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長さんが部屋に入ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: The dorm head was inside the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: The dorm head was inside the room.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、あれ？　寮長さんはどこから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh? How did you get here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh? How did you get here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「え？　そこのエレベータから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Eh? I just used that elevator over there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Eh? I just used that elevator over there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あー、あー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Aah, aah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Aah, aah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そうそう、ここエレベータで降りてくるところでしたネ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Right, right, you can get here by elevator.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Right, right, you can get here by elevator.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えぇーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eeh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eeh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「知ってたならもっと早く言ってよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why didn't you tell us this earlier...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why didn't you tell us this earlier...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いやー、なんか地下探索とか楽しそうで…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, exploring the basement seemed like fun, so...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, exploring the basement seemed like fun, so...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「手段と目的がすりかわってたってやつですヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝The journey kinda became the goal.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝The journey kinda became the goal.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「ところで、三枝さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝By the way, Saigusa-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝By the way, Saigusa-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「う、あ、はい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ugh, yes?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ugh, yes?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「またあなた門限を…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Did you go off somewhere after curfew again...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Did you go off somewhere after curfew again...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あ、あははははっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ah, ahahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ah, ahahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あっちに忘れ物しちゃったっ!!　取ってくるねっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I forgot something over there! I'll go get it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I forgot something over there! I'll go get it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、なんか忘れる要素あったっけ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, was there something to forget?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, was there something to forget?❞

MESSAGE.JP: …葉留佳さんはドアの向こうに逃げていった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She ran out the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She ran out the door.

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「まったく、困ったものね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Geez, what a troublesome person.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Geez, what a troublesome person.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「でも、あっちはまっくらで…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝But, it's pitch dark out there...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝But, it's pitch dark out there...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「わぁぁーーっ!!　悪霊がぁーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Waa! A ghost!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Waa! A ghost!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「マスタードガスがぁーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Mustard gas!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Mustard gas!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「大熊さんがぁーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝A big bear!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝A big bear!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 絶叫が響いてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Her frantic screams echoed in the basement.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her frantic screams echoed in the basement.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんかよくわかんないけど、天罰でも下ったのかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't really get it, but seems like divine punishment has befallen her...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't really get it, but seems like divine punishment has befallen her...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「嘘から出た真、なのですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It's a lie that became the truth.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It's a lie that became the truth.❞

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず葉留佳さんを救出する。
MESSAGE.EN: I should go help her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I should go help her.

MESSAGE.JP: …辺りにはゴミ袋（悪霊と思われる）とねりからし（マスタードガスと思われる）、それにくまのぬいぐるみ（大熊さんと思われる）が落ちていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...there were a trash bag (that she thought was a ghost), mustard paste (that she thought was mustard gas), and a stuffed bear (that she thought was a big bear) lying nearby.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...there were a trash bag (that she thought was a ghost), mustard paste (that she thought was mustard gas), and a stuffed bear (that she thought was a big bear) lying nearby.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ううっ、くそー…誰かの仕掛けたトラップですヨ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Uggh, dammit... It was a trap somebody set up...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Uggh, dammit... It was a trap somebody set up...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「悔しいからそのまま元に戻しておこっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's frustrating, so let's set it again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's frustrating, so let's set it again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、多分もう誰も引っかかる事はないと思うけどね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I don't think anyone else will set it off...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I don't think anyone else will set it off...❞

MESSAGE.JP: その後話をよく聞くと、使えそうな家具は、寮長の手配した業者のひとが、運んでくれるそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Afterward, the dorm head told us that she'd specially arrange later for someone to transport all the furniture that seemed usable.
MESSAGE.Translation: Afterward, the dorm head told us that she'd specially arrange later for someone to transport all the furniture that seemed usable.

MESSAGE.JP: 放課後いっぱい使って、そんなオチを抱えて帰る夕暮れなのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: The day wound down to evening, and our eventful after-school time came to an end.
MESSAGE.Translation: The day wound down to evening, and our eventful after-school time came to an end.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「開いたぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It's open.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It's open.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、あれっ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 瞬時に何のトラブルもなく話が進んでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: She instantly solved the puzzle without any problems.
MESSAGE.Translation: She instantly solved the puzzle without any problems.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はあ…来ヶ谷さんはすごいのですねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Haa... Kurugaya-san, you're amazing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Haa... Kurugaya-san, you're amazing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: どうやらあのでかい鍵に仕込み杖のような仕掛けがあって、そこからドア用の鍵を見つけ出して開けたようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Turns out the key was like a hollow cane, and inside it was hidden another key meant to be used on the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: Turns out the key was like a hollow cane, and inside it was hidden another key meant to be used on the door.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ、じゃあ突入するか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, let's go inside then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, let's go inside then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …この分だと、あっという間に…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...If things keep up like this, in the blink of an eye we'll...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...If things keep up like this, in the blink of an eye we'll...

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「着いたぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝We're here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝We're here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 『あっ』という暇すらなく目的を達成してしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: Faster than ❛in the blink of an eye,❜ we arrived at our destination.
MESSAGE.Translation: Faster than ❛in the blink of an eye,❜ we arrived at our destination.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ん、どうした？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Mm, what's the matter?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Mm, what's the matter?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや…あんまりにも問題なさ過ぎてさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well... It's just there weren't any problems at all...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well... It's just there weren't any problems at all...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「問題が無いのはいいことなのですよ。じゃあ、えーと、どれに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It's great when there's no problems. Um... Which should I take...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It's great when there's no problems. Um... Which should I take...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「なるほど、それもそうだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I see, that's true as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I see, that's true as well.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんが僕の手の懐中電灯に手を伸ばす。
MESSAGE.EN: She extended her hand to the flashlight in my hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: She extended her hand to the flashlight in my hand.

MESSAGE.JP: …そして、スイッチを切った。
MESSAGE.EN: ...And turned it off.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...And turned it off.

MESSAGE.JP: 同時に、辺りの光も一斉に消えた!!
MESSAGE.EN: At the same time, all the lights around us went out!
MESSAGE.Translation: At the same time, all the lights around us went out!

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わ、わふーっ!!　まっくらやみやみなのですっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wa, wafuu! Is it a pitchblackdarkout!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wa, wafuu! Is it a pitchblackdarkout!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょ、そんな悪戯…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's with the prank...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's with the prank...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 懐中電灯のスイッチを入れなおすと。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned on the flashlight.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned on the flashlight.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんの姿はなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san was nowhere to be seen.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san was nowhere to be seen.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…い、一体どこに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Where in the world did she go...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Where in the world did she go...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あ、あの…もし来ヶ谷さんが私たちを置いて行ってしまったのなら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝U, um... If she left us behind...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝U, um... If she left us behind...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「私たちは、どうやって帰ればいいのでしょうか…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝How will we get back...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝How will we get back...?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 当然、この状況で道なんか覚えてやしない。
MESSAGE.EN: Naturally, I hadn't memorized the way.
MESSAGE.Translation: Naturally, I hadn't memorized the way.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「どどどどうしましょうっ!!　このままじゃ私たちがミノタウロスですっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wh, wh, wh, wh, what should we do!! At this rate the minotaur will come for us!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wh, wh, wh, wh, what should we do!! At this rate the minotaur will come for us!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そういえばミノタウロスは迷宮の中で食べ物はどうしていたんでしょうかっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Speaking of which, what was the minotaur eating in the labyrinth!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Speaking of which, what was the minotaur eating in the labyrinth!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: …よほどテンパっているのか、どうでもいいことまで口から飛び出してきているようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She seemed to be in such a panic she was just blurting out whatever came to her mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She seemed to be in such a panic she was just blurting out whatever came to her mind.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやまあ、クド落ち着いて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, take it easy, Kud...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, take it easy, Kud...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「も、もうだめです!!　でもミノタウロスはひとりでしたが、私たちはふたりなのでまだマシかもしれませんっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝We, we're done for! But, the minotaur is alone, and there are two of us, it could be worse still!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝We, we're done for! But, the minotaur is alone, and there are two of us, it could be worse still!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ポジティブなのかネガティブなのかわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: Was she thinking positively or negatively...
MESSAGE.Translation: Was she thinking positively or negatively...

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ですからこのまま出られなくてもささやかながら幸せな家庭を築きましょうっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝But, if we can't get out of here, let's build a small but happy family together!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝But, if we can't get out of here, let's build a small but happy family together!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ふつつかものですがよろしくお願いしますっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'm inexperienced, but please take care of me!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm inexperienced, but please take care of me!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え…プロポーズ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh... Are you proposing to me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh... Are you proposing to me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「待て、そんな楽しそうな事になるなら私も混ぜろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Hold it, if it becomes that much fun, count me in too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Hold it, if it becomes that much fun, count me in too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんが戻ってきた!!
MESSAGE.EN: She came back!
MESSAGE.Translation: She came back!

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「クド、ナイス！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud, nice one!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud, nice one!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あ、はい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「しまった…ついエサに釣られてしまったか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Damn it... I was lured out here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Damn it... I was lured out here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言ってることはやばいけど、とりあえずそれは保留にする。
MESSAGE.EN: What she just said was dangerous, but let's put that on hold for now...
MESSAGE.Translation: What she just said was dangerous, but let's put that on hold for now...

MESSAGE.JP: また逃げられたら本当に困る…。
MESSAGE.EN: It'll be a real problem if she runs out on us again...
MESSAGE.Translation: It'll be a real problem if she runs out on us again...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「来ヶ谷さん、ちょっと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kurugaya-san, wait...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kurugaya-san, wait...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 腕を掴もうと手を伸ばす。
MESSAGE.EN: I reached out to grab her arm.
MESSAGE.Translation: I reached out to grab her arm.

MESSAGE.JP: …もにゅ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...*Boin*.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...*Boin*.

MESSAGE.JP: 何かとても柔らかいものに手が触れた。
MESSAGE.EN: My hand touched something soft.
MESSAGE.Translation: My hand touched something soft.

MESSAGE.JP: もにゅもにゅ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Boin*boin*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Boin*boin*.

MESSAGE.JP: そしてとてもおおきい。
MESSAGE.EN: And something very big.
MESSAGE.Translation: And something very big.

MESSAGE.JP: ずだぁーーんっ!!
MESSAGE.EN: *Whoop*!!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Whoop*!!

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわあぁぁぁっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Woaah!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Woaah!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ごろごろっ、
MESSAGE.EN: *Roll*roll*,
MESSAGE.Translation: *Roll*roll*,

MESSAGE.JP: どしぃーんっ!!
MESSAGE.EN: *Ka-chack*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Ka-chack*!

MESSAGE.JP: …思いっきり両手で突き飛ばされた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She flung me away with both arms.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She flung me away with both arms.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「人の胸を無断で触るとはいい度胸だ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You have some nerve, touching someone's breasts without permission...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You have some nerve, touching someone's breasts without permission...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「とりあえずキサマは今日からおっぱい魔人とあだ名を付け呼んでやろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝From now on, you shall be called the boobs demon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝From now on, you shall be called the boobs demon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ご、ごめん、不可抗力だから…っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝S, sorry, it was out of my control...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝S, sorry, it was out of my control...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ふん…まあ、いい。今回ばかりは許してやろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Hmph... Well, fine. I'll forgive you this time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Hmph... Well, fine. I'll forgive you this time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: でも称号は消えないのか…。
MESSAGE.EN: But she's not taking the title back...
MESSAGE.Translation: But she's not taking the title back...

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「で、でもこれからどうするのですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝B, but what are we going to do from here on?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝B, but what are we going to do from here on?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「どうするも何も、目的地はすぐそこだぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It's not a matter of doing anything, our destination is right over there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It's not a matter of doing anything, our destination is right over there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 『家具部倉庫』、と書いてあるドアを指差す。
MESSAGE.EN: She pointed to a door with ❛Furniture Club Storeroom❜ written on it.
MESSAGE.Translation: She pointed to a door with ❛Furniture Club Storeroom❜ written on it.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「い、いえ…帰りはどうすればいいんでしょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝N, no... What'll we do about getting back?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝N, no... What'll we do about getting back?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ん？　中にエレベータがあるから、それで上がればいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Mm? There's an elevator inside, just use that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Mm? There's an elevator inside, just use that.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「あ、遅かったわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Oh, you're late.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Oh, you're late.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 中に入ると、エレベータから寮長さんがちょうど降りてきていた。
MESSAGE.EN: As we stepped inside, we saw the dorm head coming out of the elevator.
MESSAGE.Translation: As we stepped inside, we saw the dorm head coming out of the elevator.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あるんだ、エレベータ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So there really is one...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So there really is one...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「え？　ええ、わざわざ扉の方から回ってきたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Eh? Eeh, did you go around all the way and come through the door?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Eh? Eeh, did you go around all the way and come through the door?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやまあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 一体なんだったんだろう、今までの苦労は…。
MESSAGE.EN: Just why did we struggle through all that...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Just why did we struggle through all that...?

MESSAGE.JP: そもそも、あんまり苦労もしてないか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Though, we didn't actually struggle through anything...
MESSAGE.Translation: Though, we didn't actually struggle through anything...

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まあさっさと運び出すか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Let's get everything moved.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Let's get everything moved.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「来ヶ谷さん、知ってたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kurugaya-san, you knew about this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kurugaya-san, you knew about this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ん？　まあ楽しかったし問題ないだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Mm? Well, it was fun, so there's no problem.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Mm? Well, it was fun, so there's no problem.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「おっぱい魔人も役得だったようだしな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝The boobs demon was a side benefit too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝The boobs demon was a side benefit too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや…まだ腰が痛むんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Not really... my back still hurts...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Not really... my back still hurts...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 話をよく聞くと、使えそうな家具は、寮長の手配した業者のひとが、運んでくれるそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The dorm head told us that she'd specially arrange later for someone to transport all the furniture that seemed usable.
MESSAGE.Translation: The dorm head told us that she'd specially arrange later for someone to transport all the furniture that seemed usable.

MESSAGE.JP: 放課後いっぱい使って、そんなオチを抱えて帰る夕暮れなのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: The day wound down to evening, and our eventful after-school time came to an end.
MESSAGE.Translation: The day wound down to evening, and our eventful after-school time came to an end.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「というわけで、真人、頼むよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, we're counting on you, Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, we're counting on you, Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おう、力仕事なら任せときなって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Sure, if it requires strength leave it to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Sure, if it requires strength leave it to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「テセウスさまです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Theseus-sama.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Theseus-sama.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「謎の家具部倉庫探索を手伝ってほしいんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We want you to help us explore the mysterious furniture club warehouse.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We want you to help us explore the mysterious furniture club warehouse.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「よしっ、こい！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝All right, come on!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝All right, come on!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあまあ、まだ目的地にすら着いてないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well now, we haven't actually arrived there yet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well now, we haven't actually arrived there yet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「にしてもでけぇ鍵だな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝But man, this is one huge key...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝But man, this is one huge key...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「もしかして…すげぇでかい奴が棲んでるんじゃねぇのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Could it be... there's something big living there?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Could it be... there's something big living there?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ねぇと思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think not.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think not.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そっか。で、場所は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I see. So, where's this place?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I see. So, where's this place?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あ、はい、こちらです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, yes, this way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, yes, this way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドがスカートのポケットの中から地図を取り出す。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud produced a map from within her pocket.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud produced a map from within her pocket.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんか見覚えあるな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It feels like I've seen that before.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It feels like I've seen that before.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「学校案内のパンフレットだよ。微妙に懐かしいなぁ、それ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's a pamphlet with the school layout. It sure brings me back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's a pamphlet with the school layout. It sure brings me back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ここですね。１階の奥の階段から下りるようです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It should be here. Seems we need to take the stairs at the back of the first floor.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It should be here. Seems we need to take the stairs at the back of the first floor.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「校舎内にあるのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So it's inside the school...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So it's inside the school...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「さて、どんなでけぇ奴が棲んでるのやら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝So, what kind of huge monster could be living there...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝So, what kind of huge monster could be living there...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ねぇから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝None, I tell you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝None, I tell you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そっか。よし、じゃあ、いってみるか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I see. All right, let's get going.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I see. All right, let's get going.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕たちは真人の後についていく。
MESSAGE.EN: We followed behind Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: We followed behind Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: 体が大きいから見た目は頼もしかった。
MESSAGE.EN: His large frame made him look reliable.
MESSAGE.Translation: His large frame made him look reliable.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ふつうの扉じゃねぇか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It's a normal door...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It's a normal door...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「大きくもないし、おまけにドアノブも普通だね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's not huge, and on top of that, the doorknob's normal too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's not huge, and on top of that, the doorknob's normal too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: これにどうしてそんな大きな鍵が必要なのか？
MESSAGE.EN: So, what's with the giant key?
MESSAGE.Translation: So, what's with the giant key?

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「いきなり難問ですねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝A difficult problem all of a sudden.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝A difficult problem all of a sudden.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は鍵をしげしげと見た。
MESSAGE.EN: I inspected the key closely.
MESSAGE.Translation: I inspected the key closely.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「とりあえず鍵穴に当ててみたらいいんじゃねぇか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝How about we try to put it in first?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝How about we try to put it in first?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そうですね…よいしょっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝That's right... There we go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝That's right... There we go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ガシ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Clang*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Clang*!

MESSAGE.JP: 鍵の先っぽがドアノブに当たる。
MESSAGE.EN: The tip of the key hit the doorknob.
MESSAGE.Translation: The tip of the key hit the doorknob.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「…開きませんね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...It won't open...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...It won't open...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、鍵穴に入ってないからね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, that's because it doesn't fit in the keyhole...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, that's because it doesn't fit in the keyhole...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「って、真人どうしたの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh, what's wrong Masato?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh, what's wrong Masato?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人は、僕たちの後ろでしゃがみこんでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato was squatting on the floor behind us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato was squatting on the floor behind us.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「頭がいてぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝My head hurts...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝My head hurts...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、どうしたのっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, what's wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, what's wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「体を使うのは得意だが…頭を使うのは…うぅ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Using my body is my strong point... But using my head is... Ugh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Using my body is my strong point... But using my head is... Ugh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ええー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eeh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eeh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「井ノ原さん、調子悪いですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Inohara-san, you're not feeling well?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Inohara-san, you're not feeling well?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ここから離れたら、すぐ治るよ。解放してあげていいかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If he gets away from here, he'll get better soon. Maybe we should just let him go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If he gets away from here, he'll get better soon. Maybe we should just let him go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「それで治るのなら、もちろんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Of course, if it'll help him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Of course, if it'll help him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「やべぇ知恵熱ですげぇ高熱だ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I have a terrible teething fever...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I have a terrible teething fever...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それは大変だね…ゆっくり休んでよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's serious, huh... Have a good rest.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's serious, huh... Have a good rest.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「す、すまねぇな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝S, sorry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝S, sorry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人は壁にもたれかかったまま、ずりずりと去っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: He leaned against the wall, slowly dragging himself away.
MESSAGE.Translation: He leaned against the wall, slowly dragging himself away.

MESSAGE.JP: なんの役にも立たない仲間だった…。
MESSAGE.EN: He's one useless friend...
MESSAGE.Translation: He's one useless friend...

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「大丈夫でしょうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Will he be okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Will he be okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「真人は大丈夫だけど、またふたりになっちゃったね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Masato'll be fine, but we're alone again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Masato'll be fine, but we're alone again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: また、別の誰かを呼ぼうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: We should call someone else...
MESSAGE.Translation: We should call someone else...

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「練習中だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I'm training.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I'm training.❞

MESSAGE.JP: さて誰に頼もう？
MESSAGE.EN: No, who should we call?
MESSAGE.Translation: No, who should we call?

MESSAGE.JP: 練習が終わり、いつものように道具を部室に戻す。
MESSAGE.EN: After practice, we returned our equipment to the club room as always.
MESSAGE.Translation: After practice, we returned our equipment to the club room as always.

MESSAGE.JP: そこへ携帯が震え、メールが入った。
MESSAGE.EN: Just then, my phone vibrated to inform me I had a text.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just then, my phone vibrated to inform me I had a text.

MESSAGE.JP: 差出人は…まあ、朱鷺戸さんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: The sender... was probably Tokido-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sender... was probably Tokido-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 開けて内容をみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I opened and read it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I opened and read it.

MESSAGE.JP: 『今すぐ北校舎３階に走って。相手が実力行使に出る可能性がある　Ｔ』
MESSAGE.EN: [Immediately run to the third floor of the north building. There's a chance the enemy is going to use force. -T]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Immediately run to the third floor of the north building. There's a chance the enemy is going to use force. -T]

MESSAGE.JP: なんだ!?
MESSAGE.EN: What?!
MESSAGE.Translation: What?!

MESSAGE.JP: どうやら相手の出方が変わったらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: I guess the enemy has changed tactics.
MESSAGE.Translation: I guess the enemy has changed tactics.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はあらん限りの力で走っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: I ran as fast as I could.
MESSAGE.Translation: I ran as fast as I could.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はぁ…はぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haa... haa...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haa... haa...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ３階の廊下に着くと、そこには小毬さんがいた。
MESSAGE.EN: I found Komari-san in the hallway when I got to the third floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: I found Komari-san in the hallway when I got to the third floor.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あれ？　理樹君、どうしたの？　そんなに慌てて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Huh? What's wrong, Riki-kun? You're flustered.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Huh? What's wrong, Riki-kun? You're flustered.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「小毬さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Komari-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Komari-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 他は誰もいない…。
MESSAGE.EN: It was just us...
MESSAGE.Translation: It was just us...

MESSAGE.JP: どういうことだろう…？
MESSAGE.EN: What does this mean...?
MESSAGE.Translation: What does this mean...?

MESSAGE.JP: 内ポケットから振動があった。またメールを受信したようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a vibration in my pocket. I'd gotten another text.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a vibration in my pocket. I'd gotten another text.

MESSAGE.JP: 『そのまままっすぐ職員室に連れて行って　Ｔ』
MESSAGE.EN: [Now take her straight to the staff room. -T]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Now take her straight to the staff room. -T]

MESSAGE.JP: 敵が近くまで来ているようだった…。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed that the enemy was drawing close...
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed that the enemy was drawing close...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、あのさ、今から何か用事ある？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝U-um, are you doing anything right now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝U-um, are you doing anything right now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「とくにないよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Not really～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Not really～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ねえ、ちょっと職員室へ一緒に来てもらえるかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, could you come to the staff room with me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, could you come to the staff room with me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、いいよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yep, sure～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yep, sure～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: よかった。細かいことに拘らない小毬さんで…。
MESSAGE.EN: Thank goodness. Komari-san never worries about the details...
MESSAGE.Translation: Thank goodness. Komari-san never worries about the details...

MESSAGE.JP: 歩いている途中に次なるメールが届く。
MESSAGE.EN: I got another text while we were walking.
MESSAGE.Translation: I got another text while we were walking.

MESSAGE.JP: 『妙な連中が北校舎の裏から来る。一度２階に戻ってＡ組の教卓を見て。こちらで撹乱するから神北さんは職員室に入れて　Ｔ』
MESSAGE.EN: [Suspicious guys are coming from the north building. Go to the second floor and look at the podium in class A. Expect trouble; have Kamikita-san go into the staff room. -T]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Suspicious guys are coming from the north building. Go to the second floor and look at the podium in class A. Expect trouble; have Kamikita-san go into the staff room. -T]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ごめん、職員室に入ってそのまま待ってて！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry, but please go into the staff room and wait there!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry, but please go into the staff room and wait there!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「え？　ど、どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Eh? W-What's wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Eh? W-What's wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「理由は後で話すけど、今は危ないんだっ」
